71 typedef enum _ni_t35_sei_mesg_type
72 {
73  NI_T35_SEI_CLOSED_CAPTION = 0,
74  NI_T35_SEI_HDR10_PLUS = 1
75 } ni_t35_sei_mesg_type_t;
76 
77 static uint8_t g_itu_t_t35_cc_sei_hdr_hevc[NI_CC_SEI_HDR_HEVC_LEN] = {
78  0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x01, // NAL start code 00 00 00 01
79  0x4e,
80  0x01, // nal_unit_header() {forbidden bit=0 nal_unit_type=39,
81  // nuh_layer_id=0 nuh_temporal_id_plus1=1)
82  0x04, // payloadType= 4 (user_data_registered_itu_t_t35)
83  0 + 11, // payLoadSize= ui16Len + 11; to be set (index 7)
84  0xb5, // itu_t_t35_country_code =181 (North America)
85  0x00,
86  0x31, // itu_t_t35_provider_code = 49
87  0x47, 0x41, 0x39,
88  0x34, // ATSC_user_identifier = "GA94"
89  0x03, // ATSC1_data_user_data_type_code=3
90  0 | 0xc0, // (ui16Len/3) | 0xc0 (to be set; index 16) (each CC character
91  //is 3 bytes)
92  0xFF // em_data = 255
93 };
94 
95 static uint8_t g_itu_t_t35_hdr10p_sei_hdr_hevc[NI_HDR10P_SEI_HDR_HEVC_LEN] = {
96  0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x01, // NAL start code 00 00 00 01
97  0x4e,
98  0x01, // nal_unit_header() {forbidden bit=0 nal_unit_type=39,
99  // nuh_layer_id=0 nuh_temporal_id_plus1=1)
100  0x04, // payloadType= 4 (user_data_registered_itu_t_t35)
101  0x00, // payLoadSize; to be set (index 7)
102  0xb5, // u8 itu_t_t35_country_code =181 (North America)
103  //0x00,
104  //0x3c, // u16 itu_t_t35_provider_code = 0x003c
105  //0x00,
106  //0x01, // u16 itu_t_t35_provider_oriented_code = 0x0001
107  // payLoadSize count starts from itu_t_t35_provider_code and goes until
108  // and including trailer
109 };
110 
111 static uint8_t g_itu_t_t35_cc_sei_hdr_h264[NI_CC_SEI_HDR_H264_LEN] = {
112  0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x01, // NAL start code 00 00 00 01
113  0x06, // nal_unit_header() {forbidden bit=0 nal_ref_idc=0, nal_unit_type=6
114  0x04, // payloadType= 4 (user_data_registered_itu_t_t35)
115  0 + 11, // payLoadSize= ui16Len + 11; to be set (index 6)
116  0xb5, // itu_t_t35_country_code =181 (North America)
117  0x00,
118  0x31, // itu_t_t35_provider_code = 49
119  0x47, 0x41, 0x39,
120  0x34, // ATSC_user_identifier = "GA94"
121  0x03, // ATSC1_data_user_data_type_code=3
122  0 | 0xc0, // (ui16Len/3) | 0xc0 (to be set; index 15) (each CC character
123  //is 3 bytes)
124  0xFF // em_data = 255
125 };
126 
127 static uint8_t g_itu_t_t35_hdr10p_sei_hdr_h264[NI_HDR10P_SEI_HDR_H264_LEN] = {
128  0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x01, // NAL start code 00 00 00 01
129  0x06, // nal_unit_header() {forbidden bit=0 nal_ref_idc=0, nal_unit_type=6
130  0x04, // payloadType= 4 (user_data_registered_itu_t_t35)
131  0x00, // payLoadSize; to be set (index 6)
132  0xb5, // itu_t_t35_country_code =181 (North America)
133  //0x00,
134  //0x3c, // u16 itu_t_t35_provider_code = 0x003c
135  //0x00,
136  //0x01, // u16 itu_t_t35_provider_oriented_code = 0x0001
137  // payLoadSize count starts from itu_t_t35_provider_code and goes until
138  // and including trailer
139 };
140 
141 static uint8_t g_sei_trailer[NI_CC_SEI_TRAILER_LEN] = {
142  0xFF, // marker_bits = 255
143  0x80 // RBSP trailing bits - rbsp_stop_one_bit and 7 rbsp_alignment_zero_bit
144 };
145 
146 #define NI_XCODER_FAILURES_MAX 25
147 #define DP_IPC_PASSTHRU 0xFFFFFFFF
148 
149 //Following macros will only check for critical failures.
150 //After the macro runs, rc should contain the status of the last command sent
151 //For non-critical failures, it is assumed in the code that eventually after enough retries, a command will succeed.
152 //Invalid parameters or resource busy do not account for failures that cause error count to be incremented so they can be retried indefinitely
153 #ifdef _WIN32
154 #define CHECK_ERR_RC(ctx, rc, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id) \
155  { \
156  ni_session_stats_t err_rc_info = {0}; \
157  int err_rc = \
158  ni_query_session_stats(ctx, type, &err_rc_info, rc, opcode); \
159  if (err_rc != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS) \
160  { \
161  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, \
162  "PANIC!!!! - Query for stats failed. What to do?\n"); \
163  } \
164  rc = err_rc_info.ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus; \
165  int tmp_rc = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE; \
166  if ((ctx->rc_error_count >= NI_XCODER_FAILURES_MAX) || \
167  (tmp_rc = \
168  ni_nvme_check_error_code(rc, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id))) \
169  { \
170  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, \
171  "Persistent failures detected, %s() line-%d: " \
172  "session_no 0x%x sess_err_count %u inst_err_no %u " \
173  "rc_error_count: %d\n", \
174  __func__, __LINE__, *inst_id, err_rc_info.ui16ErrorCount, \
175  err_rc_info.ui32LastErrorStatus, ctx->rc_error_count); \
176  rc = tmp_rc; \
177  LRETURN; \
178  } \
179  if (type == NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI && err_rc_info.ui32LastErrorStatus != 0) \
180  { \
181  rc = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE; \
182  } \
183  }
184 
185 #define CHECK_ERR_RC2(ctx, rc, info, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id) \
186  { \
187  (rc) = (info).ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus; \
188  if ((info).ui16ErrorCount || (rc)) \
189  (ctx)->rc_error_count++; \
190  else \
191  (ctx)->rc_error_count = 0; \
192  int tmp_rc = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE; \
193  if ((info).ui16ErrorCount || \
194  (ctx)->rc_error_count >= NI_XCODER_FAILURES_MAX || \
195  (tmp_rc = ni_nvme_check_error_code(rc, (opcode), (type), (hw_id), \
196  (inst_id)))) \
197  { \
198  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, \
199  "Persistent failures detected, %s() line-%d: session_no " \
200  "0x%x sess_err_no %u " \
201  "inst_err_no %u rc_error_count: %d\n", \
202  __func__, __LINE__, *(inst_id), (info).ui16ErrorCount, \
203  (info).ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus, \
204  (ctx)->rc_error_count); \
205  (rc) = tmp_rc; \
206  LRETURN; \
207  } \
208  }
209 
210 #define CHECK_ERR_RC3(ctx, rc, err_rc_info, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id) \
211  { \
212  if ((rc) != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS) \
213  { \
214  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, \
215  "PANIC!!! - Query for stats failed. What to do?\n"); \
216  exit(EXIT_FAILURE); \
217  } \
218  (rc) = (err_rc_info).ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus; \
219  int tmp_rc = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE; \
220  if (((ctx)->rc_error_count >= NI_XCODER_FAILURES_MAX) || \
221  (tmp_rc = ni_nvme_check_error_code((rc), (opcode), (type), \
222  (hw_id), (inst_id)))) \
223  { \
224  ni_log( \
225  NI_LOG_ERROR, \
226  "Persistent failures detected, %s() line-%d: session_no 0x%x " \
227  "sess_err_count %u inst_err_no %u rc_error_count: %d\n", \
228  __func__, __LINE__, *(inst_id), (err_rc_info).ui16ErrorCount, \
229  (err_rc_info).ui32LastErrorStatus, (ctx)->rc_error_count); \
230  (rc) = tmp_rc; \
231  LRETURN; \
232  } \
233  }
234 #elif __linux__ || __APPLE__
235 static struct stat g_nvme_stat = {0};
236 
237 #ifdef XCODER_SELF_KILL_ERR
238 #define CHECK_ERR_RC(ctx, rc, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id) \
239  { \
240  ni_session_stats_t err_rc_info = {0}; \
241  int err_rc = \
242  ni_query_session_stats(ctx, type, &err_rc_info, rc, opcode); \
243  if (err_rc != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS) \
244  { \
245  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, \
246  "PANIC!!!! - Query for stats failed. What to do?\n"); \
247  exit(EXIT_FAILURE); \
248  } \
249  rc = err_rc_info.ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus; \
250  int tmp_rc = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE; \
251  if ((ctx->rc_error_count >= NI_XCODER_FAILURES_MAX) || \
252  (tmp_rc = \
253  ni_nvme_check_error_code(rc, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id))) \
254  { \
255  ni_log( \
256  NI_LOG_ERROR, \
257  "Persistent failures detected, %s() line-%d: session_no 0x%x " \
258  "sess_err_count %u inst_err_no %u rc_error_count: %d\n", \
259  __func__, __LINE__, *inst_id, err_rc_info.ui16ErrorCount, \
260  err_rc_info.ui32LastErrorStatus, ctx->rc_error_count); \
261  rc = tmp_rc; \
262  kill(getpid(), SIGTERM); \
263  } \
264  }
265 
266 #define CHECK_ERR_RC2(ctx, rc, err_rc_info, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id) \
267  { \
268  (rc) = (err_rc_info).ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus; \
269  if ((err_rc_info).ui16ErrorCount || rc) \
270  (ctx)->rc_error_count++; \
271  else \
272  (ctx)->rc_error_count = 0; \
273  if ((err_rc_info).ui16ErrorCount || \
274  (ctx)->rc_error_count >= NI_XCODER_FAILURES_MAX || \
275  ni_nvme_check_error_code((rc), (opcode), (type), (hw_id), \
276  (inst_id))) \
277  { \
278  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, \
279  "Terminating due to persistent failures, %s() line-%d: " \
280  "session_no 0x%x " \
281  "sess_err_no %u inst_err_no %u " \
282  "rc_error_count: %d\n", \
283  __func__, __LINE__, *(inst_id), \
284  (err_rc_info).ui16ErrorCount, \
285  (err_rc_info).ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus, \
286  (ctx)->rc_error_count); \
287  kill(getpid(), SIGTERM); \
288  } \
289  }
290 
291 #define CHECK_ERR_RC3(ctx, rc, err_rc_info, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id) \
292  { \
293  if ((rc) != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS) \
294  { \
295  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, \
296  "PANIC!!! - Query for stats failed. What to do?\n"); \
297  exit(EXIT_FAILURE); \
298  } \
299  (rc) = (err_rc_info).ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus; \
300  int tmp_rc = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE; \
301  if (((ctx)->rc_error_count >= NI_XCODER_FAILURES_MAX) || \
302  (tmp_rc = ni_nvme_check_error_code((rc), (opcode), (type), \
303  (hw_id), (inst_id)))) \
304  { \
305  ni_log( \
306  NI_LOG_ERROR, \
307  "Persistent failures detected, %s() line-%d: session_no 0x%x " \
308  "sess_err_count %u inst_err_no %u rc_error_count: %d\n", \
309  __func__, __LINE__, *(inst_id), (err_rc_info).ui16ErrorCount, \
310  (err_rc_info).ui32LastErrorStatus, (ctx)->rc_error_count); \
311  (rc) = tmp_rc; \
312  LRETURN; \
313  } \
314  }
315 #else
316 #define CHECK_ERR_RC(ctx, rc, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id) \
317  { \
318  ni_session_stats_t err_rc_info = {0}; \
319  int err_rc = \
320  ni_query_session_stats(ctx, type, &err_rc_info, rc, opcode); \
321  if (err_rc != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS) \
322  { \
323  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, \
324  "PANIC!!!! - Query for stats failed. What to do?\n"); \
325  exit(EXIT_FAILURE); \
326  } \
327  (rc) = err_rc_info.ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus; \
328  int tmp_rc = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE; \
329  if (((ctx)->rc_error_count >= NI_XCODER_FAILURES_MAX) || \
330  (tmp_rc = \
331  ni_nvme_check_error_code(rc, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id))) \
332  { \
333  ni_log( \
334  NI_LOG_ERROR, \
335  "Persistent failures detected, %s() line-%d: session_no 0x%x " \
336  "sess_err_count %u inst_err_no %u rc_error_count: %d\n", \
337  __func__, __LINE__, *(inst_id), err_rc_info.ui16ErrorCount, \
338  err_rc_info.ui32LastErrorStatus, (ctx)->rc_error_count); \
339  (rc) = tmp_rc; \
340  LRETURN; \
341  } \
342  }
343 
344 #define CHECK_ERR_RC2(ctx, rc, err_rc_info, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id) \
345  { \
346  (rc) = (err_rc_info).ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus; \
347  if ((err_rc_info).ui16ErrorCount || (rc)) \
348  (ctx)->rc_error_count++; \
349  else \
350  (ctx)->rc_error_count = 0; \
351  int tmp_rc = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE; \
352  if ((err_rc_info).ui16ErrorCount || \
353  (ctx)->rc_error_count >= NI_XCODER_FAILURES_MAX || \
354  (tmp_rc = ni_nvme_check_error_code((rc), (opcode), (type), \
355  (hw_id), (inst_id)))) \
356  { \
357  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Persistent failures detected, %s() line-%d: "\
358  "session_no 0x%x sess_err_no %u inst_err_no %u " \
359  "rc_error_count: %d\n", __func__, __LINE__, *(inst_id), \
360  (err_rc_info).ui16ErrorCount, \
361  (err_rc_info).ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus, \
362  (ctx)->rc_error_count); \
363  (rc) = tmp_rc; \
364  LRETURN; \
365  } \
366  }
367 
368 #define CHECK_ERR_RC3(ctx, rc, err_rc_info, opcode, type, hw_id, inst_id) \
369  { \
370  if ((rc) != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS) \
371  { \
372  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, \
373  "PANIC!!! - Query for stats failed. What to do?\n"); \
374  exit(EXIT_FAILURE); \
375  } \
376  (rc) = (err_rc_info).ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus; \
377  int tmp_rc = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE; \
378  if (((ctx)->rc_error_count >= NI_XCODER_FAILURES_MAX) || \
379  (tmp_rc = ni_nvme_check_error_code((rc), (opcode), (type), \
380  (hw_id), (inst_id)))) \
381  { \
382  ni_log( \
383  NI_LOG_ERROR, \
384  "Persistent failures detected, %s() line-%d: session_no 0x%x " \
385  "sess_err_count %u inst_err_no %u rc_error_count: %d\n", \
386  __func__, __LINE__, *(inst_id), (err_rc_info).ui16ErrorCount, \
387  (err_rc_info).ui32LastErrorStatus, (ctx)->rc_error_count); \
388  (rc) = tmp_rc; \
389  LRETURN; \
390  } \
391  }
392 #endif

394 #endif
395 
396 #define CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(ret) \
397  { \
398  if (NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_VPU_RECOVERY == (ret)) \
399  { \
400  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error, vpu reset.\n"); \
401  (ret) = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_VPU_RECOVERY; \
402  LRETURN; \
403  } \
404  }
405 
406 // ctx->decoder_low_delay is used as condition wait timeout for both decoder
407 // and encoder send/recv multi-thread in low delay mode.
408 static void low_delay_wait(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx)
409 {
410  const char *name = p_ctx->device_type == NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER ? \
411  "decoder" : "encoder";
412  if (p_ctx->async_mode && p_ctx->decoder_low_delay > 0)
413  {
414  int ret;
415  long nsec;
416  struct timeval tv;
417  struct timespec ts;
418  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s waiting for %s recv thread\n", __FUNCTION__, name);
419  (void) ni_gettimeofday(&tv, NULL);
420  nsec = tv.tv_usec * 1000 + (p_ctx->decoder_low_delay % 1000) * 1000000;
421  ts.tv_sec = tv.tv_sec + nsec / 1000000000 + p_ctx->decoder_low_delay / 1000;
422  ts.tv_nsec = nsec % 1000000000;
423  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->low_delay_sync_mutex);
424  while (p_ctx->low_delay_sync_flag)
425  {
426  // In case of dead lock on waiting for notification from recv thread.
427  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
428  ret = ni_pthread_cond_timedwait(&p_ctx->low_delay_sync_cond,
429  &p_ctx->low_delay_sync_mutex, &ts);
430  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
431  if (ret == ETIMEDOUT)
432  {
433  p_ctx->low_delay_sync_flag = 0;
434  }
435  }
436  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->low_delay_sync_mutex);
437  }
438 }
439 
440 static void low_delay_signal(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx)
441 {
442  const char *name = p_ctx->device_type == NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER ? \
443  "decoder" : "encoder";
444  if (p_ctx->async_mode && p_ctx->decoder_low_delay > 0)
445  {
446  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: wake up %s send thread\n", __FUNCTION__, name);
447  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->low_delay_sync_mutex);
448  p_ctx->low_delay_sync_flag = 0;
449  ni_pthread_cond_signal(&p_ctx->low_delay_sync_cond);
450  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->low_delay_sync_mutex);
451  }
452 }
453 
454 static void query_sleep(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx)
455 {
456  if (p_ctx->async_mode)
457  {
458  // To release thread schedule in async mode in query loop
459  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
460  ni_usleep(NI_RETRY_INTERVAL_200US);
461  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
462  }
463 }
464 
465 // create folder bearing the card name (nvmeX) if not existing
466 // start working inside this folder: nvmeX
467 // find the earliest saved and/or non-existing stream folder and use it as
468 // the pkt saving destination; at most 128 such folders to be checked/created;
469 // folder name is in the format of: streamY, where Y is [1, 128]
470 static void decoder_dump_dir_open(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx)
471 {
472 #ifdef _WIN32
473 #elif __linux__ || __APPLE__
474  FILE *fp;
475  char dir_name[128] = {0};
476  char file_name[512] = {0};
477  ni_device_context_t *p_device_context;
478  DIR *dir;
479  struct dirent *stream_folder;
480  int curr_stream_idx = 0;
481  int earliest_stream_idx = 0;
482  int max_exist_idx = 0;
483  time_t earliest_time = 0;
484  struct stat file_stat;
485 
486  p_device_context =
487  ni_rsrc_get_device_context(p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id);
488  if (!p_device_context)
489  {
490  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error retrieve device context for decoder guid %d\n",
491  p_ctx->hw_id);
492  return;
493  }
494 
495  flock(p_device_context->lock, LOCK_EX);
496 
497  strcpy(dir_name, &p_ctx->dev_xcoder_name[5]);
498  if (0 != access(dir_name, F_OK))
499  {
500  if (0 != mkdir(dir_name, S_IRWXU | S_IRWXG | S_IRWXO))
501  {
502  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error create folder %s, errno %d\n", dir_name,
503  NI_ERRNO);
504  } else
505  {
506  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Created pkt folder for: %s\n", dir_name);
507  }
508  }
509 
510  if (NULL == (dir = opendir(dir_name)))
511  {
512  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error %d: failed to open directory %s\n",
513  NI_ERRNO, dir_name);
514  } else
515  {
516  // have a quick first pass of streamY folders, and if existing Y < 128,
517  // create a new folder Y+1 directly without checking existing ones'
518  // content
519  while ((stream_folder = readdir(dir)))
520  {
521  if (!strncmp(stream_folder->d_name, "stream", strlen("stream")))
522  {
523  curr_stream_idx =
524  atoi(&(stream_folder->d_name[strlen("stream")]));
525  if (curr_stream_idx > 0)
526  {
527  if (curr_stream_idx > max_exist_idx)
528  {
529  max_exist_idx = curr_stream_idx;
530  }
531  if (NI_MAX_CONTEXTS_PER_HW_INSTANCE == curr_stream_idx)
532  {
533  break;
534  }
535  }
536  }
537  }
538 
539  // if less than 128 streams created then create a new one, otherwise have
540  // to pick the stream folder that has the earliest modified file which
541  // is most likely done by finished session.
542  if (max_exist_idx < NI_MAX_CONTEXTS_PER_HW_INSTANCE)
543  {
544  curr_stream_idx = max_exist_idx + 1;
545  } else
546  {
547  rewinddir(dir);
548  while ((stream_folder = readdir(dir)))
549  {
550  // go through each of these streamY folders and get modified
551  // time of the first pkt-* file to simplify the searching
552  if (!strncmp(stream_folder->d_name, "stream", strlen("stream")))
553  {
554  snprintf(file_name, sizeof(file_name), "%s/%s/pkt-0001.bin",
555  dir_name, stream_folder->d_name);
556 
557  curr_stream_idx =
558  atoi(&(stream_folder->d_name[strlen("stream")]));
559 
560  if (curr_stream_idx > 0 && 0 == access(file_name, F_OK))
561  {
562  // just take pkt-0001 file timestamp to simplify search
563  if (stat(file_name, &file_stat))
564  {
565  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error %d: failed to stat file %s\n",
566  NI_ERRNO,
567  file_name);
568  } else
569  {
570  if (0 == earliest_stream_idx ||
571  file_stat.st_mtime < earliest_time)
572  {
573  earliest_stream_idx = curr_stream_idx;
574  earliest_time = file_stat.st_mtime;
575  }
576  }
577  } // check first file in streamX
578  } // go through each streamX folder
579  } // read all files in nvmeY
580 
581  curr_stream_idx = earliest_stream_idx;
582 
583  // set the access/modified time of chosen pkt file to NOW so its
584  // stream folder won't be taken by other sessions.
585  snprintf(file_name, sizeof(file_name), "%s/stream%03d/pkt-0001.bin",
586  dir_name, curr_stream_idx);
587  if (utime(file_name, NULL))
588  {
589  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error utime %s\n", file_name);
590  }
591  } // 128 streams in nvmeY already
592  closedir(dir);
593  }
594 
595  snprintf(p_ctx->stream_dir_name, sizeof(p_ctx->stream_dir_name),
596  "%s/stream%03d", dir_name, curr_stream_idx);
597 
598  if (0 != access(p_ctx->stream_dir_name, F_OK))
599  {
600  if (0 != mkdir(p_ctx->stream_dir_name, S_IRWXU | S_IRWXG | S_IRWXO))
601  {
602  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error create stream folder %s, errno %d\n",
603  p_ctx->stream_dir_name, NI_ERRNO);
604  } else
605  {
606  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Created stream sub folder: %s\n",
607  p_ctx->stream_dir_name);
608  }
609  } else
610  {
611  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Reusing stream sub folder: %s\n",
612  p_ctx->stream_dir_name);
613  }
614 
615  flock(p_device_context->lock, LOCK_UN);
616  ni_rsrc_free_device_context(p_device_context);
617 
618  snprintf(file_name, sizeof(file_name), "%s/process_session_id.txt",
619  p_ctx->stream_dir_name);
620 
621  fp = fopen(file_name, "wb");
622  if (fp)
623  {
624  char number[64] = {'\0'};
625  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Decoder pkt dump log created: %s\n", file_name);
626  snprintf(number, sizeof(number), "proc id: %ld\nsession id: %u\n",
627  (long)getpid(), p_ctx->session_id);
628  fwrite(number, strlen(number), 1, fp);
629  fclose(fp);
630  } else
631  {
632  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Error create decoder pkt dump log: %s\n", file_name);
633  }
634 #endif
635 }
636 
637 // check if fw_rev is higher than the specified
638 static uint32_t is_fw_rev_higher(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, uint8_t major, uint8_t minor)
639 {
640  if ((p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] > major) ||
641  ((p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] == major) &&
642  (p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MINOR_VER_IDX] > minor)))
643  {
644  return 1;
645  }
646  else
647  {
648  return 0;
649  }
650 }
651 
652 /*!******************************************************************************
653  * \brief Open a xcoder decoder instance
654  *
655  * \param
656  *
657  * \return
658 *******************************************************************************/
659 ni_retcode_t ni_decoder_session_open(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx)
660 {
661  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
662  ni_xcoder_params_t *p_param = NULL;
663  uint32_t buffer_size = 0;
664  void* p_buffer = NULL;
665  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
666 
667  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
668 
669  if (!p_ctx)
670  {
671  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): passed parameters are null!, return\n",
672  __func__);
673  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
674  LRETURN;
675  }
676 
677  //Create the session if the create session flag is set
678  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
679  {
680  p_ctx->device_type = NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER;
681  p_ctx->pts_table = NULL;
682  p_ctx->dts_queue = NULL;
683  p_ctx->p_leftover = NULL;
684  p_ctx->buffer_pool = NULL;
685  p_ctx->dec_fme_buf_pool = NULL;
686  p_ctx->prev_size = 0;
687  p_ctx->sent_size = 0;
688  p_ctx->status = 0;
689  p_ctx->key_frame_type = 0;
690  p_ctx->ready_to_close = 0;
691  p_ctx->rc_error_count = 0;
692  p_ctx->frame_num = 0;
693  p_ctx->pkt_num = 0;
694  p_ctx->pkt_index = 0;
695  p_ctx->session_timestamp = 0;
696  p_ctx->is_dec_pkt_512_aligned = 0;
697  p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf = NULL;
698  memset(p_ctx->pkt_custom_sei_set, 0, NI_FIFO_SZ * sizeof(ni_custom_sei_set_t *));
699 
700  //malloc zero data buffer
701  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE),
702  NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN))
703  {
704  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
705  "ERROR %d: %s() alloc decoder all zero buffer failed\n",
706  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
707  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
708  LRETURN;
709  }
710  memset(p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
711 
712  //malloc data buffer
713  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN))
714  {
715  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() alloc data buffer failed\n",
716  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
717  ni_aligned_free(p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf);
718  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
719  LRETURN;
720  }
721  memset(p_buffer, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
722 
723  //Set session ID to be invalid. In case we cannot open session, the session id wold remain invalid.
724  //In case we can open sesison, the session id would become valid.
725  ((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui16SessionId =
726  (uint16_t)NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
727 
728  // First uint32_t is either an invaild session ID or a valid session ID, depending on if session could be opened
729  ui32LBA = OPEN_SESSION_CODEC(NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER, ni_htonl(p_ctx->codec_format), p_ctx->hw_action);
730  retval = ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
731  p_buffer, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA);
732  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
733  {
734  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR ni_nvme_send_read_cmd\n");
735  LRETURN;
736  }
737  //Open will return a session status structure with a valid session id if it worked.
738  //Otherwise the invalid session id set before the open command will stay
739  p_ctx->session_id = ni_ntohs(((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui16SessionId);
740  p_ctx->session_timestamp =
741  ni_htonll(((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui64Session_timestamp);
742  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
743  {
744  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
745  "ERROR %s(): p_ctx->device_handle=%" PRIx64
746  ", p_ctx->hw_id=%d, p_ctx->session_id=%d\n",
747  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
748  p_ctx->session_id);
749  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
750  LRETURN;
751  }
752  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Decoder open session ID:0x%x, timestamp:%" PRIu64 "\n",
753  p_ctx->session_id, p_ctx->session_timestamp);
754 
755  //Send keep alive timeout Info
756  uint64_t keep_alive_timeout =
757  p_ctx->keep_alive_timeout * 1000000; //send us to FW
758  memset(p_buffer, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
759  memcpy(p_buffer, &keep_alive_timeout, sizeof(keep_alive_timeout));
760  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s keep_alive_timeout %" PRIx64 "\n", __func__,
761  keep_alive_timeout);
762  ui32LBA = CONFIG_SESSION_KeepAliveTimeout_W(p_ctx->session_id);
763  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
764  p_buffer, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA);
765  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
766  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
767  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
768 
769  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
770  {
771  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
772  "ERROR %s(): nvme write keep_alive_timeout command "
773  "failed, blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %d\n",
774  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id);
775  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
776  LRETURN;
777  }
778 
779  // Send SW version to FW if FW version is higher than major 6 minor 1
780  if (is_fw_rev_higher(p_ctx, (uint8_t)'6', (uint8_t)'1'))
781  {
782  // Send SW version to session manager
783  memset(p_buffer, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
784  memcpy(p_buffer, NI_XCODER_REVISION, sizeof(uint64_t));
785  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s sw_version major %c minor %c fw_rev major %c minor %c\n", __func__,
786  NI_XCODER_REVISION[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX],
787  NI_XCODER_REVISION[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MINOR_VER_IDX],
788  p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX],
789  p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MINOR_VER_IDX]);
790  ui32LBA = CONFIG_SESSION_SWVersion_W(p_ctx->session_id);
791  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
792  p_buffer, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA);
793  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config, p_ctx->device_type,
794  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
795  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
796 
797  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
798  {
799  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
800  "ERROR %s(): nvme write sw_version command "
801  "failed, blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %d\n",
802  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id);
803  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
804  LRETURN;
805  }
806  }
807 
808  //VP9 requires a scaler session to be opened internally and attached as
809  //well
810  if(p_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_VP9)
811  {
812  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Adding scaling session to Vp9 decoder\n");
813  ui32LBA = OPEN_ADD_CODEC(NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER, ni_htonl(NI_SCALER_OPCODE_SCALE), ni_htons(p_ctx->session_id));
814  retval = ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
815  p_buffer, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA);
816 
817  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_open,
818  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
819  &(p_ctx->session_id));
820  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
821  {
822  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR couldn't add vp9 scaler to decoding session\n");
823  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
824  "ERROR %s(): p_ctx->device_handle=%" PRIx64 ", "
825  "p_ctx->hw_id=%d, p_ctx->session_id=%d\n",
826  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
827  p_ctx->session_id);
828  ni_decoder_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
829  LRETURN;
830  }
831  }
832 
833  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
834  "%s(): p_ctx->device_handle=%" PRIx64 ", p_ctx->hw_id=%d, "
835  "p_ctx->session_id=%d\n",
836  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
837  p_ctx->session_id);
838  }
839 
840  //start dec config
841  retval = ni_config_instance_set_decoder_params(p_ctx, 0);
842  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
843  {
844  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: calling ni_config_instance_set_decoder_params(): p_ctx->device_handle=%" PRIx64 ", p_ctx->hw_id=%d, p_ctx->session_id=%d\n", (int64_t)p_ctx->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
845  //ni_decoder_session_close(p_ctx, 0); //close happens on above
846  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
847  LRETURN;
848  }
849  //end dec config
850 
851  // init for frame pts calculation
852  p_ctx->is_first_frame = 1;
853  p_ctx->last_pts = NI_NOPTS_VALUE;
854  p_ctx->last_dts = NI_NOPTS_VALUE;
855  p_ctx->last_dts_interval = 0;
856  p_ctx->pts_correction_last_dts = INT64_MIN;
857  p_ctx->pts_correction_last_pts = INT64_MIN;
858 
859  //p_ctx->p_leftover = malloc(NI_MAX_PACKET_SZ * 2);
860  p_ctx->p_leftover = malloc(p_ctx->max_nvme_io_size * 2);
861  if (!p_ctx->p_leftover)
862  {
863  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Cannot allocate leftover buffer.\n",
864  __func__);
865  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
866  //ni_decoder_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
867  LRETURN;
868  }
869 
870  ni_timestamp_init(p_ctx, &p_ctx->pts_table, "dec_pts");
871  ni_timestamp_init(p_ctx, &p_ctx->dts_queue, "dec_dts");
872 
873  if (p_ctx->p_session_config)
874  {
875  p_param = (ni_xcoder_params_t *)p_ctx->p_session_config;
876  ni_params_print(p_param);
877  }
878 
879  p_ctx->active_video_width = 0;
880  p_ctx->active_video_height = 0;
881  p_ctx->actual_video_width = 0;
882 
883  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
884  "%s(): p_ctx->device_handle=%" PRIx64 ", p_ctx->hw_id=%d, "
885  "p_ctx->session_id=%d\n",
886  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
887  p_ctx->session_id);
888 
889  if (p_param && p_param->dec_input_params.nb_save_pkt)
890  {
891  decoder_dump_dir_open(p_ctx);
892  }
893 
894 #ifdef XCODER_DUMP_DATA
895  char dir_name[256] = {0};
896 
897  snprintf(dir_name, sizeof(dir_name), "%ld-%u-dec-fme", (long)getpid(),
898  p_ctx->session_id);
899  DIR *dir = opendir(dir_name);
900  if (!dir && ENOENT == NI_ERRNO)
901  {
902  mkdir(dir_name, S_IRWXU | S_IRWXG | S_IRWXO);
903  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Decoder frame dump dir created: %s\n", dir_name);
904  }
905 #endif
906 
907 END:
908 
909  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
910  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
911 
912  return retval;
913 }
914 
915 /*!******************************************************************************
916  * \brief send a keep alive message to firmware
917  *
918  * \param
919  *
920  * \return
921  *******************************************************************************/
922 ni_retcode_t ni_send_session_keep_alive(uint32_t session_id, ni_device_handle_t device_handle, ni_event_handle_t event_handle, void *p_data)
923 {
924  ni_retcode_t retval;
925  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
926 
927  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
928  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == session_id)
929  {
930  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): Invalid session ID!, return\n",
931  __func__);
932  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
933  LRETURN;
934  }
935 
936  if (NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE == device_handle)
937  {
938  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): xcoder instance id < 0, return\n",
939  __func__);
940  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
941  LRETURN;
942  }
943 
944  ui32LBA = CONFIG_SESSION_KeepAlive_W(session_id);
945  if (ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(device_handle, event_handle, p_data,
946  NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA) < 0)
947  {
948  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): device_handle=%" PRIx64 " , "
949  "session_id=%d\n", __func__, (int64_t)device_handle, session_id);
950  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
951  }
952  else
953  {
954  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "SUCCESS %s(): device_handle=%" PRIx64 " , "
955  "session_id=%d\n", __func__, (int64_t)device_handle, session_id);
956  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
957  }
958 
959 END:
960 
961  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
962 
963  return retval;
964 }
965 
966 /*!******************************************************************************
967  * \brief Flush decoder output
968  *
969  * \param
970  *
971  * \return
972  *******************************************************************************/
973 ni_retcode_t ni_decoder_session_flush(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx)
974 {
975  ni_retcode_t retval;
976  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
977 
978  if (!p_ctx)
979  {
980  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: passed parameters are null!, return\n",
981  __func__);
982  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
983  LRETURN;
984  }
985 
986  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
987  {
988  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): xcoder instance id < 0, return\n",
989  __func__);
990  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
991  LRETURN;
992  }
993 
994  retval = ni_config_instance_eos(p_ctx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
995  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
996  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
997  &(p_ctx->session_id));
998  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS == retval)
999  {
1000  p_ctx->ready_to_close = 1;
1001  }
1002 
1003 END:
1004 
1005  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): success exit\n", __func__);
1006 
1007  return retval;
1008 }
1009 
1010 /*!******************************************************************************
1011  * \brief Close a xcoder decoder instance
1012  *
1013  * \param
1014  *
1015  * \return
1016  *******************************************************************************/
1017 ni_retcode_t ni_decoder_session_close(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, int eos_recieved)
1018 {
1019  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1020  void* p_buffer = NULL;
1021  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
1022  int counter = 0;
1023  int ret = 0;
1024  int i;
1025 
1026  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
1027 
1028  if (!p_ctx)
1029  {
1030  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
1031  __func__);
1032  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
1033  }
1034 
1035  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1036 
1037  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
1038  {
1039  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n", __func__);
1040  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1041  LRETURN;
1042  }
1043 
1044  if (NI_CODEC_HW_ENABLE == p_ctx->hw_action)
1045  {
1046  ni_session_statistic_t sessionStatistic = {0};
1047  ni_query_session_statistic_info(p_ctx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER, &sessionStatistic);
1048  }
1049 
1050  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO,
1051  "Decoder_complete_info:session_id 0x%x, total frames input:%u "
1052  "buffered: %u completed: %u output: %u dropped: %u\n",
1053  p_ctx->session_id, p_ctx->session_statistic.ui32FramesInput,
1054  p_ctx->session_statistic.ui32FramesBuffered,
1055  p_ctx->session_statistic.ui32FramesCompleted,
1056  p_ctx->session_statistic.ui32FramesOutput,
1057  p_ctx->session_statistic.ui32FramesDropped);
1058 
1059  //malloc data buffer
1060  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN))
1061  {
1062  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: malloc decoder close data buffer failed\n", NI_ERRNO);
1063  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
1064  LRETURN;
1065  }
1066  memset(p_buffer, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
1067 
1068  ui32LBA = CLOSE_SESSION_R(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
1069 
1070  int retry = 0;
1071  while (retry < NI_SESSION_CLOSE_RETRY_MAX)
1072  {
1073  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
1074  "%s(): p_ctx->blk_io_handle=%" PRIx64 ", p_ctx->hw_id=%d, "
1075  "p_ctx->session_id=%d, close_mode=1\n",
1076  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
1077  p_ctx->session_id);
1078 
1079  if (ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
1080  p_buffer, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA) < 0)
1081  {
1082  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): command failed!\n", __func__);
1083  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
1084  break;
1085  } else
1086  {
1087  //Close should always succeed
1088  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1089  p_ctx->session_id = NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
1090  break;
1091  }
1092  /*
1093  else if (*((ni_retcode_t *)p_buffer) == RETCODE_SUCCESS)
1094  {
1095  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1096  p_ctx->session_id = NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
1097  break;
1098  }
1099  else
1100  {
1101  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): wait for close\n", __func__);
1102  ni_usleep(NI_SESSION_CLOSE_RETRY_INTERVAL_US);
1103  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
1104  }
1105  */
1106  retry++;
1107  }
1108 
1109 END:
1110 
1111  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
1112  ni_aligned_free(p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf);
1113  ni_aligned_free(p_ctx->p_leftover);
1114 
1115  if (p_ctx->pts_table)
1116  {
1117  ni_queue_free(&p_ctx->pts_table->list, p_ctx->buffer_pool);
1118  ni_aligned_free(p_ctx->pts_table);
1119  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ni_timestamp_done: success\n");
1120  }
1121 
1122  if (p_ctx->dts_queue)
1123  {
1124  ni_queue_free(&p_ctx->dts_queue->list, p_ctx->buffer_pool);
1125  ni_aligned_free(p_ctx->dts_queue);
1126  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ni_timestamp_done: success\n");
1127  }
1128 
1129  ni_buffer_pool_free(p_ctx->buffer_pool);
1130  p_ctx->buffer_pool = NULL;
1131 
1132  ni_dec_fme_buffer_pool_free(p_ctx->dec_fme_buf_pool);
1133  p_ctx->dec_fme_buf_pool = NULL;
1134 
1135  for (i = 0; i < NI_FIFO_SZ; i++)
1136  {
1137  ni_aligned_free(p_ctx->pkt_custom_sei_set[i]);
1138  }
1139 
1140  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): CTX[Card:%" PRIx64 " / HW:%d / INST:%d]\n",
1141  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
1142  p_ctx->session_id);
1143 
1144  low_delay_signal(p_ctx);
1145  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1146 
1147  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
1148 
1149  return retval;
1150 }
1151 
1152 /*!******************************************************************************
1153  * \brief Send a video p_packet to decoder
1154  *
1155  * \param
1156  *
1157  * \return
1158  *******************************************************************************/
1159 int ni_decoder_session_write(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_packet_t* p_packet)
1160 {
1161  uint32_t sent_size = 0;
1162  uint32_t packet_size = 0;
1163  uint32_t write_size_bytes = 0;
1164  uint32_t actual_sent_size = 0;
1165  uint32_t pkt_chunk_count = 0;
1166  int current_pkt_size;
1167  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1168  ni_xcoder_params_t *p_param;
1169  ni_instance_buf_info_t buf_info = { 0 };
1170  ni_session_statistic_t sessionStatistic = {0};
1171  int query_retry = 0;
1172  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
1173 #ifdef MEASURE_LATENCY
1174  uint64_t abs_time_ns;
1175 #endif
1176 
1177  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
1178 
1179  if ((!p_ctx) || (!p_packet))
1180  {
1181  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
1182  __func__);
1183  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
1184  }
1185 
1186  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1187 
1188  if ((NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id))
1189  {
1190  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
1191  __func__);
1192  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
1193  LRETURN;
1194  }
1195 
1196  low_delay_wait(p_ctx);
1197 
1198 #ifdef MEASURE_LATENCY
1199  if ((p_packet->dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE) && (p_ctx->frame_time_q != NULL))
1200  {
1201  abs_time_ns = ni_gettime_ns();
1202  ni_lat_meas_q_add_entry((ni_lat_meas_q_t *)p_ctx->frame_time_q,
1203  abs_time_ns, p_packet->dts);
1204  }
1205 #endif
1206 
1207  p_param = (ni_xcoder_params_t *)p_ctx->p_session_config;
1208  packet_size = p_packet->data_len;
1209  current_pkt_size = packet_size;
1210 
1211  for (;;)
1212  {
1213  query_sleep(p_ctx);
1214 
1215  query_retry++;
1216  if ((p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] > (uint8_t)'6') ||
1217  (p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] == (uint8_t)'6' &&
1218  p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MINOR_VER_IDX] >= (uint8_t)'5'))
1219  {
1220  retval = ni_query_session_statistic_info(p_ctx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER,
1221  &sessionStatistic);
1222  CHECK_ERR_RC3(p_ctx, retval, sessionStatistic,
1223  nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query, p_ctx->device_type,
1224  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
1225  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
1226 
1227  buf_info.buf_avail_size = sessionStatistic.ui32WrBufAvailSize;
1228  } else
1229  {
1230  retval = ni_query_instance_buf_info(p_ctx, INST_BUF_INFO_RW_WRITE,
1231  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER, &buf_info);
1232  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
1233  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
1234  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
1235  }
1236 
1237  if (buf_info.buf_avail_size == DP_IPC_PASSTHRU)
1238  {
1239  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): Bad available buffer size %u\n", __FUNCTION__, buf_info.buf_avail_size);
1240  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
1241  LRETURN;
1242  }
1243 
1244  if (p_ctx->biggest_bitstream_buffer_allocated < buf_info.buf_avail_size)
1245  {
1246  p_ctx->biggest_bitstream_buffer_allocated = buf_info.buf_avail_size;
1247  }
1248  if (p_ctx->biggest_bitstream_buffer_allocated < packet_size)
1249  {
1250  // Reallocate decoder bitstream buffers to accomodate.
1251  if (is_fw_rev_higher(p_ctx, (uint8_t)'6', (uint8_t)'5'))
1252  {
1253  retval = ni_config_instance_set_write_len(p_ctx,
1254  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER,
1255  // packet buffer aligned to NI_MAX_PACKET_SZ(128k)
1256  (packet_size / NI_MAX_PACKET_SZ + 1) * NI_MAX_PACKET_SZ);
1257  }
1258  else
1259  {
1260  retval = ni_config_instance_set_decoder_params(p_ctx, packet_size);
1261  }
1262  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
1263  {
1264  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): failed to reallocate bitstream\n", __FUNCTION__);
1265  LRETURN;
1266  }
1267  query_retry--;
1268  continue;
1269  }
1270 
1271  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval ||
1272  buf_info.buf_avail_size < packet_size)
1273  {
1274  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
1275  "Warning dec write query fail rc %d or available "
1276  "buf size %u < pkt size %u , retry: %d\n",
1277  retval, buf_info.buf_avail_size, packet_size, query_retry);
1278  if (query_retry > NI_MAX_TX_RETRIES)
1279  {
1280  p_ctx->status = NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_WRITE_BUFFER_FULL;
1281  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1282  LRETURN;
1283  }
1284  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1285  ni_usleep(NI_RETRY_INTERVAL_100US);
1286  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1287  }
1288  else
1289  {
1290  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info dec write query success, available buf "
1291  "size %u >= pkt size %u !\n",
1292  buf_info.buf_avail_size, packet_size);
1293  break;
1294  }
1295  }
1296 
1297  //Configure write size for the buffer
1298  retval = ni_config_instance_set_write_len(p_ctx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER,
1299  packet_size);
1300  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_config_xcoder_config_set_write_legth,
1301  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
1302  &(p_ctx->session_id));
1303  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
1304  if (retval < 0)
1305  {
1306  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): config pkt size command failed\n",
1307  __func__);
1308  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
1309  LRETURN;
1310  }
1311 
1312  ui32LBA = WRITE_INSTANCE_W(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
1313 
1314  //check for start of stream flag
1315  if (p_packet->start_of_stream)
1316  {
1317  retval = ni_config_instance_sos(p_ctx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
1318  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
1319  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
1320  &(p_ctx->session_id));
1321  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
1322  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
1323  {
1324  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Failed to send SOS.\n", __func__);
1325  LRETURN;
1326  }
1327 
1328  p_packet->start_of_stream = 0;
1329  }
1330 
1331  if (p_packet->p_data)
1332  {
1333  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
1334  "%s() had data to send: packet_size=%u, "
1335  "p_packet->sent_size=%d, p_packet->data_len=%u, "
1336  "p_packet->start_of_stream=%u, p_packet->end_of_stream=%u, "
1337  "p_packet->video_width=%u, p_packet->video_height=%u\n",
1338  __func__, packet_size, p_packet->sent_size, p_packet->data_len,
1339  p_packet->start_of_stream, p_packet->end_of_stream,
1340  p_packet->video_width, p_packet->video_height);
1341 
1342  uint32_t send_count = 0;
1343  uint8_t *p_data = (uint8_t *)p_packet->p_data;
1344  // Note: session status is NOT reset but tracked between send
1345  // and recv to catch and recover from a loop condition
1346  // p_ctx->status = 0;
1347 
1348  if (packet_size % NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) //packet size, already aligned
1349  {
1350  packet_size = ( (packet_size / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
1351  }
1352 
1353  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
1354  p_data, packet_size, ui32LBA);
1355  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_cmd_xcoder_write,
1356  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
1357  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
1358  if (retval < 0)
1359  {
1360  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): nvme command failed\n", __func__);
1361  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
1362  LRETURN;
1363  }
1364 
1365  // reset session status after successful send
1366  p_ctx->status = 0;
1367 
1368  sent_size = p_packet->data_len;
1369  p_packet->data_len = 0;
1370 
1371  if (p_param->dec_input_params.nb_save_pkt)
1372  {
1373  char dump_file[512] = {0};
1374  long curr_pkt_num =
1375  ((long)p_ctx->pkt_num % p_param->dec_input_params.nb_save_pkt) + 1;
1376  snprintf(dump_file, sizeof(dump_file), "%s/pkt-%04ld.bin",
1377  p_ctx->stream_dir_name, curr_pkt_num);
1378  FILE *f = fopen(dump_file, "wb");
1379  if (f)
1380  {
1381  fwrite(p_packet->p_data, sent_size, 1, f);
1382  fflush(f);
1383  fclose(f);
1384  }
1385  }
1386 
1387  p_ctx->pkt_num++;
1388  p_ctx->low_delay_sync_flag = 1;
1389  }
1390 
1391  //Handle end of stream flag
1392  if (p_packet->end_of_stream)
1393  {
1394  retval = ni_config_instance_eos(p_ctx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
1395  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
1396  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
1397  &(p_ctx->session_id));
1398  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
1399 
1400  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
1401  {
1402  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Failed to send EOS.\n", __func__);
1403  LRETURN;
1404  }
1405 
1406  p_packet->end_of_stream = 0;
1407  p_ctx->ready_to_close = 1;
1408  }
1409 
1410  if (p_ctx->is_dec_pkt_512_aligned)
1411  {
1412  // save NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT pts values and their corresponding number of 512 aligned data
1413  if (p_ctx->is_first_frame && (p_ctx->pkt_index != -1))
1414  {
1415  p_ctx->pts_offsets[p_ctx->pkt_index] = p_packet->pts;
1416  p_ctx->flags_array[p_ctx->pkt_index] = p_packet->flags;
1417  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[p_ctx->pkt_index] = current_pkt_size/512; // assuming packet_size is 512 aligned
1418  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
1419  "%s: pkt_index %d pkt_offsets_index %" PRIu64
1420  " pts_offsets %" PRId64 "\n",
1421  __func__, p_ctx->pkt_index,
1422  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[p_ctx->pkt_index],
1423  p_ctx->pts_offsets[p_ctx->pkt_index]);
1424  p_ctx->pkt_index ++;
1425  if (p_ctx->pkt_index >= NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT)
1426  {
1427  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
1428  "%s(): more than NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT frames are rejected by the "
1429  "decoder. Increase NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT is required or default "
1430  "gen pts values will be used !\n",
1431  __func__);
1432  p_ctx->pkt_index = -1; // signaling default pts gen
1433  }
1434  }
1435  }
1436  else
1437  {
1438  p_ctx->pts_offsets[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] = p_packet->pts;
1439  p_ctx->flags_array[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] = p_packet->flags;
1440  if (p_ctx->pkt_index == 0)
1441  {
1442  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] = 0;
1443  /* minus 1 here. ffmpeg parses the msb 0 of long start code as the last packet's payload for hevc bitstream (hevc_parse).
1444  * move 1 byte forward on all the pkt_offset so that frame_offset coming from fw can fall into the correct range. */
1445  //p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] = current_pkt_size - 1;
1446  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] = current_pkt_size;
1447  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
1448  "%s: (first packet) pkt_index %d i %u "
1449  "pkt_offsets_index_min %" PRIu64 " pkt_offsets_index %" PRIu64
1450  " pts_offsets %" PRId64 "\n",
1451  __func__, p_ctx->pkt_index, p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ,
1452  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ],
1453  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ],
1454  p_ctx->pts_offsets[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ]);
1455  }
1456  else
1457  {
1458  // cumulate sizes to correspond to FW offsets
1459  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] = p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[(p_ctx->pkt_index - 1) % NI_FIFO_SZ];
1460  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] = p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[(p_ctx->pkt_index - 1) % NI_FIFO_SZ] + current_pkt_size;
1461  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
1462  "%s: pkt_index %d i %u pkt_offsets_index_min "
1463  "%" PRIu64 " pkt_offsets_index %" PRIu64 " pts_offsets %" PRId64
1464  "\n",
1465  __func__, p_ctx->pkt_index, p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ,
1466  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ],
1467  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ],
1468  p_ctx->pts_offsets[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ]);
1469 
1470  //Wrapping 32 bits since FW send u32 wrapped values
1471  if (p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] > 0xFFFFFFFF)
1472  {
1473  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] = p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] - (0x100000000);
1474  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] = p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] + current_pkt_size;
1475  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
1476  "%s: (wrap) pkt_index %d i %u "
1477  "pkt_offsets_index_min %" PRIu64 " pkt_offsets_index %" PRIu64
1478  " pts_offsets %" PRId64 "\n",
1479  __func__, p_ctx->pkt_index, p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ,
1480  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ],
1481  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ],
1482  p_ctx->pts_offsets[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ]);
1483  }
1484  }
1485 
1486  /* if this wrap-around pkt_offset_index spot is about to be overwritten, free the previous one. */
1487  ni_aligned_free(p_ctx->pkt_custom_sei_set[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ]);
1488 
1489  if (p_packet->p_custom_sei_set)
1490  {
1491  p_ctx->pkt_custom_sei_set[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] = malloc(sizeof(ni_custom_sei_set_t));
1492  if (p_ctx->pkt_custom_sei_set[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ])
1493  {
1494  ni_custom_sei_set_t *p_custom_sei_set = p_ctx->pkt_custom_sei_set[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ];
1495  memcpy(p_custom_sei_set, p_packet->p_custom_sei_set, sizeof(ni_custom_sei_set_t));
1496  }
1497  else
1498  {
1499  /* warn and lose the sei data. */
1500  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
1501  "Error %s: failed to allocate custom SEI buffer for pkt.\n",
1502  __func__);
1503  }
1504  }
1505  else
1506  {
1507  p_ctx->pkt_custom_sei_set[p_ctx->pkt_index % NI_FIFO_SZ] = NULL;
1508  }
1509 
1510  p_ctx->pkt_index++;
1511  }
1512 
1513  retval = ni_timestamp_register(p_ctx->buffer_pool, p_ctx->dts_queue, p_packet->dts, 0);
1514  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
1515  {
1516  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
1517  "ERROR %s(): ni_timestamp_register() for dts returned %d\n",
1518  __func__, retval);
1519  }
1520 END:
1521 
1522  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1523 
1524  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS == retval)
1525  {
1526  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE,
1527  "%s(): exit: packets: %" PRIu64 " offset %" PRIx64 ""
1528  " sent_size = %u, status=%d\n",
1529  __func__, p_ctx->pkt_num, (uint64_t)p_packet->pos, sent_size,
1530  p_ctx->status);
1531  return sent_size;
1532  } else
1533  {
1534  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
1535  "ERROR %s(): exit: returnErr: %d, p_ctx->status: %d\n", __func__,
1536  retval, p_ctx->status);
1537  return retval;
1538  }
1539 }
1540 
1541 static int64_t guess_correct_pts(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, int64_t reordered_pts, int64_t dts)
1542 {
1543  int64_t pts = NI_NOPTS_VALUE;
1544  if (dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
1545  {
1546  p_ctx->pts_correction_num_faulty_dts += dts <= p_ctx->pts_correction_last_dts;
1547  p_ctx->pts_correction_last_dts = dts;
1548  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
1549  "%s: pts_correction_last_dts %" PRId64 " "
1550  "pts_correction_num_faulty_dts %d\n",
1551  __func__, p_ctx->pts_correction_last_dts,
1552  p_ctx->pts_correction_num_faulty_dts);
1553  }
1554  else if (reordered_pts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
1555  {
1556  p_ctx->pts_correction_last_dts = reordered_pts;
1557  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: pts_correction_last_dts %" PRId64 "\n", __func__,
1558  p_ctx->pts_correction_last_dts);
1559  }
1560  if (reordered_pts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
1561  {
1562  p_ctx->pts_correction_num_faulty_pts += reordered_pts <= p_ctx->pts_correction_last_pts;
1563  p_ctx->pts_correction_last_pts = reordered_pts;
1564  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
1565  "%s: pts_correction_last_pts %" PRId64 " "
1566  "pts_correction_num_faulty_pts %d\n",
1567  __func__, p_ctx->pts_correction_last_pts,
1568  p_ctx->pts_correction_num_faulty_pts);
1569  }
1570  else if (dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
1571  {
1572  p_ctx->pts_correction_last_pts = dts;
1573  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: pts_correction_last_pts %" PRId64 "\n", __func__,
1574  p_ctx->pts_correction_last_pts);
1575  }
1576  if ((p_ctx->pts_correction_num_faulty_pts<=p_ctx->pts_correction_num_faulty_dts || dts == NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
1577  && reordered_pts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
1578  {
1579  pts = reordered_pts;
1580  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: (reordered_pts) pts %" PRId64 "\n", __func__,
1581  pts);
1582  }
1583  else
1584  {
1585  if ((NI_NOPTS_VALUE == reordered_pts) ||
1586  (NI_NOPTS_VALUE == p_ctx->last_pts) || (dts >= p_ctx->last_pts))
1587  {
1588  pts = dts;
1589  } else
1590  {
1591  pts = reordered_pts;
1592  }
1593 
1594  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: (dts) pts %" PRId64 "\n", __func__, pts);
1595  }
1596  return pts;
1597 }
1598 
1599 static int rotated_array_binary_search(uint64_t *lefts, uint64_t *rights,
1600  int32_t size, uint64_t target)
1601 {
1602  int lo = 0;
1603  int hi = size - 1;
1604  while (lo <= hi)
1605  {
1606  int mid = lo + (hi - lo) / 2;
1607  if (lefts[mid] <= target && target < rights[mid])
1608  {
1609  return mid;
1610  }
1611 
1612  if (rights[mid] == 0)
1613  {
1614  // empty in (mid, hi)
1615  hi = mid - 1;
1616  continue;
1617  }
1618 
1619  if (rights[lo] <= rights[mid])
1620  {
1621  if (lefts[lo] <= target && target < lefts[mid])
1622  {
1623  // Elements are all monotonous in (lo, mid)
1624  hi = mid - 1;
1625  } else
1626  {
1627  // Rotation in (mid, hi)
1628  lo = mid + 1;
1629  }
1630  } else
1631  {
1632  if (rights[mid] <= target && target < rights[hi])
1633  {
1634  // Elements are all monotonous in (mid, hi)
1635  lo = mid + 1;
1636  } else
1637  {
1638  // Rotation in (lo, mid)
1639  hi = mid - 1;
1640  }
1641  }
1642  }
1643 
1644  return -1;
1645 }
1646 
1647 /*!******************************************************************************
1648  * \brief Retrieve a YUV p_frame from decoder
1649  *
1650  * \param
1651  *
1652  * \return
1653  *******************************************************************************/
1654 int ni_decoder_session_read(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_frame_t* p_frame)
1655 {
1656  ni_instance_mgr_stream_info_t data = { 0 };
1657  int rx_size = 0;
1658  uint64_t frame_offset = 0;
1659  uint16_t yuvW = 0;
1660  uint16_t yuvH = 0;
1661  uint8_t *p_data_buffer;
1662  int i = 0;
1663  int is_planar;
1664  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1665  int metadata_hdr_size = NI_FW_META_DATA_SZ - NI_MAX_NUM_OF_DECODER_OUTPUTS * sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t);
1666  int sei_size = 0;
1667  uint32_t total_bytes_to_read = 0;
1668  uint32_t read_size_bytes = 0;
1669  uint32_t actual_read_size = 0;
1670  int keep_processing = 1;
1671  ni_instance_buf_info_t buf_info = { 0 };
1672  ni_session_statistic_t sessionStatistic = {0};
1673 
1674  int query_retry = 0;
1675  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
1676  unsigned int bytes_read_so_far = 0;
1677  int query_type = INST_BUF_INFO_RW_READ;
1678  int low_delay_notify = 0;
1679 #ifdef MEASURE_LATENCY
1680  uint64_t abs_time_ns;
1681 #endif
1682 
1683  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
1684 
1685  if ((!p_ctx) || (!p_frame))
1686  {
1687  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: passed parameters are null!, return\n");
1688  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
1689  }
1690 
1691  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1692 
1693  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
1694  {
1695  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): xcoder instance id < 0, return\n",
1696  __func__);
1697  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
1698  LRETURN;
1699  }
1700 
1701  p_data_buffer = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer;
1702 
1703  // p_frame->p_data[] can be NULL before actual resolution is returned by
1704  // decoder and buffer pool is allocated, so no checking here.
1705  total_bytes_to_read = p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] +
1706  p_frame->data_len[2] + metadata_hdr_size;
1707  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Total bytes to read %u, low_delay %u\n",
1708  total_bytes_to_read, p_ctx->decoder_low_delay);
1709 
1710  if (p_ctx->decoder_low_delay > 0 && !p_ctx->ready_to_close)
1711  {
1712  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "frame_num = %" PRIu64 ", pkt_num = %" PRIu64 "\n",
1713  p_ctx->frame_num, p_ctx->pkt_num);
1714  if (p_ctx->frame_num >= p_ctx->pkt_num)
1715  {
1716  //nothing to query, leave
1717  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1718  LRETURN;
1719  }
1720  query_type = INST_BUF_INFO_RW_READ_BUSY;
1721  }
1722  for (;;)
1723  {
1724  query_sleep(p_ctx);
1725 
1726  query_retry++;
1727  if ((p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] > (uint8_t)'6') ||
1728  (p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] == (uint8_t)'6' &&
1729  p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MINOR_VER_IDX] >= (uint8_t)'5'))
1730  {
1731  retval = ni_query_session_statistic_info(p_ctx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER,
1732  &sessionStatistic);
1733  CHECK_ERR_RC3(p_ctx, retval, sessionStatistic,
1734  nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query, p_ctx->device_type,
1735  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
1736  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
1737 
1738  buf_info.buf_avail_size = sessionStatistic.ui32RdBufAvailSize;
1739  } else
1740  {
1741  retval = ni_query_instance_buf_info(p_ctx, query_type,
1742  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER, &buf_info);
1743  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
1744  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
1745  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
1746  }
1747 
1748  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info query buf_info.size = %u\n",
1749  buf_info.buf_avail_size);
1750 
1751  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
1752  {
1753  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Warning dec read query fail rc %d retry %d\n",
1754  retval, query_retry);
1755 
1756  if (query_retry >= 1000)
1757  {
1758  low_delay_notify = 1;
1759  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1760  LRETURN;
1761  }
1762  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1763  ni_usleep(NI_RETRY_INTERVAL_100US);
1764  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1765  }
1766  else if (buf_info.buf_avail_size == DP_IPC_PASSTHRU)
1767  {
1768  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): Bad available buffer size %u\n", __FUNCTION__, buf_info.buf_avail_size);
1769  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
1770  LRETURN;
1771  }
1772  else if (buf_info.buf_avail_size == metadata_hdr_size)
1773  {
1774  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info only metadata hdr is available, seq change?\n");
1775  total_bytes_to_read = metadata_hdr_size;
1776  break;
1777  }
1778  else if (0 == buf_info.buf_avail_size)
1779  {
1780  // query to see if it is eos now, if we have sent it
1781  if (p_ctx->ready_to_close)
1782  {
1783  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info dec query, ready_to_close %u, query eos\n",
1784  p_ctx->ready_to_close);
1785  retval = ni_query_stream_info(p_ctx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER, &data);
1786  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
1787  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
1788  &(p_ctx->session_id));
1789  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
1790 
1791  if (data.is_flushed ||
1792  query_retry >= NI_MAX_DEC_SESSION_READ_QUERY_EOS_RETRIES) // 15000 retries
1793  {
1794  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info eos reached: is_flushed %u try %d.\n",
1795  data.is_flushed, query_retry);
1796  if (query_retry >= NI_MAX_DEC_SESSION_READ_QUERY_EOS_RETRIES) //15000 retries
1797  {
1798  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "Info eos reached exceeding max retries: is_flushed %u try %d.\n",
1799  data.is_flushed, query_retry);
1800  }
1801  p_frame->end_of_stream = 1;
1802  low_delay_notify = 1;
1803  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1804  LRETURN;
1805  }
1806  else
1807  {
1808  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "Dec read available buf size == 0, query try %d,"
1809  " retrying ..\n", query_retry);
1810  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1811  ni_usleep(NI_RETRY_INTERVAL_200US); // 200 us
1812  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1813  continue;
1814  }
1815  }
1816 
1817  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "Dec read available buf size == 0. retry=%d, eos=%d"
1818  "\n", query_retry, p_frame->end_of_stream);
1819  if ((NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_WRITE_BUFFER_FULL == p_ctx->status ||
1820  (p_ctx->decoder_low_delay > 0 && p_ctx->frame_num < p_ctx->pkt_num)) &&
1821  query_retry < 1000 / 2)
1822  {
1823  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1824  ni_usleep(25);
1825  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1826  continue;
1827  } else
1828  {
1829  if(p_ctx->decoder_low_delay>0)
1830  {
1831  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Warning: low_delay mode non sequential input? Disabling LD\n");
1832  p_ctx->decoder_low_delay = -1;
1833  low_delay_notify = 1;
1834  }
1835  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Warning: dec read failed %d retries. rc=%d; eos=%d\n",
1836  query_retry, p_ctx->status, p_frame->end_of_stream);
1837 
1838  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Warning: dec read query failed %d retries. rc=%d"
1839  "\n", query_retry, retval);
1840  }
1841  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1842  LRETURN;
1843  }
1844  else
1845  {
1846  // We have to ensure there are adequate number of DTS for picture
1847  // reorder delay otherwise wait for more packets to be sent to decoder.
1848  ni_timestamp_table_t *p_dts_queue = p_ctx->dts_queue;
1849  if ((int)p_dts_queue->list.count < p_ctx->pic_reorder_delay + 1 &&
1850  !p_ctx->ready_to_close &&
1851  NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_WRITE_BUFFER_FULL != p_ctx->status)
1852  {
1853  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
1854  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
1855  "At least %d packets should be sent before reading the "
1856  "first frame!\n",
1857  p_ctx->pic_reorder_delay + 1);
1858  LRETURN;
1859  }
1860  // get actual YUV transfer size if this is the stream's very first read
1861  if (0 == p_ctx->active_video_width || 0 == p_ctx->active_video_height)
1862  {
1863  retval = ni_query_stream_info(p_ctx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER, &data);
1864  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
1865  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
1866  &(p_ctx->session_id));
1867  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
1868 
1869  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info dec YUV query, pic size %ux%u xfer frame size "
1870  "%ux%u frame-rate %u is_flushed %u\n",
1871  data.picture_width, data.picture_height,
1872  data.transfer_frame_stride, data.transfer_frame_height,
1873  data.frame_rate, data.is_flushed);
1874  p_ctx->active_video_width = data.transfer_frame_stride;
1875  p_ctx->active_video_height = data.transfer_frame_height;
1876  p_ctx->actual_video_width = data.picture_width;
1877  p_ctx->pixel_format = data.pix_format;
1878  is_planar = (p_ctx->pixel_format == NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P) ||
1879  (p_ctx->pixel_format == NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE);
1880  p_ctx->bit_depth_factor = ni_get_bitdepth_factor_from_pixfmt(p_ctx->pixel_format);
1881  //p_ctx->bit_depth_factor = data.transfer_frame_stride / data.picture_width;
1882  p_ctx->is_first_frame = 1;
1883 
1884  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info dec YUV, adjust frame size from %ux%u to "
1885  "%ux%u format = %d\n", p_frame->video_width, p_frame->video_height,
1886  p_ctx->active_video_width, p_ctx->active_video_height, p_ctx->pixel_format);
1887 
1888  ni_decoder_frame_buffer_free(p_frame);
1889 
1890  // set up decoder YUV frame buffer pool
1891  if (ni_dec_fme_buffer_pool_initialize(
1892  p_ctx, NI_DEC_FRAME_BUF_POOL_SIZE_INIT, p_ctx->actual_video_width,
1893  p_ctx->active_video_height,
1894  p_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264,
1895  p_ctx->bit_depth_factor))
1896  {
1897  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Cannot allocate fme buf pool.\n",
1898  __func__);
1899  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
1900 
1901  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1902  ni_decoder_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
1903 #ifdef XCODER_SELF_KILL_ERR
1904  // if need to terminate at such occasion when continuing is not
1905  // possible, trigger a codec closure
1906  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Terminating due to unable to allocate fme buf "
1907  "pool.\n");
1908  kill(getpid(), SIGTERM);
1909 #endif
1910  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1911  LRETURN;
1912  }
1913 
1914  retval = ni_decoder_frame_buffer_alloc(
1915  p_ctx->dec_fme_buf_pool, p_frame, 1, // get mem buffer
1916  p_ctx->actual_video_width, p_ctx->active_video_height,
1917  p_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264,
1918  p_ctx->bit_depth_factor, is_planar);
1919 
1920  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
1921  {
1922  LRETURN;
1923  }
1924  total_bytes_to_read = p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] +
1925  p_frame->data_len[2] + metadata_hdr_size;
1926  p_data_buffer = (uint8_t*) p_frame->p_buffer;
1927 
1928  // make sure we don't read more than available
1929  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info dec buf size: %u YUV frame + meta-hdr size: %u "
1930  "available: %u\n", p_frame->buffer_size,
1931  total_bytes_to_read, buf_info.buf_avail_size);
1932  }
1933  break;
1934  }
1935  }
1936 
1937  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "total_bytes_to_read %u max_nvme_io_size %u ylen %u cr len "
1938  "%u cb len %u hdr %d\n",
1939  total_bytes_to_read, p_ctx->max_nvme_io_size,
1940  p_frame->data_len[0], p_frame->data_len[1],
1941  p_frame->data_len[2], metadata_hdr_size);
1942 
1943  if (buf_info.buf_avail_size < total_bytes_to_read)
1944  {
1945  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
1946  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
1947  "ERROR %s() avaliable size(%u)"
1948  "less than needed (%u)\n",
1949  __func__, buf_info.buf_avail_size, total_bytes_to_read);
1950  abort();
1951  }
1952 
1953  read_size_bytes = buf_info.buf_avail_size;
1954  ui32LBA = READ_INSTANCE_R(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
1955  if (read_size_bytes % NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT)
1956  {
1957  read_size_bytes = ((read_size_bytes / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) *
1958  NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) +
1959  NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
1960  }
1961 
1962  retval = ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
1963  p_data_buffer, read_size_bytes, ui32LBA);
1964  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_cmd_xcoder_read, p_ctx->device_type,
1965  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
1966  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
1967  if (retval < 0)
1968  {
1969  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): nvme command failed\n", __func__);
1970  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
1971  LRETURN;
1972  } else
1973  {
1974  // command issued successfully, now exit
1975  ni_metadata_dec_frame_t *p_meta =
1976  (ni_metadata_dec_frame_t *)((uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer +
1977  p_frame->data_len[0] +
1978  p_frame->data_len[1] +
1979  p_frame->data_len[2]);
1980 
1981  if (buf_info.buf_avail_size != metadata_hdr_size)
1982  {
1983  low_delay_notify = 1;
1984  sei_size = p_meta->sei_size;
1985  }
1986  total_bytes_to_read = total_bytes_to_read + sei_size;
1987  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "decoder read success, size %d total_bytes_to_read "
1988  "include sei %u sei_size %d\n",
1989  retval, total_bytes_to_read, sei_size);
1990  }
1991 
1992  bytes_read_so_far = total_bytes_to_read ;
1993  // Note: session status is NOT reset but tracked between send
1994  // and recv to catch and recover from a loop condition
1995 
1996  rx_size = ni_create_frame(p_frame, bytes_read_so_far, &frame_offset, false);
1997  p_ctx->frame_pkt_offset = frame_offset;
1998 
1999  if (rx_size > 0)
2000  {
2001  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): s-state %d first_frame %d\n", __func__,
2002  p_ctx->session_run_state, p_ctx->is_first_frame);
2003  if (ni_timestamp_get_with_threshold(
2004  p_ctx->dts_queue, 0, (int64_t *)&p_frame->dts,
2005  XCODER_FRAME_OFFSET_DIFF_THRES, 0,
2006  p_ctx->buffer_pool) != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
2007  {
2008  if (p_ctx->last_dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE && !p_ctx->ready_to_close)
2009  {
2010  p_ctx->pic_reorder_delay++;
2011  p_frame->dts = p_ctx->last_dts + p_ctx->last_dts_interval;
2012  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Padding DTS: %" PRId64 "\n", p_frame->dts);
2013  } else
2014  {
2015  p_frame->dts = NI_NOPTS_VALUE;
2016  }
2017  }
2018 
2019  if (p_ctx->is_first_frame)
2020  {
2021  for (i = 0; i < p_ctx->pic_reorder_delay; i++)
2022  {
2023  if (p_ctx->last_pts == NI_NOPTS_VALUE &&
2024  p_ctx->last_dts == NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
2025  {
2026  // If the p_frame->pts is unknown in the very beginning we assume
2027  // p_frame->pts == 0 as well as DTS less than PTS by 1000 * 1/timebase
2028  if (p_frame->pts >= p_frame->dts &&
2029  p_frame->pts - p_frame->dts < 1000)
2030  {
2031  break;
2032  }
2033  }
2034 
2035  if (ni_timestamp_get_with_threshold(
2036  p_ctx->dts_queue, 0, (int64_t *)&p_frame->dts,
2037  XCODER_FRAME_OFFSET_DIFF_THRES,
2038  p_ctx->frame_num % 500 == 0,
2039  p_ctx->buffer_pool) != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
2040  {
2041  p_frame->dts = NI_NOPTS_VALUE;
2042  }
2043  }
2044  // Reset for DTS padding counting
2045  p_ctx->pic_reorder_delay = 0;
2046  }
2047  if (p_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_JPEG)//fw won't save frameoffset when decoding jpeg.
2048  {
2049  if (p_ctx->is_first_frame)
2050  {
2051  p_ctx->is_first_frame = 0;
2052  }
2053  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->pts_offsets[p_ctx->frame_num % NI_FIFO_SZ];
2054  p_frame->flags = p_ctx->flags_array[p_ctx->frame_num % NI_FIFO_SZ];
2055  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "p_frame->pts = %u, frame_num = %d, p_frame->dts = %u\n",
2056  p_frame->pts, p_ctx->frame_num, p_frame->dts);
2057  }
2058  else if (p_ctx->is_dec_pkt_512_aligned)
2059  {
2060  if (p_ctx->is_first_frame)
2061  {
2062  p_ctx->is_first_frame = 0;
2063 
2064  if (p_frame->dts == NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
2065  {
2066  p_frame->pts = NI_NOPTS_VALUE;
2067  }
2068  // if not a bitstream retrieve the pts of the frame corresponding to the first YUV output
2069  else if((p_ctx->pts_offsets[0] != NI_NOPTS_VALUE) && (p_ctx->pkt_index != -1))
2070  {
2071  ni_metadata_dec_frame_t* p_metadata =
2072  (ni_metadata_dec_frame_t*)((uint8_t*)p_frame->p_buffer +
2073  p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] +
2074  p_frame->data_len[2] + p_frame->data_len[3]);
2075  uint64_t num_fw_pkts =
2076  p_metadata->metadata_common.ui64_data.frame_offset / 512;
2077  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2078  "%s: num_fw_pkts %" PRIu64 " frame_offset %" PRIu64 "\n",
2079  __func__, num_fw_pkts,
2080  p_metadata->metadata_common.ui64_data.frame_offset);
2081  int idx = 0;
2082  uint64_t cumul = p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[0];
2083  bool bFound = (num_fw_pkts >= cumul);
2084  while (cumul < num_fw_pkts) // look for pts index
2085  {
2086  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: cumul %" PRIu64 "\n", __func__, cumul);
2087  if (idx == NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT)
2088  {
2089  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Invalid index computation > "
2090  "NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT!\n");
2091  break;
2092  } else
2093  {
2094  idx++;
2095  cumul += p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[idx];
2096  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2097  "%s: idx %d "
2098  "pkt_offsets_index[idx] %" PRIu64 "\n",
2099  __func__, idx, p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[idx]);
2100  }
2101  }
2102  //if ((idx != NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT) && (idx >= 0))
2103  if ((idx != NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT) && bFound)
2104  {
2105  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->pts_offsets[idx];
2106  p_frame->flags = p_ctx->flags_array[idx];
2107  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2108  "%s: (first frame) idx %d last_dts %" PRId64 ""
2109  "dts %" PRId64 " last_pts %" PRId64 " pts %" PRId64 "\n",
2110  __func__, idx, p_ctx->last_dts, p_frame->dts,
2111  p_ctx->last_pts, p_frame->pts);
2112  } else if ((idx != NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT) &&
2113  (p_ctx->session_run_state == SESSION_RUN_STATE_RESETTING))
2114  {
2115  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2116  "%s(): session %u recovering and "
2117  "adjusting ts.\n",
2118  __func__, p_ctx->session_id);
2119  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->pts_offsets[idx];
2120  p_frame->flags = p_ctx->flags_array[idx];
2121  p_ctx->session_run_state = SESSION_RUN_STATE_NORMAL;
2122  }
2123  else // use pts = 0 as offset
2124  {
2125  p_frame->pts = 0;
2126  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2127  "%s: (zero default) dts %" PRId64 " pts "
2128  "%" PRId64 "\n",
2129  __func__, p_frame->dts, p_frame->pts);
2130  }
2131  }
2132  else
2133  {
2134  p_frame->pts = 0;
2135  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2136  "%s: (not bitstream) dts %" PRId64 " pts "
2137  "%" PRId64 "\n",
2138  __func__, p_frame->dts, p_frame->pts);
2139  }
2140  }
2141  else
2142  {
2143  int64_t pts_delta = p_frame->dts - p_ctx->last_dts;
2144  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->last_pts + pts_delta;
2145 
2146  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2147  "%s: (!is_first_frame idx) last_dts %" PRId64 ""
2148  "dts %" PRId64 " pts_delta %" PRId64 " last_pts "
2149  "%" PRId64 " pts %" PRId64 "\n",
2150  __func__, p_ctx->last_dts, p_frame->dts, pts_delta,
2151  p_ctx->last_pts, p_frame->pts);
2152  }
2153  }
2154  else
2155  {
2156  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: frame_offset %" PRIu64 "\n", __func__,
2157  frame_offset);
2158  if (p_ctx->is_first_frame)
2159  {
2160  p_ctx->is_first_frame = 0;
2161  }
2162  // search for the pkt_offsets of received frame according to frame_offset.
2163  // here we get the index(i) which promises (p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[i] <= frame_offset && p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[i] > frame_offset)
2164  // i = -1 if not found
2165  i = rotated_array_binary_search(p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min,
2166  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index, NI_FIFO_SZ,
2167  frame_offset);
2168  if (i >= 0)
2169  {
2170  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->pts_offsets[i];
2171  p_frame->flags = p_ctx->flags_array[i];
2172  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2173  "%s: (found pts) dts %" PRId64 " pts "
2174  "%" PRId64 " frame_offset %" PRIu64 " i %d "
2175  "pkt_offsets_index_min %" PRIu64 " pkt_offsets_index "
2176  "%" PRIu64 "\n",
2177  __func__, p_frame->dts, p_frame->pts, frame_offset, i,
2178  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[i],
2179  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[i]);
2180 
2181  p_frame->p_custom_sei_set = p_ctx->pkt_custom_sei_set[i];
2182  p_ctx->pkt_custom_sei_set[i] = NULL;
2183  } else
2184  {
2185  //backup solution pts
2186  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->last_pts + (p_frame->dts - p_ctx->last_dts);
2187  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
2188  "ERROR: Frame pts %" PRId64 " not found for offset "
2189  "%" PRIu64 "\n", p_frame->pts, frame_offset);
2190  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2191  "%s: (not found use default) dts %" PRId64 " pts %" PRId64
2192  "\n",
2193  __func__, p_frame->dts, p_frame->pts);
2194  }
2195  }
2196  p_frame->pts = guess_correct_pts(p_ctx, p_frame->pts, p_frame->dts);
2197  p_ctx->last_pts = p_frame->pts;
2198  if (p_frame->dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE && p_ctx->last_dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
2199  p_ctx->last_dts_interval = p_frame->dts - p_ctx->last_dts;
2200  p_ctx->last_dts = p_frame->dts;
2201  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: (best_effort_timestamp) pts %" PRId64 "\n",
2202  __func__, p_frame->pts);
2203  p_ctx->frame_num++;
2204 
2205 #ifdef XCODER_DUMP_DATA
2206  char dump_file[256];
2207  snprintf(dump_file, sizeof(dump_file), "%ld-%u-dec-fme/fme-%04ld.yuv",
2208  (long)getpid(), p_ctx->session_id, (long)p_ctx->frame_num);
2209  FILE *f = fopen(dump_file, "wb");
2210  fwrite(p_frame->p_buffer,
2211  p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] + p_frame->data_len[2],
2212  1, f);
2213  fflush(f);
2214  fclose(f);
2215 #endif
2216  }
2217 
2218  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): received data: [0x%08x]\n", __func__, rx_size);
2219  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2220  "%s(): p_frame->start_of_stream=%u, "
2221  "p_frame->end_of_stream=%u, p_frame->video_width=%u, "
2222  "p_frame->video_height=%u\n",
2223  __func__, p_frame->start_of_stream, p_frame->end_of_stream,
2224  p_frame->video_width, p_frame->video_height);
2225  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): p_frame->data_len[0/1/2]=%u/%u/%u\n", __func__,
2226  p_frame->data_len[0], p_frame->data_len[1], p_frame->data_len[2]);
2227 
2228  if (p_ctx->frame_num % 500 == 0)
2229  {
2230  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
2231  "Decoder pts queue size = %u dts queue size = %u\n\n",
2232  p_ctx->pts_table->list.count, p_ctx->dts_queue->list.count);
2233  // scan and clean up
2234  ni_timestamp_scan_cleanup(p_ctx->pts_table, p_ctx->dts_queue,
2235  p_ctx->buffer_pool);
2236  }
2237 
2238 #ifdef MEASURE_LATENCY
2239  if ((p_frame->dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE) && (p_ctx->frame_time_q != NULL))
2240  {
2241  abs_time_ns = ni_gettime_ns();
2242  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "DTS:%lld,DELTA:%lu,dLAT:%lu;\n", p_frame->dts,
2243  abs_time_ns - p_ctx->prev_read_frame_time,
2244  ni_lat_meas_q_check_latency((ni_lat_meas_q_t *)p_ctx->frame_time_q,
2245  abs_time_ns, p_frame->dts));
2246  p_ctx->prev_read_frame_time = abs_time_ns;
2247  }
2248 #endif
2249 
2250 END:
2251 
2252  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
2253 
2254  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
2255  {
2256  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): bad exit, retval = %d\n", __func__, retval);
2257  if (retval == NI_RETCODE_ERROR_VPU_RECOVERY)
2258  {
2259  low_delay_signal(p_ctx);
2260  }
2261  return retval;
2262  } else
2263  {
2264  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit, rx_size = %d\n", __func__, rx_size);
2265  if (low_delay_notify)
2266  {
2267  low_delay_signal(p_ctx);
2268  }
2269  return rx_size;
2270  }
2271 }
2272 
2273 /*!******************************************************************************
2274  * \brief Query current xcoder status
2275  *
2276  * \param
2277  *
2278  * \return
2279  *******************************************************************************/
2280 int ni_xcoder_session_query(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
2281  ni_device_type_t device_type)
2282 {
2283  ni_instance_mgr_general_status_t data;
2284  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
2285 
2286  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): device_type %d:%s; enter\n", __func__,
2287  device_type, g_device_type_str[device_type]);
2288 
2289  if (!p_ctx)
2290  {
2291  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
2292  __func__);
2293  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
2294  LRETURN;
2295  }
2296 
2297 #if 1
2298  retval = ni_query_general_status(p_ctx, device_type, &data);
2299 #else
2300  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): query skipped\n", __func__);
2301 #endif
2302  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS == retval)
2303  {
2304  p_ctx->load_query.current_load = (uint32_t)data.process_load_percent;
2305  p_ctx->load_query.fw_model_load = (uint32_t)data.fw_model_load;
2306  p_ctx->load_query.total_contexts = (uint32_t)data.active_sub_instances_cnt;
2307  p_ctx->load_query.fw_video_mem_usage = (uint32_t)data.fw_video_mem_usage;
2308  p_ctx->load_query.fw_share_mem_usage = (uint32_t)data.fw_share_mem_usage;
2309  p_ctx->load_query.fw_p2p_mem_usage = (uint32_t)data.fw_p2p_mem_usage;
2310  p_ctx->load_query.active_hwuploaders =
2311  (uint32_t)data.active_hwupload_sub_inst_cnt;
2312  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s current_load:%u fw_model_load:%u "
2313  "total_contexts:%u fw_video_mem_usage:%u "
2314  "fw_share_mem_usage:%u fw_p2p_mem_usage:%u "
2315  "active_hwuploaders:%u\n", __func__,
2316  p_ctx->load_query.current_load, p_ctx->load_query.fw_model_load,
2317  p_ctx->load_query.total_contexts,
2318  p_ctx->load_query.fw_video_mem_usage,
2319  p_ctx->load_query.fw_share_mem_usage,
2320  p_ctx->load_query.fw_p2p_mem_usage,
2321  p_ctx->load_query.active_hwuploaders);
2322  }
2323 
2324 END:
2325 
2326  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
2327 
2328  return retval;
2329 }
2330 
2331 /*!******************************************************************************
2332  * \brief Open a xcoder encoder instance
2333  *
2334  * \param
2335  *
2336  * \return
2337  *******************************************************************************/
2338 
2339 ni_retcode_t ni_encoder_session_open(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx)
2340 {
