4585  * \brief Query a particular session to get the stats info
4586  *
4587  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
4588  * \param ni_device_type_t device_type - xcoder type Encoder or Decoder
4589  * \param ni_session_stats_t *out - Struct preallocated from the
4590  * caller where the resulting data will be placed
4591  *
4592  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION,
4593  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC or NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
4594  * on failure
4595  ******************************************************************************/
4596 ni_retcode_t ni_query_session_stats(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
4597  ni_device_type_t device_type,
4598  ni_session_stats_t *p_session_stats, int rc,
4599  int opcode)
4600 {
4601  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
4602  void* p_buffer = NULL;
4603  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
4604  uint32_t dataLen = ((sizeof(ni_session_stats_t) + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
4605 
4606  ni_device_type_t xc_device_type =
4607  (device_type != NI_DEVICE_TYPE_UPLOAD ? device_type :
4608  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
4609 
4610  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
4611 
4612  if ((!p_ctx) || (!p_session_stats))
4613  {
4614  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
4615  __func__);
4616  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
4617  LRETURN;
4618  }
4619 
4620  if (!IS_XCODER_DEVICE_TYPE(xc_device_type))
4621  {
4622  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown device type %d, return\n",
4623  __func__, device_type);
4624  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
4625  LRETURN;
4626  }
4627 
4628  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
4629  {
4630  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
4631  __func__);
4632  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
4633  LRETURN;
4634  }
4635 
4636  ui32LBA = QUERY_SESSION_STATS_R(p_ctx->session_id, xc_device_type);
4637 
4638  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), dataLen))
4639  {
4640  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
4641  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
4642  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
4643  LRETURN;
4644  }
4645  memset(p_buffer, 0, dataLen);
4646 
4647  // Set session ID to be invalid. In case, the last command fails because the invalid session ID was submitted
4648  // with the command, the session id would remain invalid.
4649  // If the last command is processed successfully in session manager, the session id would become valid.
4650  ((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui16SessionId =
4651  (uint16_t)NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
4652 
4653  if (ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle, p_buffer, dataLen, ui32LBA)
4654  < 0)
4655  {
4656  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): read command Failed\n", __func__);
4657  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
4658  LRETURN;
4659  }
4660 
4661  memcpy((void*)p_session_stats, p_buffer, sizeof(ni_session_stats_t));
4662 
4663  // flip the bytes to host order
4664  // all query commands are guaranteed success once a session is opened
4665  p_session_stats->ui16SessionId = ni_htons(p_session_stats->ui16SessionId);
4666  p_session_stats->ui16ErrorCount = ni_htons(p_session_stats->ui16ErrorCount);
4667  p_session_stats->ui32LastTransactionId =
4668  ni_htonl(p_session_stats->ui32LastTransactionId);
4669  p_session_stats->ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus =
4670  ni_htonl(p_session_stats->ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus);
4671  p_session_stats->ui32LastErrorTransactionId = ni_htonl(p_session_stats->ui32LastErrorTransactionId);
4672  p_session_stats->ui32LastErrorStatus = ni_htonl(p_session_stats->ui32LastErrorStatus);
4673  p_session_stats->ui64Session_timestamp =
4674  ni_htonll(p_session_stats->ui64Session_timestamp);
4675 
4676  // get the session timestamp when open session
4677  // check the timestamp during transcoding
4678  if ((p_ctx->session_timestamp != p_session_stats->ui64Session_timestamp) &&
4679  (ni_xcoder_resource_recovery != p_session_stats->ui32LastErrorStatus))
4680  // if VPU recovery, the session timestamp will be reset.
4681  {
4682  p_session_stats->ui32LastErrorStatus =
4683  NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_RESOURCE_UNAVAILABLE;
4684  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "instance id invalid:%u, timestamp:%" PRIu64
4685  ", query timestamp:%" PRIu64 "\n",
4686  p_ctx->session_id, p_ctx->session_timestamp,
4687  p_session_stats->ui64Session_timestamp);
4688  }
4689 
4690  // check rc here, if rc != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS, it means that last read/write command failed
4691  // failures may be link layer errors, such as physical link errors or ERROR_WRITE_PROTECT in windows.
4692  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != rc)
4693  {
4694  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s():last command Failed: rc %d\n", __func__, rc);
4695  p_session_stats->ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus =
4696  NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
4697  p_session_stats->ui32LastErrorStatus = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
4698  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
4699  } else if (p_ctx->session_id != p_session_stats->ui16SessionId)
4700  {
4701  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
4702  "%s():last command Failed because "
4703  "session ID 0x%x is invalid\n",
4704  __func__, p_ctx->session_id);
4705  p_session_stats->ui32LastErrorStatus = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
4706 
4707  // Mark session id to INVALID so that all commands afterward are blocked
4708  p_ctx->session_id = NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
4709  } else
4710  {
4711  // Acknowledge the total error count here
4712  p_ctx->rc_error_count = p_session_stats->ui16ErrorCount;
4713  }
4714 
4715  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): error count %u last rc 0x%x inst_err_no 0x%x\n",
4716  __func__, p_session_stats->ui16ErrorCount,
4717  p_session_stats->ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus,
4718  p_session_stats->ui32LastErrorStatus);
4719 
4720 END:
4721 
4722  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
4723  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
4724 
4725  return retval;
4726 }
4727 
4728 /*!******************************************************************************
4729  * \brief Query a particular xcoder instance to get End of Output data
4730  *
4731  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
4732  * \param ni_device_type_t device_type - xcoder type Encoder or Decoder
4733  * \param InstMgrStreamComp *out - Struct preallocated from the caller where the
4734  * resulting data will be placed
4735  *
4736  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
4737  * or NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on failure
4738  *******************************************************************************/
4739 int ni_query_eos(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_device_type_t device_type, ni_instance_mgr_stream_complete_t* p_stream_complete)
4740 {
4741  void* p_buffer = NULL;
4742  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
4743  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
4744  uint32_t dataLen = ((sizeof(ni_instance_mgr_stream_complete_t) + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
4745 
4746  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
4747 
4748  if (!p_ctx || !p_stream_complete)
4749  {
4750  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
4751  __func__);
4752  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
4753  LRETURN;
4754  }
4755 
4756  if (! (NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER == device_type ||
4757  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER == device_type))
4758  {
4759  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown device type %d, return\n",
4760  __func__, device_type);
4761  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
4762  LRETURN;
4763  }
4764 
4765  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
4766  {
4767  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
4768  __func__);
4769  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
4770  LRETURN;
4771  }
4772 
4773  ui32LBA = QUERY_INSTANCE_EOS_R(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
4774 
4775  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), dataLen))
4776  {
4777  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: Cannot allocate buffer.\n");
4778  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
4779  LRETURN;
4780  }
4781 
4782  memset(p_buffer, 0, dataLen);
4783 
4784  if (ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle, p_buffer, dataLen, ui32LBA) < 0)
4785  {
4786  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
4787  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
4788  LRETURN;
4789  }
4790 
4791  memcpy((void*)p_stream_complete, p_buffer, sizeof(ni_instance_mgr_stream_complete_t));
4792 
4793  //flip the bytes to host order
4794  p_stream_complete->is_flushed = ni_htons(p_stream_complete->is_flushed);
4795 
4796 END:
4797 
4798  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
4799  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
4800 
4801  return retval;
4802 }
4803 
4804 /*!*****************************************************************************
4805  * \brief Query a particular xcoder session to get session statistics
4806  *
4807  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
4808  * \param ni_device_type_t device_type - xcoder type Encoder or Decoder
4809  * \param ni_session_statistic_t*out - Struct preallocated from the caller
4810  * where the resulting data will be placed
4811  *
4812  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION,
4813  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC or NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on
4814  * failure
4815  ******************************************************************************/
4816 ni_retcode_t
4817 ni_query_session_statistic_info(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
4818  ni_device_type_t device_type,
4819  ni_session_statistic_t *p_session_statistic)
4820 {
4821  void *p_buffer = NULL;
4822  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
4823  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
4824  uint32_t dataLen =
4825  ((sizeof(ni_session_statistic_t) + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) /
4826  NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) *
4827  NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
4828 
4829  //requires API version >= 65
4830  if ((p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] < (uint8_t)'6') ||
4831  (p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] == (uint8_t)'6' &&
4832  p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MINOR_VER_IDX] < (uint8_t)'5'))
4833  {
4834  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
4835  "Error: %s function not supported in FW API version %c%c\n",
4836  __func__,
4837  (char)p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX],
4838  (char)p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MINOR_VER_IDX]);
4839  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_FW_VERSION;
4840  }
4841 
4842  if (!p_ctx || !p_session_statistic)
4843  {
4844  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
4845  "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n", __func__);
4846  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
4847  LRETURN;
4848  }
4849 
4850  if (!(NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER == device_type ||
4851  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER == device_type))
4852  {
4853  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown device type %d, return\n",
4854  __func__, device_type);
4855  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
4856  LRETURN;
4857  }
4858 
4859  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
4860  {
4861  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
4862  __func__);
4863  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
4864  LRETURN;
4865  }
4866 
4867  ui32LBA = QUERY_INSTANCE_CUR_STATUS_INFO_R(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
4868 
4869  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), dataLen))
4870  {
4871  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
4872  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
4873  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
4874  LRETURN;
4875  }
4876  memset(p_buffer, 0, dataLen);
4877 
4878  // Set session ID to be invalid. In case, the last command fails because the invalid session ID was submitted
4879  // with the command, the session id would remain invalid.
4880  // If the Last command is processed successfully in session manager, the session id would become valid.
4881  ((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui16SessionId =
4882  (uint16_t)NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
4883 
4884  if (ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
4885  p_buffer, dataLen, ui32LBA) < 0)
4886  {
4887  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
4888  p_session_statistic->ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus =
4889  NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
4890  p_session_statistic->ui32LastErrorStatus =
4891  NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
4892  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
4893  LRETURN;
4894  }
4895 
4896  memcpy((void *)p_session_statistic, p_buffer,
4897  sizeof(ni_session_statistic_t));
4898 
4899  //flip the bytes to host order
4900  p_session_statistic->ui32RdBufAvailSize =
4901  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32RdBufAvailSize);
4902  p_session_statistic->ui32WrBufAvailSize =
4903  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32WrBufAvailSize);
4904 
4905  p_session_statistic->ui32FramesInput =
4906  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32FramesInput);
4907  p_session_statistic->ui32FramesBuffered =
4908  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32FramesBuffered);
4909  p_session_statistic->ui32FramesCompleted =
4910  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32FramesCompleted);
4911  p_session_statistic->ui32FramesOutput =
4912  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32FramesOutput);
4913  p_session_statistic->ui32FramesDropped =
4914  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32FramesDropped);
4915  p_session_statistic->ui32InstErrors =
4916  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32InstErrors);
4917 
4918  p_session_statistic->ui16SessionId =
4919  ni_htons(p_session_statistic->ui16SessionId);
4920  p_session_statistic->ui16ErrorCount =
4921  ni_htons(p_session_statistic->ui16ErrorCount);
4922  p_session_statistic->ui32LastTransactionId =
4923  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32LastTransactionId);
4924  p_session_statistic->ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus =
4925  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus);
4926  p_session_statistic->ui32LastErrorTransactionId =
4927  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32LastErrorTransactionId);
4928  p_session_statistic->ui32LastErrorStatus =
4929  ni_htonl(p_session_statistic->ui32LastErrorStatus);
4930  p_session_statistic->ui64Session_timestamp =
4931  ni_htonll(p_session_statistic->ui64Session_timestamp);
4932 
4933  if (p_ctx->session_id != p_session_statistic->ui16SessionId)
4934  {
4935  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
4936  "%s(): last command Failed because "
4937  "session ID 0x%x is invalid ui16SessionId 0x%x w_r <%u %u>\n",
4938  __func__, p_ctx->session_id, p_session_statistic->ui16SessionId,
4939  p_session_statistic->ui32WrBufAvailSize,
4940  p_session_statistic->ui32RdBufAvailSize);
4941  p_session_statistic->ui32LastErrorStatus =
4942  NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
4943  //Mark session id to INVALID so that all commands afterward are blocked
4944  p_ctx->session_id = NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
4945  } else
4946  {
4947  //Acknowledge that total error count here
4948  }
4949 
4950  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): error count %u last rc 0x%x inst_err_no 0x%x\n",
4951  __func__, p_session_statistic->ui16ErrorCount,
4952  p_session_statistic->ui32LastTransactionCompletionStatus,
4953  p_session_statistic->ui32LastErrorStatus);
4954 
4955  p_ctx->session_statistic = *p_session_statistic;
4956 
4957 END:
4958  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
4959  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s():exit\n", __func__);
4960 
4961  return retval;
4962 }
4963 /*!*****************************************************************************
4964  * \brief Query a particular xcoder instance to get buffer/data Info data
4965  *
4966  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
4967  * \param ni_instance_buf_info_rw_type_t rw_type
4968  * \param ni_device_type_t device_type - xcoder type Encoder or Decoder
4969  * \param ni_instance_buf_info_t *out - Struct preallocated from the caller
4970  * where the resulting data will be placed
4971  *
4972  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION,
4973  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC or NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on
4974  * failure
4975  ******************************************************************************/
4976 ni_retcode_t ni_query_instance_buf_info(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
4977  ni_instance_buf_info_rw_type_t rw_type,
4978  ni_device_type_t device_type,
4979  ni_instance_buf_info_t *p_inst_buf_info)
4980 {
4981  void* p_buffer = NULL;
4982  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
4983  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
4984  uint32_t dataLen =
4985  ((sizeof(ni_instance_buf_info_t) + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) /
4986  NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) *
4987  NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
4988 
4989  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
4990 
4991  if (!p_ctx || !p_inst_buf_info)
4992  {
4993  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
4994  __func__);
4995  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
4996  LRETURN;
4997  }
4998 
4999  if (!(NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER == device_type ||
5000  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER == device_type ||
5001  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER == device_type ||
5002  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI == device_type))
5003  {
5004  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown device type %d, return\n",
5005  __func__, device_type);
5006  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5007  LRETURN;
5008  }
5009 
5010  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
5011  {
5012  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
5013  __func__);
5014  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
5015  LRETURN;
5016  }
5017 
5018  if (INST_BUF_INFO_RW_READ == rw_type)
5019  {
5020  ui32LBA = QUERY_INSTANCE_RBUFF_SIZE_R(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5021  }
5022  else if (INST_BUF_INFO_RW_WRITE == rw_type)
5023  {
5024  ui32LBA = QUERY_INSTANCE_WBUFF_SIZE_R(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5025  }
5026  else if(INST_BUF_INFO_RW_WRITE_BY_EP == rw_type)
5027  {
5028  if ((p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] >= (uint8_t)'6' &&
5029  p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MINOR_VER_IDX] >= (uint8_t)'5') ||
5030  (p_ctx->fw_rev[NI_XCODER_REVISION_API_MAJOR_VER_IDX] >= (uint8_t)'7'))
5031  {
5032  ui32LBA = QUERY_INSTANCE_WBUFF_SIZE_R_BY_EP(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5033  }
5034  else
5035  {
5036  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_FW_VERSION;
5037  LRETURN;
5038  }
5039  }
5040  else if (INST_BUF_INFO_RW_UPLOAD == rw_type)
5041  {
5042  ui32LBA = QUERY_INSTANCE_UPLOAD_ID_R(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5043  } else if (INST_BUF_INFO_R_ACQUIRE == rw_type)
5044  {
5045  ui32LBA = QUERY_INSTANCE_ACQUIRE_BUF(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5046  } else if (INST_BUF_INFO_RW_READ_BUSY == rw_type)
5047  {
5048  ui32LBA =
5049  QUERY_INSTANCE_RBUFF_SIZE_BUSY_R(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5050  } else if (INST_BUF_INFO_RW_WRITE_BUSY == rw_type)
5051  {
5052  ui32LBA =
5053  QUERY_INSTANCE_WBUFF_SIZE_BUSY_R(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5054  } else
5055  {
5056  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown query type %d, return\n",
5057  __func__, rw_type);
5058  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5059  LRETURN;
5060  }
5061 
5062  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), dataLen))
5063  {
5064  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
5065  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
5066  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
5067  LRETURN;
5068  }
5069 
5070  memset(p_buffer, 0, dataLen);
5071 
5072  if (ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle, p_buffer, dataLen, ui32LBA) < 0)
5073  {
5074  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
5075  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
5076  LRETURN;
5077  }
5078 
5079  memcpy((void*)p_inst_buf_info, p_buffer, sizeof(ni_instance_buf_info_t));
5080 
5081  p_inst_buf_info->buf_avail_size = ni_htonl(p_inst_buf_info->buf_avail_size);
5082 
5083 END:
5084 
5085  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
5086  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
5087 
5088  return retval;
5089 }
5090 
5091 /*!*****************************************************************************
5092  * \brief Configure the read/write pipe for a session to control its behavior
5093  *
5094  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
5095  * \param ni_session_config_rw_t rw_type
5096  * \param ni_device_type_t device_type - xcoder type Encoder or Decoder
5097  * \param uint8_t enable
5098  * \param uint8_t hw_action
5099  * \param uint16_t frame_id
5100  *
5101  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION,
5102  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC or NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on
5103  * failure
5104  ******************************************************************************/
5105 ni_retcode_t ni_config_session_rw(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
5106  ni_session_config_rw_type_t rw_type,
5107  uint8_t enable, uint8_t hw_action,
5108  uint16_t frame_id)
5109 {
5110  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
5111  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
5112  void * p_buffer = NULL;
5113  uint32_t buffer_size = 0;
5114  ni_session_config_rw_t * rw_config = NULL;
5115 
5116  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
5117 
5118  if (!p_ctx)
5119  {
5120  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
5121  __func__);
5122  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5123  LRETURN;
5124  }
5125 
5126  if (!((SESSION_READ_CONFIG == rw_type) || (SESSION_WRITE_CONFIG == rw_type)))
5127  {
5128  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown config type %d, return\n",
5129  __func__, rw_type);
5130  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5131  LRETURN;
5132  }
5133 
5134  buffer_size = ((sizeof(ni_session_config_rw_t) + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
5135  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
5136  {
5137  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
5138  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
5139  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
5140  LRETURN;
5141  }
5142  memset(p_buffer, 0, buffer_size);
5143  rw_config = (ni_session_config_rw_t *)p_buffer;
5144  rw_config->ui8Enable = enable;
5145  rw_config->ui8HWAccess = hw_action;
5146  switch(rw_type)
5147  {
5148  case SESSION_READ_CONFIG:
5149  rw_config->uHWAccessField.ui16ReadFrameId = frame_id;
5150  break;
5151  case SESSION_WRITE_CONFIG:
5152  rw_config->uHWAccessField.ui16WriteFrameId = frame_id;
5153  break;
5154  default:
5155  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown config type %d, return\n",
5156  __func__, rw_type);
5157  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5158  LRETURN;
5159  }
5160 
5161  switch(rw_type)
5162  {
5163  case SESSION_READ_CONFIG:
5164  ui32LBA = CONFIG_SESSION_Read_W(p_ctx->session_id);
5165  break;
5166  case SESSION_WRITE_CONFIG:
5167  ui32LBA = CONFIG_SESSION_Write_W(p_ctx->session_id);
5168  break;
5169  default:
5170  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown config type %d, return\n",
5171  __func__, rw_type);
5172  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5173  LRETURN;
5174  }
5175  if (ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle, p_buffer, buffer_size, ui32LBA) < 0)
5176  {
5177  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
5178  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
5179  LRETURN;
5180  }
5181 
5182 END:
5183 
5184  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
5185  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
5186 
5187  return retval;
5188 }
5189 
5190 /*!******************************************************************************
5191  * \brief Send a p_config command for Start Of Stream
5192  *
5193  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
5194  * \param ni_device_type_t device_type - xcoder type Encoder or Decoder
5195  *
5196  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION. NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on failure
5197  *******************************************************************************/
5198 ni_retcode_t ni_config_instance_sos(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_device_type_t device_type)
5199 {
5200  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
5201  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
5202 
5203  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
5204 
5205  if (!p_ctx)
5206  {
5207  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
5208  __func__);
5209  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5210  LRETURN;
5211  }
5212 
5213  if (! (NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER == device_type ||
5214  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER == device_type))
5215  {
5216  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown device type %d, return\n",
5217  __func__, device_type);
5218  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5219  LRETURN;
5220  }
5221 
5222  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
5223  {
5224  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
5225  __func__);
5226  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
5227  LRETURN;
5228  }
5229 
5230  ui32LBA = CONFIG_INSTANCE_SetSOS_W(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5231 
5232  if (ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle, p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA) < 0)
5233  {
5234  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
5235  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
5236  }
5237 
5238 END:
5239 
5240  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
5241  return retval;
5242 }
5243 
5244 /*!******************************************************************************
5245  * \brief Send a p_config command for End Of Stream
5246  *
5247  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
5248  * \param ni_device_type_t device_type - xcoder type Encoder or Decoder
5249  *
5250  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on failure
5251  *******************************************************************************/
5252 ni_retcode_t ni_config_instance_eos(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_device_type_t device_type)
5253 {
5254  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
5255  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
5256 
5257  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
5258 
5259  if (!p_ctx)
5260  {
5261  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
5262  __func__);
5263  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5264  LRETURN;
5265  }
5266 
5267  if (! (NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER == device_type ||
5268  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER == device_type))
5269  {
5270  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown device type %d, return\n",
5271  __func__, device_type);
5272  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5273  LRETURN;
5274  }
5275 
5276  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
5277  {
5278  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
5279  __func__);
5280  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
5281  LRETURN;
5282  }
5283 
5284  ui32LBA = CONFIG_INSTANCE_SetEOS_W(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5285 
5286  if (ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle, p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA) < 0)
5287  {
5288  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
5289  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
5290  }
5291 
5292 END:
5293 
5294  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
5295 
5296  return retval;
5297 }
5298 
5299 /*!******************************************************************************
5300  * \brief Send a p_config command to flush the stream
5301  *
5302  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
5303  * \param ni_device_type_t device_type - xcoder type Encoder or Decoder
5304  *
5305  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on failure
5306  *******************************************************************************/
5307 ni_retcode_t xcoder_config_instance_flush(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_device_type_t device_type)
5308 {
5309  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
5310  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
5311 
5312  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
5313 
5314  if (!p_ctx)
5315  {
5316  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
5317  __func__);
5318  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5319  LRETURN;
5320  }
5321 
5322  if (! (NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER == device_type ||
5323  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER == device_type))
5324  {
5325  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown device type %d, return\n",
5326  __func__, device_type);
5327  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5328  LRETURN;
5329  }
5330 
5331  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
5332  {
5333  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
5334  __func__);
5335  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
5336  LRETURN;
5337  }
5338 
5339  ui32LBA = CONFIG_INSTANCE_Flush_W(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5340  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
5341  p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN,
5342  ui32LBA);
5343  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
5344  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
5345  &(p_ctx->session_id));
5346  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
5347 
5348  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
5349  {
5350  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
5351  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
5352  }
5353 
5354 END:
5355 
5356  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
5357 
5358  return retval;
5359 }
5360 
5361 /*!******************************************************************************
5362  * \brief Send a p_config command to set the length for the incoming write packet
5363  *
5364  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
5365  * \param ni_device_type_t device_type - xcoder type Encoder or Decoder
5366  * \param
5367  *
5368  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on failure
5369  *******************************************************************************/
5370 ni_retcode_t ni_config_instance_set_write_len(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_device_type_t device_type, uint32_t len)
5371 {
5372  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
5373  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
5374  void * p_buffer = NULL;
5375  uint32_t buffer_size = 0;
5376 
5377  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
5378 
5379  if (!p_ctx)
5380  {
5381  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
5382  __func__);
5383  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5384  LRETURN;
5385  }
5386 
5387  if (!(NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER == device_type ||
5388  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER == device_type))
5389  {
5390  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Unknown device type %d, return\n",
5391  __func__, device_type);
5392  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5393  LRETURN;
5394  }
5395 
5396  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
5397  {
5398  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
5399  __func__);
5400  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
5401  LRETURN;
5402  }
5403 
5404  buffer_size = ((sizeof(len) + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
5405  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
5406  {
5407  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
5408  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
5409  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
5410  LRETURN;
5411  }
5412  memset(p_buffer, 0, buffer_size);
5413  memcpy(p_buffer, &len, sizeof(len));
5414 
5415  ui32LBA = CONFIG_INSTANCE_SetPktSize_W(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5416 
5417  if (ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle, p_buffer, buffer_size, ui32LBA) < 0)
5418  {
5419  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
5420  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
5421  }
5422 
5423 END:
5424 
5425  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
5426  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
5427 
5428  return retval;
5429 }
5430 
5431 /*!******************************************************************************
5432  * \brief Send a p_config command to inform encoder sequence change
5433  *
5434  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
5435  * \param ni_device_type_t device_type - xcoder type Encoder or Decoder
5436  * \param ni_resolution_t p_resolution - sequence change resolution
5437  *
5438  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on failure
5439  *******************************************************************************/
5440 ni_retcode_t ni_config_instance_set_sequence_change(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_device_type_t device_type, ni_resolution_t *p_resolution)
5441 {
5442  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
5443  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
5444  void * p_buffer = NULL;
5445  uint32_t buffer_size = 0;
5446 
5447  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
5448 
5449  if (!p_ctx)
5450  {
5451  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
5452  __func__);
5453  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5454  LRETURN;
5455  }
5456 
5457  if (!(NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER == device_type))
5458  {
5459  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: Seq Change not supported for device type %d, return\n", device_type);
5460  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5461  LRETURN;
5462  }
5463 
5464  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
5465  {
5466  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
5467  __func__);
5468  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
5469  LRETURN;
5470  }
5471 
5472  buffer_size = ((sizeof(ni_resolution_t) + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
5473  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
5474  {
5475  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
5476  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
5477  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
5478  LRETURN;
5479  }
5480  memset(p_buffer, 0, buffer_size);
5481  memcpy(p_buffer, p_resolution, sizeof(ni_resolution_t));
5482 
5483  ui32LBA = CONFIG_INSTANCE_SetSeqChange_W(p_ctx->session_id, device_type);
5484 
5485  if (ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle, p_buffer, buffer_size, ui32LBA) < 0)
5486  {
5487  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
5488  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
5489  }
5490 
5491 END:
5492 
5493  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
5494  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
5495 
5496  return retval;
5497 }
5498 
5499 /*!******************************************************************************
5500  * \brief Send a p_config command to configure encoding parameters.
5501  *
5502  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
5503  *
5504  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on failure
5505  *******************************************************************************/
5506 ni_retcode_t ni_config_instance_set_encoder_params(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx)
5507 {
5508  void* p_encoder_config = NULL;
5509  ni_encoder_config_t* p_cfg = NULL;
5510  uint32_t buffer_size = sizeof(ni_encoder_config_t);
5511  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
5512  int i = 0;
5513  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
5514  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
5515 
5516  if (!p_ctx)
5517  {
5518  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
5519  __func__);
5520  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5521  LRETURN;
5522  }
5523 
5524  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
5525  {
5526  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
5527  __func__);
5528  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
5529  LRETURN;
5530  }
5531 
5532  buffer_size = ((buffer_size + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
5533  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_encoder_config, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
5534  {
5535  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
5536  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
5537  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
5538  LRETURN;
5539  }
5540  memset(p_encoder_config, 0, buffer_size);
5541 
5542  ni_set_custom_template(p_ctx, p_encoder_config, p_ctx->p_session_config);
5543  retval = ni_validate_custom_template(p_ctx, p_encoder_config, p_ctx->p_session_config, p_ctx->param_err_msg, sizeof(p_ctx->param_err_msg));
5544  if (NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN == retval)
5545  {
5546  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "WARNING: ni_validate_custom_template() . %s\n", p_ctx->param_err_msg);
5547  fflush(stdout);
5548  }
5549  else if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
5550  {
5551  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: ni_validate_custom_template() failed. %s\n", p_ctx->param_err_msg);
5552  fflush(stdout);
5553  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5554  LRETURN;
5555  }
5556  //configure the session here
5557  ui32LBA = CONFIG_INSTANCE_SetEncPara_W(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
5558 
5559  //Flip the bytes!! any param 16bits in size need ni_htons, 32bit need ni_htonl
5560  p_cfg = (ni_encoder_config_t*)p_encoder_config;
5561  p_cfg->i32picWidth = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32picWidth);
5562  p_cfg->i32picHeight = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32picHeight);
5563  p_cfg->i32meBlkMode = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32meBlkMode);
5564  p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo);
5565  p_cfg->i32vbvBufferSize = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32vbvBufferSize);
5566  p_cfg->i32userQpMax = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32userQpMax);
5567  p_cfg->i32maxIntraSize = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32maxIntraSize);
5568  p_cfg->i32userMaxDeltaQp = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32userMaxDeltaQp);
5569  p_cfg->i32userMinDeltaQp = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32userMinDeltaQp);
5570  p_cfg->i32userQpMin = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32userQpMin);
5571  p_cfg->i32bitRate = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32bitRate);
5572  p_cfg->i32bitRateBL = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32bitRateBL);
5573  p_cfg->i32srcBitDepth = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32srcBitDepth);
5574  p_cfg->hdrEnableVUI = ni_htonl(p_cfg->hdrEnableVUI);
5575  p_cfg->ui32VuiDataSizeBits = ni_htonl(p_cfg->ui32VuiDataSizeBits);
5576  p_cfg->ui32VuiDataSizeBytes = ni_htonl(p_cfg->ui32VuiDataSizeBytes);
5577  p_cfg->i32hwframes = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32hwframes);
5578  p_cfg->ui16HDR10MaxLight = ni_htons(p_cfg->ui16HDR10MaxLight);
5579  p_cfg->ui16HDR10AveLight = ni_htons(p_cfg->ui16HDR10AveLight);
5580  p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration = ni_htons(p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration);
5581  p_cfg->ui32ltrRefInterval = ni_htonl(p_cfg->ui32ltrRefInterval);
5582  p_cfg->i32ltrRefQpOffset = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32ltrRefQpOffset);
5583  p_cfg->ui32ltrFirstGap = ni_htonl(p_cfg->ui32ltrFirstGap);
5584  p_cfg->i32tolCtbRcInter = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32tolCtbRcInter);
5585  p_cfg->i32tolCtbRcIntra = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32tolCtbRcIntra);
5586  p_cfg->i16bitrateWindow = ni_htons(p_cfg->i16bitrateWindow);
5587  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx0 = ni_htons(p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx0);
5588  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy0 = ni_htons(p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy0);
5589  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx1 = ni_htons(p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx1);
5590  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy1 = ni_htons(p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy1);
5591  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx2 = ni_htons(p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx2);
5592  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy2 = ni_htons(p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy2);
5593  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_wx = ni_htons(p_cfg->ui16hdr10_wx);
5594  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_wy = ni_htons(p_cfg->ui16hdr10_wy);
5595  p_cfg->ui32hdr10_maxluma = ni_htonl(p_cfg->ui32hdr10_maxluma);
5596  p_cfg->ui32hdr10_minluma = ni_htonl(p_cfg->ui32hdr10_minluma);
5597 
5598  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
5599  p_encoder_config, buffer_size, ui32LBA);
5600  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
5601  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
5602  &(p_ctx->session_id));
5603  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
5604  {
5605  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: ni_nvme_send_admin_cmd failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n", (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
5606  //Close the session since we can't configure it
5607  retval = ni_encoder_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
5608  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
5609  {
5610  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: ni_encoder_session_close failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n", (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
5611  }
5612 
5613  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
5614  }
5615 
5616 END:
5617 
5618  ni_aligned_free(p_encoder_config);
5619  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
5620  return retval;
5621 }
5622 
5623 /*!******************************************************************************
5624  * \brief Send a p_config command to configure encoding p_frame parameters.
5625  *
5626  * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
5627  * \param ni_encoder_frame_params_t * params - pointer to the encoder ni_encoder_frame_params_t struct
5628  *
5629  * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on failure
5630  *******************************************************************************/
5631 ni_retcode_t ni_config_instance_set_encoder_frame_params(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_encoder_frame_params_t* p_params)
5632 {
5633  ni_encoder_frame_params_t *p_cfg;
5634  uint32_t buffer_size = sizeof(ni_encoder_frame_params_t);
5635  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
5636  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
5637 
5638  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
5639 
5640  if (!p_ctx || !p_params)
5641  {
5642  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
5643  __func__);
5644  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5645  }
5646 
5647  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
5648  {
5649  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
5650  __func__);
5651  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
5652  }
5653 
5654  buffer_size = ((buffer_size + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
5655  if (ni_posix_memalign((void **)&p_cfg, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
5656  {
5657  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
5658  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
5659  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
5660  }
5661 
5662  //configure the session here
5663  ui32LBA = CONFIG_INSTANCE_SetEncFramePara_W(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
5664 
5665  //Flip the bytes!!
5666  p_cfg->force_picture_type = ni_htons(p_params->force_picture_type);
5667  p_cfg->data_format = ni_htons(p_params->data_format);
5668  p_cfg->picture_type = ni_htons(p_params->picture_type);
5669  p_cfg->video_width = ni_htons(p_params->video_width);
5670  p_cfg->video_height = ni_htons(p_params->video_height);
5671  p_cfg->timestamp = ni_htonl(p_params->timestamp);
5672 
5673  if (ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle, p_cfg,
5674  buffer_size, ui32LBA) < 0)
5675  {
5676  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: ni_nvme_send_admin_cmd failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %d, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n", (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
5677  //Close the session since we can't configure it as per Farhan
5678  retval = ni_encoder_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
5679  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
5680  {
5681  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: ni_encoder_session_close failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %d, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n", (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
5682  }
5683 
5684  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
5685  }
5686 
5687  ni_aligned_free(p_cfg);
5688  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
5689 
5690  return retval;
5691 }
5692 
5693 #if 0 // ndef QUADRA_SEI_FMT
5694 // return non-0 if SEI of requested type is found, 0 otherwise
5695 static int find_sei(uint32_t sei_header, ni_sei_user_data_entry_t *pEntry,
5696  ni_h265_sei_user_data_type_t type,
5697  uint32_t *pSeiOffset, uint32_t *pSeiSize)
5698 {
5699  int ret = 0;
5700 
5701 
5702  if( (!pEntry) || (!pSeiOffset) || (!pSeiSize) )
5703  {
5704  return ret;
5705  }
5706 
5707 
5708  if (sei_header & (1 << type))
5709  {
5710  *pSeiOffset = pEntry[type].offset;
5711  *pSeiSize = pEntry[type].size;
5712  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "find_sei sei type %d, offset: %u size: %u\n",
5713  type, *pSeiOffset, *pSeiSize);
5714  ret = 1;
5715  }
5716 
5717  return ret;
5718 }
5719 
5720 // return non-0 if prefix or suffix T.35 message is found
5721 static int find_prefix_suffix_t35(uint32_t sei_header,
5722  ni_t35_sei_mesg_type_t t35_type,
5723  ni_sei_user_data_entry_t *pEntry,
5724  ni_h265_sei_user_data_type_t type,
5725  uint32_t *pCcOffset, uint32_t *pCcSize)
5726 {
5727  int ret = 0;
5728  uint8_t *ptr;
5729 
5730 
5731  if( (!pEntry) || (!pCcOffset) || (!pCcSize) )
5732  {
5733  return ret;
5734  }
5735 
5736 
5737  // Find first t35 message with CEA708 close caption (first 7
5738  // bytes are itu_t_t35_country_code 0xB5 0x00 (181),
5739  // itu_t_t35_provider_code = 0x31 (49),
5740  // ATSC_user_identifier = 0x47 0x41 0x39 0x34 ("GA94")
5741  // or HDR10+ header bytes
5742  if (sei_header & (1 << type))
5743  {
5744  ptr = (uint8_t*)pEntry + pEntry[type].offset;
5745  if (NI_T35_SEI_CLOSED_CAPTION == t35_type &&
5746  ptr[0] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE0 && ptr[1] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE1 &&
5747  ptr[2] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE2 && ptr[3] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE3 &&
5748  ptr[4] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE4 && ptr[5] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE5 &&
5749  ptr[6] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE6)
5750  {
5751  *pCcOffset = pEntry[type].offset;
5752  *pCcSize = pEntry[type].size;
5753  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "find_prefix_suffix_t35: close Caption SEI found in T.35 type %d, offset: %u size: %u\n", type, *pCcOffset, *pCcSize);
5754  ret = 1;
5755  }
5756  else if (NI_T35_SEI_HDR10_PLUS == t35_type &&
5757  ptr[0] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE0 && ptr[1] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE1 &&
5758  ptr[2] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE2 && ptr[3] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE3 &&
5759  ptr[4] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE4 && ptr[5] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE5 &&
5760  ptr[6] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE6)
5761  {
5762  *pCcOffset = pEntry[type].offset;
5763  *pCcSize = pEntry[type].size;
5764  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "find_prefix_suffix_t35: HDR10+ SEI found in T.35 type %d, offset: %u size: %u\n", type, *pCcOffset, *pCcSize);
5765  ret = 1;
5766  }
5767  }
5768 
5769  return ret;
5770 }
5771 
5772 // return non-0 when HDR10+/close-caption is found, 0 otherwise
5773 static int find_t35_sei(uint32_t sei_header, ni_t35_sei_mesg_type_t t35_type,
5774  ni_sei_user_data_entry_t *pEntry,
5775  uint32_t *pCcOffset, uint32_t *pCcSize)
5776 {
5777  int ret = 0;
5778 
5779  if( (!pEntry) || (!pCcOffset) || (!pCcSize) )
5780  {
5781  return ret;
5782  }
5783 
5784  *pCcOffset = *pCcSize = 0;
5785 
5786  // Check up to 3 T35 Prefix and Suffix SEI for close captions
5787  if (find_prefix_suffix_t35(sei_header, t35_type, pEntry,
5788  NI_H265_USERDATA_FLAG_ITU_T_T35_PRE,
5789  pCcOffset, pCcSize) ||
5790  find_prefix_suffix_t35(sei_header, t35_type, pEntry,
5791  NI_H265_USERDATA_FLAG_ITU_T_T35_PRE_1,
5792  pCcOffset, pCcSize) ||
5793  find_prefix_suffix_t35(sei_header, t35_type, pEntry,
5794  NI_H265_USERDATA_FLAG_ITU_T_T35_PRE_2,
5795  pCcOffset, pCcSize) ||
5796  find_prefix_suffix_t35(sei_header, t35_type, pEntry,
5797  NI_H265_USERDATA_FLAG_ITU_T_T35_SUF,
5798  pCcOffset, pCcSize) ||
5799  find_prefix_suffix_t35(sei_header, t35_type, pEntry,
5800  NI_H265_USERDATA_FLAG_ITU_T_T35_SUF_1,
5801  pCcOffset, pCcSize) ||
5802  find_prefix_suffix_t35(sei_header, t35_type, pEntry,
5803  NI_H265_USERDATA_FLAG_ITU_T_T35_SUF_2,
5804  pCcOffset, pCcSize)
5805  )
5806  {
5807  ret = 1;
5808  }
5809  return ret;
5810 }
5811 #endif // QUADRA_SEI_FMT
5812 
5813 /*!******************************************************************************
5814  * \brief Get info from received p_frame
5815  *
5816  * \param
5817  *
5818  * \return
5819  *******************************************************************************/
5820 int ni_create_frame(ni_frame_t* p_frame, uint32_t read_length, uint64_t* p_frame_offset, bool is_hw_frame)
5821 {
5822  uint32_t rx_size =
5823  read_length; //get the length since its the only thing in DW10 now
5824 
5825  if (!p_frame || !p_frame_offset)
5826  {
5827  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): Null pointer parameters passed\n",
5828  __func__);
5829  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
5830  }
5831 
5832  *p_frame_offset = 0;
5833 
5834  unsigned int metadata_size = NI_FW_META_DATA_SZ -
5835  NI_MAX_NUM_OF_DECODER_OUTPUTS * sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t);
5836  unsigned int video_data_size = p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] +
5837  p_frame->data_len[2] + ((is_hw_frame) ? p_frame->data_len[3] : 0);
5838  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "rx_size = %d metadataSize = %d\n", rx_size,
5839  metadata_size);
5840 
5841  p_frame->p_custom_sei_set = NULL;
5842 
5843  if (rx_size == metadata_size)
5844  {
5845  video_data_size = 0;
5846  }
5847 
5848  if (rx_size > video_data_size)
5849  {
5850  ni_metadata_dec_frame_t *p_meta =
5851  (ni_metadata_dec_frame_t *)((uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer +
5852  video_data_size);
5853 
5854  *p_frame_offset = p_meta->metadata_common.ui64_data.frame_offset;
5855  rx_size -= metadata_size;
5856  p_frame->crop_top = p_meta->metadata_common.crop_top;
5857  p_frame->crop_bottom = p_meta->metadata_common.crop_bottom;
5858  p_frame->crop_left = p_meta->metadata_common.crop_left;
5859  p_frame->crop_right = p_meta->metadata_common.crop_right;
5860  p_frame->ni_pict_type = p_meta->metadata_common.frame_type;
5861 
5862  p_frame->video_width = p_meta->metadata_common.frame_width;
5863  p_frame->video_height = p_meta->metadata_common.frame_height;
5864 
5865  ni_log(
5866  NI_LOG_DEBUG,
5867  "%s: [metadata] cropRight=%u, cropLeft=%u, "
5868  "cropBottom=%u, cropTop=%u, frame_offset=%" PRIu64 ", pic=%ux%u, "
5869  "pict_type=%d, crop=%ux%u, sei header: 0x%0x number %u size %u\n",
5870  __func__, p_frame->crop_right, p_frame->crop_left,
5871  p_frame->crop_bottom, p_frame->crop_top,
5872  p_meta->metadata_common.ui64_data.frame_offset,
5873  p_meta->metadata_common.frame_width,
5874  p_meta->metadata_common.frame_height, p_frame->ni_pict_type,
5875  p_frame->crop_right - p_frame->crop_left,
5876  p_frame->crop_bottom - p_frame->crop_top, p_meta->sei_header,
5877  p_meta->sei_number, p_meta->sei_size);
5878 
5879  p_frame->sei_total_len = 0;
5880  p_frame->sei_cc_offset = 0;
5881  p_frame->sei_cc_len = 0;
5882  p_frame->sei_hdr_mastering_display_color_vol_offset = 0;
5883  p_frame->sei_hdr_mastering_display_color_vol_len = 0;
5884  p_frame->sei_hdr_content_light_level_info_offset = 0;
5885  p_frame->sei_hdr_content_light_level_info_len = 0;
5886  p_frame->sei_hdr_plus_offset = 0;
5887  p_frame->sei_hdr_plus_len = 0;
5888  p_frame->sei_user_data_unreg_offset = 0;
5889  p_frame->sei_user_data_unreg_len = 0;
5890 
5891  if (p_meta->sei_number)
5892  {
5893 #if 1 // QUADRA_SEI_FMT
5894  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui32SeiHeader 0x%x ui16SeiNumber %d ui16SeiSize %d SEI 0x%02x%02x\n",
5895  p_meta->sei_header, p_meta->sei_number, p_meta->sei_size,
5896  *((uint8_t*)p_meta + metadata_size),
5897  *((uint8_t*)p_meta + metadata_size+1));
5898 
5899  { // retrieve sei from new format
5900  uint16_t ui16SeiProcessed = 0;
5901  ni_sei_header_t * pEntryHeader = &p_meta->first_sei_header;
5902  uint32_t ui32Offset = 0;
5903  uint32_t ui32Size;
5904 
5905  rx_size -= p_meta->sei_size;
5906 
5907  do
5908  {
5909  ui16SeiProcessed++;
5910 
5911  if (pEntryHeader->status)
5912  {
5913  ui32Size = pEntryHeader->size;
5914  }
5915  else
5916  {
5917  ui32Size = 0;
5918  }
5919 
5920  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "SEI #%x st %d size %d ty %d sz/of %u/%u 0x%02x%02x\n",
5921  ui16SeiProcessed, pEntryHeader->status,
5922  pEntryHeader->size, pEntryHeader->type, ui32Size,
5923  ui32Offset,
5924  *((uint8_t *)p_meta + metadata_size + ui32Offset),
5925  *((uint8_t *)p_meta + metadata_size + ui32Offset + 1));
5926 
5927  // - if multiple entries with same SEI type/subtype, only the last entry is saved;
5928  // consider to use sei_offset[] array instead of explicit sei_*_offset
5929  // - user_data_unreg (UDU) and custom sei passthru via HW and SW respectively
5930  // thus custom SEI is not processed here as it is by SW.
5931 
5932  switch(pEntryHeader->type)
5933  {
5934  case 4: //HEVC_SEI_TYPE_USER_DATA_REGISTERED_ITU_T_T35
5935  if (ui32Size)
5936  {
5937  uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)p_meta + metadata_size + ui32Offset;
5938  if(ptr[0] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE0 && ptr[1] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE1 &&
5939  ptr[2] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE2 && ptr[3] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE3 &&
5940  ptr[4] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE4 && ptr[5] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE5 &&
5941  ptr[6] == NI_HDR10P_SEI_BYTE6)
5942  {
5943  p_frame->sei_hdr_plus_len = ui32Size;
5944  p_frame->sei_hdr_plus_offset =
5945  video_data_size + metadata_size + ui32Offset;
5946 
5947  p_frame->sei_total_len += ui32Size;
5948 
5949  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: hdr10+ size=%u hdr10+ offset=%u\n",
5950  __func__, p_frame->sei_hdr_plus_len,
5951  p_frame->sei_hdr_plus_offset);
5952  }
5953  else if(ptr[0] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE0 && ptr[1] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE1 &&
5954  ptr[2] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE2 && ptr[3] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE3 &&
5955  ptr[4] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE4 && ptr[5] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE5 &&
5956  ptr[6] == NI_CC_SEI_BYTE6)
5957  {
5958  // Found CC data
5959  // number of 3 byte close captions is bottom 5 bits of
5960  // 9th byte of T35 payload
5961  // uint32_t ui32CCSize = (ptr[8] & 0x1F) * 3; // avoid overwriting ui32CCSize
5962 
5963  // return close caption data offset and length, and
5964  // skip past 10 header bytes to close caption data
5965  p_frame->sei_cc_len = (ptr[8] & 0x1F) * 3; // ui32CCSize;
5966  p_frame->sei_cc_offset = video_data_size + metadata_size
5967  + ui32Offset + 10;
5968 
5969  p_frame->sei_total_len += p_frame->sei_cc_len;
5970 
5971  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
5972  "%s: close caption size %u ,"
5973  "offset %u = video size %u meta size %d off "
5974  " %u + 10\n",
5975  __func__, p_frame->sei_cc_len, p_frame->sei_cc_offset,
5976  video_data_size, metadata_size, ui32Offset);
5977  }
5978  else
5979  {
5980  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
5981  "%s: unsupported T35; type %u size %u status %u "
5982  "offset %u\n",
5983  __func__, pEntryHeader->type, pEntryHeader->size,
5984  pEntryHeader->status, ui32Offset);
5985  }
5986  }
5987  else
5988  {
5989  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
5990  "Error %s: T35 (missing payload); type %u size %u "
5991  "status %u offset %u\n",
5992  __func__, pEntryHeader->type, pEntryHeader->size,
5993  pEntryHeader->status, ui32Offset);
5994  }
5995  break;
5996 
5997  case 5: // HEVC_SEI_TYPE_USER_DATA_UNREGISTERED
5998  // set offset now so len=0 will signify an error if this SEI is dropped
5999  p_frame->sei_user_data_unreg_offset = video_data_size + metadata_size + ui32Offset;
6000  if (ui32Size)
6001  {
6002  p_frame->sei_user_data_unreg_len = ui32Size;
6003  p_frame->sei_total_len += ui32Size;
6004  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "User Data Unreg size = %u\n", ui32Size);
6005  }
6006  else
6007  {
6008  p_frame->sei_user_data_unreg_len = 0; // in case there are multiple UDU SEI entries
6009  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
6010  "Error %s: User Data Unreg dropped (missing payload); "
6011  "type %u size %u status %u offset %u\n",
6012  __func__, pEntryHeader->type, pEntryHeader->size,
6013  pEntryHeader->status, ui32Offset);
6014  }
6015  break;
6016 
6017  case 137: //HEVC_SEI_TYPE_MASTERING_DISPLAY_INFO
6018  if (ui32Size)
6019  {
6020  p_frame->sei_hdr_mastering_display_color_vol_len = ui32Size;
6021  p_frame->sei_hdr_mastering_display_color_vol_offset =
6022  video_data_size + metadata_size + ui32Offset;
6023 
6024  p_frame->sei_total_len += ui32Size;
6025  ni_dec_mastering_display_colour_volume_bytes_t *pColourVolume =
6026  (ni_dec_mastering_display_colour_volume_bytes_t
6027  *)((uint8_t *)p_meta + metadata_size + ui32Offset);
6028 
6029  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Display Primaries x[0]=%u y[0]=%u\n",
6030  ni_ntohs(pColourVolume->display_primaries[0][0]),
6031  ni_ntohs(pColourVolume->display_primaries[0][1]));
6032  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Display Primaries x[1]=%u y[1]=%u\n",
6033  ni_ntohs(pColourVolume->display_primaries[1][0]),
6034  ni_ntohs(pColourVolume->display_primaries[1][1]));
6035  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Display Primaries x[2]=%u y[2]=%u\n",
6036  ni_ntohs(pColourVolume->display_primaries[2][0]),
6037  ni_ntohs(pColourVolume->display_primaries[2][1]));
6038 
6039  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "White Point x=%u y=%u\n",
6040  ni_ntohs(pColourVolume->white_point_x),
6041  ni_ntohs(pColourVolume->white_point_y));
6042  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Display Mastering Lum, Max=%u Min=%u\n",
6043  ni_ntohl(pColourVolume->max_display_mastering_luminance),
6044  ni_ntohl(pColourVolume->min_display_mastering_luminance));
6045  }
6046  else
6047  {
6048  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
6049  "Error %s: mastering display info dropped (missing "
6050  "payload); type %u size %u status %u offset %u\n",
6051  __func__, pEntryHeader->type, pEntryHeader->size,
6052  pEntryHeader->status, ui32Offset);
6053  }
6054  break;
6055 
6056  case 144: //HEVC_SEI_TYPE_CONTENT_LIGHT_LEVEL_INFO
6057  if (ui32Size)
6058  {
6059  p_frame->sei_hdr_content_light_level_info_len = ui32Size;
6060  p_frame->sei_hdr_content_light_level_info_offset =
6061  video_data_size + metadata_size + ui32Offset;
6062 
6063  p_frame->sei_total_len += ui32Offset;
6064 
6065  ni_content_light_level_info_bytes_t* pLightLevel =
6066  (ni_content_light_level_info_bytes_t*)(
6067  (uint8_t*)p_meta + metadata_size + ui32Offset);
6068 
6069  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Max Content Light level=%u Max Pic Avg Light Level=%u\n",
6070  ni_ntohs(pLightLevel->max_content_light_level),
6071  ni_ntohs(pLightLevel->max_pic_average_light_level));
6072  }
6073  else
6074  {
6075  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
6076  "Error %s: content light level info dropped (missing "
6077  "payload); type %u size %u status %u offset %u\n",
6078  __func__, pEntryHeader->type, pEntryHeader->size,
6079  pEntryHeader->status, ui32Offset);
6080  }
6081  break;
6082 
6083  case 200: // Custom SEI not included in HEVC_SEI_Type
6084  if (ui32Size)
6085  {
6086  p_frame->vui_len = ui32Size;
6087  p_frame->vui_offset =
6088  video_data_size + metadata_size + ui32Offset;
6089  p_frame->sei_total_len += ui32Size;
6090  }
6091  break;
6092 
6093  default:
6094  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
6095  "Error %s: SEI message dropped (unsupported - check "
6096  "decoder SEI bitmap settings);"
6097  " type %u size %u status %u offset %u payload bytes %u\n",
6098  __func__, pEntryHeader->type, pEntryHeader->size,
6099  pEntryHeader->status, ui32Offset, ui32Size);
6100  break;
6101  }
6102  ui32Offset += ui32Size;
6103  pEntryHeader = (ni_sei_header_t *)((uint8_t*)p_meta + metadata_size + ui32Offset);
6104  ui32Offset += sizeof(ni_sei_header_t);
6105  } while (ui32Offset <= p_meta->sei_size && ui16SeiProcessed < p_meta->sei_number);
6106 
6107  if (p_meta->sei_number != ui16SeiProcessed)
6108  {
6109  ni_log(
6110  NI_LOG_ERROR,
6111  "Error %s: number of SEI messages reported %u != processed %u\n",
6112  __func__, p_meta->sei_number, ui16SeiProcessed);
6113  }
6114  }
6115 
6116 #else // QUADRA_SEI_FMT
6117 
6118  // ni_assert(p_meta->sei_header);
6119  // else // backward compatibility
6120  {
6121  ni_sei_user_data_entry_t *pEntry;
6122  uint32_t ui32CCOffset = 0, ui32CCSize = 0;
6123 
6124  rx_size -= p_meta->sei_size;
6125 
6126  pEntry = (ni_sei_user_data_entry_t *)((uint8_t*)p_meta + metadata_size);
6127 
6128  if (find_t35_sei(p_meta->sei_header, NI_T35_SEI_HDR10_PLUS, pEntry,
6129  &ui32CCOffset, &ui32CCSize))
6130  {
6131  p_frame->sei_hdr_plus_len = ui32CCSize;
6132  p_frame->sei_hdr_plus_offset =
6133  video_data_size + metadata_size + ui32CCOffset;
6134 
6135  p_frame->sei_total_len += ui32CCSize;
6136 
6137  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: hdr10+ size=%u hdr10+ offset=%u\n", __func__,
6138  p_frame->sei_hdr_plus_len, p_frame->sei_hdr_plus_offset);
6139  }
6140  else
6141  {
6142  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: hdr+ NOT found in meta data!\n", __func__);
6143  }
6144 
6145  if (find_t35_sei(p_meta->sei_header, NI_T35_SEI_CLOSED_CAPTION, pEntry,
6146  &ui32CCOffset, &ui32CCSize))
6147  {
6148  uint8_t *ptr;
6149  // Found CC data at pEntry + ui32CCOffset
6150  ptr = (uint8_t*)pEntry + ui32CCOffset;
6151  // number of 3 byte close captions is bottom 5 bits of
6152  // 9th byte of T35 payload
6153  ui32CCSize = (ptr[8] & 0x1F) * 3;
6154 
6155  // return close caption data offset and length, and
6156  // skip past 10 header bytes to close caption data
6157  p_frame->sei_cc_len = ui32CCSize;
6158  p_frame->sei_cc_offset = video_data_size + metadata_size
6159  + ui32CCOffset + 10;
6160 
6161  p_frame->sei_total_len += p_frame->sei_cc_len;
6162 
6163  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
6164  "%s: close caption size %u ,"
6165  "offset %u = video size %u meta size %u off "
6166  " %u + 10\n",
6167  __func__, p_frame->sei_cc_len, p_frame->sei_cc_offset,
6168  video_data_size, metadata_size, ui32CCOffset);
6169  }
6170  else
6171  {
6172  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: close caption NOT found in meta data!\n",
6173  __func__);
6174  }
6175 
6176  if (find_sei(p_meta->sei_header, pEntry,
6177  NI_H265_USERDATA_FLAG_MASTERING_COLOR_VOL,
6178  &ui32CCOffset, &ui32CCSize))
6179  {
6180  p_frame->sei_hdr_mastering_display_color_vol_len = ui32CCSize;
6181  p_frame->sei_hdr_mastering_display_color_vol_offset =
6182  video_data_size + metadata_size + ui32CCOffset;
6183 
6184  p_frame->sei_total_len += ui32CCSize;
6185 
6186  ni_dec_mastering_display_colour_volume_t* pColourVolume =
6187  (ni_dec_mastering_display_colour_volume_t*)((uint8_t*)pEntry + ui32CCOffset);
6188 
6189  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Display Primaries x[0]=%u y[0]=%u\n",
6190  pColourVolume->display_primaries_x[0],
6191  pColourVolume->display_primaries_y[0]);
6192  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Display Primaries x[1]=%u y[1]=%u\n",
6193  pColourVolume->display_primaries_x[1],
6194  pColourVolume->display_primaries_y[1]);
6195  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Display Primaries x[2]=%u y[2]=%u\n",
6196  pColourVolume->display_primaries_x[2],
6197  pColourVolume->display_primaries_y[2]);
6198 
6199  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "White Point x=%u y=%u\n",
6200  pColourVolume->white_point_x,
6201  pColourVolume->white_point_y);
6202  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Display Mastering Lum, Max=%u Min=%u\n",
6203  pColourVolume->max_display_mastering_luminance, pColourVolume->min_display_mastering_luminance);
6204  }
6205  if (find_sei(p_meta->sei_header, pEntry,
6206  NI_H265_USER_DATA_FLAG_CONTENT_LIGHT_LEVEL_INFO,
6207  &ui32CCOffset, &ui32CCSize))
6208  {
6209  p_frame->sei_hdr_content_light_level_info_len = ui32CCSize;
6210  p_frame->sei_hdr_content_light_level_info_offset =
6211  video_data_size + metadata_size + ui32CCOffset;
6212 
6213  p_frame->sei_total_len += ui32CCSize;
6214 
6215  ni_content_light_level_info_t* pLightLevel =
6216  (ni_content_light_level_info_t*)((uint8_t*)pEntry + ui32CCOffset);
6217  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Max Content Light level=%u Max Pic Avg Light Level=%u\n",
6218  pLightLevel->max_content_light_level, pLightLevel->max_pic_average_light_level);
6219  }
6220 
6221  if (find_sei(p_meta->sei_header, pEntry,
6222  NI_H265_USERDATA_FLAG_UNREGISTERED_PRE,
6223  &ui32CCOffset, &ui32CCSize) ||
6224  find_sei(p_meta->sei_header, pEntry,
6225  NI_H265_USERDATA_FLAG_UNREGISTERED_SUF,
6226  &ui32CCOffset, &ui32CCSize))
6227  {
6228  p_frame->sei_user_data_unreg_len = ui32CCSize;
6229  p_frame->sei_user_data_unreg_offset =
6230  video_data_size + metadata_size + ui32CCOffset;
6231 
6232  p_frame->sei_total_len += ui32CCSize;
6233 
6234  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "User Data Unreg size = %u\n", ui32CCSize);
6235  }
6236  }
6237 #endif // QUADRA_SEI_FMT
6238  if (0 == p_frame->sei_total_len)
6239  {
6240  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Warning retrieved 0 supported SEI !\n");
6241  }
6242  }
6243  }
6244 
6245  p_frame->dts = NI_NOPTS_VALUE;
6246  p_frame->pts = NI_NOPTS_VALUE;
6247  //p_frame->end_of_stream = isEndOfStream;
6248  p_frame->start_of_stream = 0;
6249 
6250  if (rx_size == 0)
6251  {
6252  p_frame->data_len[0] = 0;
6253  p_frame->data_len[1] = 0;
6254  p_frame->data_len[2] = 0;
6255  p_frame->data_len[3] = 0;
6256  }
6257 
6258  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "received [0x%08x] data size: %d, end of stream=%u\n",
6259  read_length, rx_size, p_frame->end_of_stream);
6260 
6261  return rx_size;
6262 }
6263 
6264 /*!******************************************************************************
6265  * \brief Get info from received xcoder capability
6266  *
6267  * \param
6268  *
6269  * \return
6270  *******************************************************************************/
6271 void ni_populate_device_capability_struct(ni_device_capability_t* p_cap, void* p_data)
6272 {
6273  int i, total_types = 0, total_modules = 0;
6274  ni_nvme_identity_t *p_id_data = (ni_nvme_identity_t *)p_data;
6275 
6276  COMPILE_ASSERT(sizeof(p_cap->xcoder_cnt) <= sizeof(p_id_data->xcoder_cnt) &&
6277  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_XCODER_MAX *
6278  sizeof(p_id_data->xcoder_cnt[0]) ==
6279  sizeof(p_cap->xcoder_cnt));
6280 
6281  if (!p_cap || !p_data)
6282  {
6283  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): Null pointer parameters passed\n",
6284  __func__);
6285  LRETURN;
6286  }
6287 
6288  if ((p_id_data->ui16Vid != NETINT_PCI_VENDOR_ID) ||
6289  (p_id_data->ui16Ssvid != NETINT_PCI_VENDOR_ID))
6290  {
6291  LRETURN;
6292  }
6293 
6294  memcpy(p_cap->serial_number, p_id_data->ai8Sn, sizeof(p_cap->serial_number));
6295  memcpy(p_cap->model_number, p_id_data->ai8Mn, sizeof(p_cap->model_number));
6296 
6297  memset(p_cap->fw_rev, 0, sizeof(p_cap->fw_rev));
6298  memcpy(p_cap->fw_rev, p_id_data->ai8Fr, sizeof(p_cap->fw_rev));
6299  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "F/W rev: %.*s\n", (int)sizeof(p_cap->fw_rev),
6300  p_cap->fw_rev);
6301 
6302  if (p_id_data->xcoder_num_elements)
6303  {
6304  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "xcoder_num_elements: %d xcoder_num_devices: %d\n",
6305  p_id_data->xcoder_num_elements,
6306  p_id_data->xcoder_num_devices);
6307 
6308  for (i = 0; i < NI_DEVICE_TYPE_XCODER_MAX; i++)
6309  {
6310  if (p_id_data->xcoder_cnt[i])
6311  {
6312  total_types++;
6313  total_modules += p_id_data->xcoder_cnt[i];
6314  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "type #%d: xcoder_cnt[%d] = %d\n", total_types, i,
6315  p_id_data->xcoder_cnt[i]);
6316  }
6317  }
6318 
6319  if (p_id_data->xcoder_num_elements != total_types ||
6320  p_id_data->xcoder_num_devices != total_modules)
6321  {
6322  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
6323  "Error: mismatch; xcoder_num_elements: %d (calculated: %d) "
6324  "xcoder_num_devices: %d (calculated: %d)\n",
6325  p_id_data->xcoder_num_elements, total_types,
6326  p_id_data->xcoder_num_devices, total_modules);
6327  LRETURN;
6328  }
6329 
6330  p_cap->device_is_xcoder = NI_XCODER_QUADRA;
6331  p_cap->hw_elements_cnt = p_id_data->xcoder_num_elements;
6332  p_cap->xcoder_devices_cnt = p_id_data->xcoder_num_devices;
6333  memcpy(p_cap->xcoder_cnt, p_id_data->xcoder_cnt,
6334  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_XCODER_MAX * sizeof(p_id_data->xcoder_cnt[0]));
6335 
6336  for (i = 0; i < total_modules; i++)
6337  {
6338  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].hw_id = p_id_data->xcoder_devices[i].hw_id;
6339  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].max_number_of_contexts =
6340  NI_MAX_CONTEXTS_PER_HW_INSTANCE;
6341  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].max_4k_fps = NI_MAX_4K_FPS_QUADRA;
6342  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].codec_format =
6343  p_id_data->xcoder_devices[i].hw_codec_format;
6344  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].codec_type =
6345  p_id_data->xcoder_devices[i].hw_codec_type;
6346  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].max_video_width = NI_PARAM_MAX_WIDTH;
6347  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].max_video_height = NI_PARAM_MAX_HEIGHT;
6348  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].min_video_width = NI_PARAM_MIN_WIDTH;
6349  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].min_video_height = NI_PARAM_MIN_HEIGHT;
6350  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].video_profile =
6351  p_id_data->xcoder_devices[i].hw_video_profile;
6352  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].video_level =
6353  p_id_data->xcoder_devices[i].hw_video_level;
6354  }
6355 
6356  goto CAP_POPULATED;
6357  }
6358 
6359  p_cap->device_is_xcoder = p_id_data->device_is_xcoder;
6360  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "device_is_xcoder: value in id cmd: %u\n",
6361  p_cap->device_is_xcoder);
6362  if (0 == p_cap->device_is_xcoder)
6363  {
6364  LRETURN;
6365  }
6366 
6367  p_cap->hw_elements_cnt = p_id_data->xcoder_num_hw;
6368 
6369  total_modules = p_cap->xcoder_cnt[NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER] =
6370  p_id_data->xcoder_num_h264_decoder_hw +
6371  p_id_data->xcoder_num_h265_decoder_hw;
6372 
6373  p_cap->xcoder_cnt[NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER] =
6374  p_id_data->xcoder_num_h264_encoder_hw +
6375  p_id_data->xcoder_num_h265_encoder_hw;
6376 
6377  total_modules += p_cap->xcoder_cnt[NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER];
6378 
6379  p_cap->xcoder_devices_cnt = total_modules;
6380 
6381  if (total_modules >= 1)
6382  {
6383  p_cap->xcoder_devices[0].hw_id = p_id_data->hw0_id;
6384  p_cap->xcoder_devices[0].max_number_of_contexts =
6385  NI_MAX_CONTEXTS_PER_HW_INSTANCE;
6386  p_cap->xcoder_devices[0].max_4k_fps = NI_MAX_4K_FPS_QUADRA;
6387  p_cap->xcoder_devices[0].codec_format = p_id_data->hw0_codec_format;
6388  p_cap->xcoder_devices[0].codec_type = p_id_data->hw0_codec_type;
6389  p_cap->xcoder_devices[0].max_video_width = NI_PARAM_MAX_WIDTH;
6390  p_cap->xcoder_devices[0].max_video_height = NI_PARAM_MAX_HEIGHT;
6391  p_cap->xcoder_devices[0].min_video_width = NI_PARAM_MIN_WIDTH;
6392  p_cap->xcoder_devices[0].min_video_height = NI_PARAM_MIN_HEIGHT;
6393  p_cap->xcoder_devices[0].video_profile = p_id_data->hw0_video_profile;
6394  p_cap->xcoder_devices[0].video_level = p_id_data->hw0_video_level;
6395  }
6396  if (total_modules >= 2)
6397  {
6398  p_cap->xcoder_devices[1].hw_id = p_id_data->hw1_id;
6399  p_cap->xcoder_devices[1].max_number_of_contexts =
6400  NI_MAX_CONTEXTS_PER_HW_INSTANCE;
6401  p_cap->xcoder_devices[1].max_4k_fps = NI_MAX_4K_FPS_QUADRA;
6402  p_cap->xcoder_devices[1].codec_format = p_id_data->hw1_codec_format;
6403  p_cap->xcoder_devices[1].codec_type = p_id_data->hw1_codec_type;
6404  p_cap->xcoder_devices[1].max_video_width = NI_PARAM_MAX_WIDTH;
6405  p_cap->xcoder_devices[1].max_video_height = NI_PARAM_MAX_HEIGHT;
6406  p_cap->xcoder_devices[1].min_video_width = NI_PARAM_MIN_WIDTH;
6407  p_cap->xcoder_devices[1].min_video_height = NI_PARAM_MIN_HEIGHT;
6408  p_cap->xcoder_devices[1].video_profile = p_id_data->hw1_video_profile;
6409  p_cap->xcoder_devices[1].video_level = p_id_data->hw1_video_level;
6410  }
6411  if (total_modules >= 3)
6412  {
6413  p_cap->xcoder_devices[2].hw_id = p_id_data->hw2_id;
6414  p_cap->xcoder_devices[2].max_number_of_contexts =
6415  NI_MAX_CONTEXTS_PER_HW_INSTANCE;
6416  p_cap->xcoder_devices[2].max_4k_fps = NI_MAX_4K_FPS_QUADRA;
6417  p_cap->xcoder_devices[2].codec_format = p_id_data->hw2_codec_format;
6418  p_cap->xcoder_devices[2].codec_type = p_id_data->hw2_codec_type;
6419  p_cap->xcoder_devices[2].max_video_width = NI_PARAM_MAX_WIDTH;
6420  p_cap->xcoder_devices[2].max_video_height = NI_PARAM_MAX_HEIGHT;
6421  p_cap->xcoder_devices[2].min_video_width = NI_PARAM_MIN_WIDTH;
6422  p_cap->xcoder_devices[2].min_video_height = NI_PARAM_MIN_HEIGHT;
6423  p_cap->xcoder_devices[2].video_profile = p_id_data->hw2_video_profile;
6424  p_cap->xcoder_devices[2].video_level = p_id_data->hw2_video_level;
6425  }
6426  if (total_modules >= 4)
6427  {
6428  p_cap->xcoder_devices[3].hw_id = p_id_data->hw3_id;
6429  p_cap->xcoder_devices[3].max_number_of_contexts =
6430  NI_MAX_CONTEXTS_PER_HW_INSTANCE;
6431  p_cap->xcoder_devices[3].max_4k_fps = NI_MAX_4K_FPS_QUADRA;
6432  p_cap->xcoder_devices[3].codec_format = p_id_data->hw3_codec_format;
6433  p_cap->xcoder_devices[3].codec_type = p_id_data->hw3_codec_type;
6434  p_cap->xcoder_devices[3].max_video_width = NI_PARAM_MAX_WIDTH;
6435  p_cap->xcoder_devices[3].max_video_height = NI_PARAM_MAX_HEIGHT;
6436  p_cap->xcoder_devices[3].min_video_width = NI_PARAM_MIN_WIDTH;
6437  p_cap->xcoder_devices[3].min_video_height = NI_PARAM_MIN_HEIGHT;
6438  p_cap->xcoder_devices[3].video_profile = p_id_data->hw3_video_profile;
6439  p_cap->xcoder_devices[3].video_level = p_id_data->hw3_video_level;
6440  }
6441 
6442 CAP_POPULATED:
6443 
6444  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_DEVICES_PER_HW_INSTANCE; i++)
6445  {
6446  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "HW%d hw_id: %d\n", i, p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].hw_id);
6447  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "HW%d max_number_of_contexts: %d\n", i,
6448  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].max_number_of_contexts);
6449  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "HW%d max_4k_fps: %d\n", i,
6450  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].max_4k_fps);
6451  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "HW%d codec_format: %d\n", i,
6452  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].codec_format);
6453  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "HW%d codec_type: %d\n", i,
6454  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].codec_type);
6455  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "HW%d max_video_width: %d\n", i,
6456  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].max_video_width);
6457  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "HW%d max_video_height: %d\n", i,
6458  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].max_video_height);
6459  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "HW%d min_video_width: %d\n", i,
6460  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].min_video_width);
6461  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "HW%d min_video_height: %d\n", i,
6462  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].min_video_height);
6463  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "HW%d video_profile: %d\n", i,
6464  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].video_profile);
6465  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "HW%d video_level: %d\n", i,
6466  p_cap->xcoder_devices[i].video_level);
6467  }
6468 
6469  memset(p_cap->fw_branch_name, 0, sizeof(p_cap->fw_branch_name));
6470  memcpy(p_cap->fw_branch_name, p_id_data->fw_branch_name,
6471  sizeof(p_cap->fw_branch_name) - 1);
6472  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "F/W branch name: %s\n", p_cap->fw_branch_name);
6473  memset(p_cap->fw_commit_time, 0, sizeof(p_cap->fw_commit_time));
6474  memcpy(p_cap->fw_commit_time, p_id_data->fw_commit_time,
6475  sizeof(p_cap->fw_commit_time) - 1);
6476  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "F/W commit time: %s\n", p_cap->fw_commit_time);
6477  memset(p_cap->fw_commit_hash, 0, sizeof(p_cap->fw_commit_hash));
6478  memcpy(p_cap->fw_commit_hash, p_id_data->fw_commit_hash,
6479  sizeof(p_cap->fw_commit_hash) - 1);
6480  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "F/W commit hash: %s\n", p_cap->fw_commit_hash);
6481  memset(p_cap->fw_build_time, 0, sizeof(p_cap->fw_build_time));
6482  memcpy(p_cap->fw_build_time, p_id_data->fw_build_time,
6483  sizeof(p_cap->fw_build_time) - 1);
6484  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "F/W build time: %s\n", p_cap->fw_build_time);
6485  memset(p_cap->fw_build_id, 0, sizeof(p_cap->fw_build_id));
6486  memcpy(p_cap->fw_build_id, p_id_data->fw_build_id,
6487  sizeof(p_cap->fw_build_id) - 1);
6488  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "F/W build id: %s\n", p_cap->fw_build_id);
6489 
6490 END:
6491  return;
6492 }
6493 
6494 static uint32_t presetGopSize[] = {
6495  1,
6496  1,
6497  1,
6498  1,
6499  2,
6500  4,
6501  4,
6502  4,
6503  8 };
6504 
6505 static uint32_t presetGopKeyFrameFactor[] = {
6506  1,
6507  1,
6508  1,
6509  1,
6510  2,
6511  4,
6512  1,
6513  1,
6514  1 };
6515 
6516 /*!******************************************************************************
6517  * \brief insert the 32 bits of integer value at bit position pos
6518  *
6519  * \param int pos, int value
6520  *
6521  * \return void
6522  ******************************************************************************/
6523 void ni_fix_VUI(uint8_t *vui, int pos, int value)
6524 {
6525  int pos_byte = (pos/8);
6526  int pos_in_byte = pos%8;
6527  int remaining_bytes_in_current_byte = 8 - pos_in_byte;
6528 
6529  if (pos_in_byte == 0) // at beginning of the byte
6530  {
6531  vui[pos_byte] = (uint8_t)(value >> 24);
6532  vui[pos_byte+1] = (uint8_t)(value >> 16);
6533  vui[pos_byte+2] = (uint8_t)(value >> 8);
6534  vui[pos_byte+3] = (uint8_t)(value);
6535  }
6536  else
6537  {
6538  vui[pos_byte] = vui[pos_byte] + (uint8_t)(value >> (32-remaining_bytes_in_current_byte));
6539  vui[pos_byte+1] = (uint8_t)(value >> (32-remaining_bytes_in_current_byte-8));
6540  vui[pos_byte+2] = (uint8_t)(value >> (32-remaining_bytes_in_current_byte-16));
6541  vui[pos_byte+3] = (uint8_t)(value >> (32-remaining_bytes_in_current_byte-24));
6542  vui[pos_byte+4] = vui[pos_byte+4] + ((uint8_t)(value << remaining_bytes_in_current_byte));
6543  }
6544 
6545 }
6546 
6547 /*!******************************************************************************
6548 * \brief Setup all xcoder configurations with custom parameters (Rev. B)
6549 *
6550 * \param
6551 *
6552 * \return
6553 ******************************************************************************/
6554 void ni_set_custom_dec_template(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
6555  ni_decoder_config_t *p_cfg,
6556  ni_xcoder_params_t *p_src,
6557  uint32_t max_pkt_size)
6558 {
6559  int i,j;
6560  ni_decoder_input_params_t* p_dec = &p_src->dec_input_params;
6561  if ((!p_ctx) || (!p_cfg) || (!p_src))
6562  {
6563  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Null pointer parameters passed\n",
6564  __func__);
6565  return;
6566  }
6567  int w = p_src->source_width;
6568  int h = p_src->source_height;
6569  bool shift_params = false;
6570 
6571  p_cfg->ui8HWFrame = p_dec->hwframes;
6572  p_cfg->ui8MCMode = p_dec->mcmode;
6573  p_cfg->ui8UduSeiEnabled = p_ctx->enable_user_data_sei_passthru;
6574  p_cfg->ui16MaxSeiDataSize = NI_MAX_SEI_DATA;
6575 
6576  if (max_pkt_size)
6577  {
6578  p_cfg->ui32MaxPktSize = max_pkt_size;
6579  } else {
6580  // p_cfg->ui32MaxPktSize = width x height x 3/2 x min compression ratio(QP=0);
6581  // temp: set min compression ratio = 1/2, so MaxPktSize = w * h * 3/4
6582  p_cfg->ui32MaxPktSize = w * h * 3 / 4;
6583  }
6584  // packet buffer aligned to NI_MAX_PACKET_SZ(128k)
6585  p_cfg->ui32MaxPktSize =
6586  (((p_cfg->ui32MaxPktSize) / NI_MAX_PACKET_SZ) + 1) * NI_MAX_PACKET_SZ;
6587 
6588  p_cfg->fps_number =
6589  ((ni_xcoder_params_t *)p_ctx->p_session_config)->fps_number;
6590  p_cfg->fps_denominator =
6591  ((ni_xcoder_params_t *)p_ctx->p_session_config)->fps_denominator,
6592 
6593  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[0].ui8Enabled = 1; // always enabled
6594  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[1].ui8Enabled = p_dec->enable_out1;
6595  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[2].ui8Enabled = p_dec->enable_out2;
6596  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[2].ui8Enabled && p_cfg->asOutputConfig[1].ui8Enabled == 0)
6597  {
6598  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[1].ui8Enabled = 1;
6599  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[2].ui8Enabled = 0;
6600  shift_params = true;
6601  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Output 2 used before output 1, Shifting output2 settings to output1 and disabling output 2\n");
6602  }
6603 
6604  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_NUM_OF_DECODER_OUTPUTS; i++)
6605  {
6606  if (!shift_params || i == 0)
6607  {
6608  j = i;
6609  }
6610  else
6611  {
6612  j = (i == 1) ? 2 : 1; //swap settings
6613  }
6614  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8Force8Bit = p_dec->force_8_bit[j];
6615  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8SemiPlanarEnabled = p_dec->semi_planar[j];
6616  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8CropMode = p_dec->crop_mode[j];
6617  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16W =
6618  (uint16_t)((p_dec->crop_whxy[j][0]) & 0xFFFE);
6619  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16H =
6620  (uint16_t)((p_dec->crop_whxy[j][1]) & 0xFFFE);
6621  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16X =
6622  (uint16_t)((p_dec->crop_whxy[j][2]) & 0xFFFE);
6623  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16Y =
6624  (uint16_t)((p_dec->crop_whxy[j][3]) & 0xFFFE);
6625 
6626  //Offset resized if out of bounds
6627  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16X + p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16W > w)
6628  {
6629  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16X = w - p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16W;
6630  }
6631  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16Y + p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16H > h)
6632  {
6633  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16Y = h - p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16H;
6634  }
6635 
6636  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Width =
6637  (uint16_t)((p_dec->scale_wh[j][0]+1) & 0xFFFE);
6638  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Height =
6639  (uint16_t)((p_dec->scale_wh[j][1]+1) & 0xFFFE);
6640  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Width ||
