6641  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Height)
6642  {
6643  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8ScaleEnabled = 1;
6644  }
6645  else
6646  {
6647  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8ScaleEnabled = 0;
6648  }
6649  }
6650 
6651  //print it all out
6652  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8HWFrame = %d\n", p_cfg->ui8HWFrame);
6653  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8MCMode = %d\n", p_cfg->ui8MCMode);
6654  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8UduSeiEnabled = %d\n", p_cfg->ui8UduSeiEnabled);
6655  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16MaxSeiDataSize = %d\n", p_cfg->ui16MaxSeiDataSize);
6656  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8Enabled0 = %d\n", p_cfg->asOutputConfig[0].ui8Enabled);
6657  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8Enabled1 = %d\n", p_cfg->asOutputConfig[1].ui8Enabled);
6658  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8Enabled2 = %d\n", p_cfg->asOutputConfig[2].ui8Enabled);
6659  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui32MaxPktSize = %u\n", p_cfg->ui32MaxPktSize);
6660  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_NUM_OF_DECODER_OUTPUTS; i++)
6661  {
6662  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "[%d] ui8Force8Bit %d\n", i, p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8Force8Bit);
6663  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "[%d] ui8SemiPlanarEnabled %d\n", i, p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8SemiPlanarEnabled);
6664  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "[%d] ui8CropMode %d\n", i, p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8CropMode);
6665  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "[%d] sCroppingRectable.ui16XYWH %d,%d - %d x %d\n", i,
6666  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16X,
6667  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16Y,
6668  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16W,
6669  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16H);
6670  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "[%d] sOutputPictureSize.ui16Width x height %d x %d\n", i,
6671  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Width,
6672  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Height);
6673  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "[%d] ui8ScaleEnabled %d\n", i, p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8ScaleEnabled);
6674  }
6675 
6676 }
6677 
6678 
6679 /*!******************************************************************************
6680  * \brief Setup all xcoder configurations with custom parameters (Rev. B)
6681  *
6682  * \param
6683  *
6684  * \return
6685  ******************************************************************************/
6686 void ni_set_custom_template(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
6687  ni_encoder_config_t *p_cfg,
6688  ni_xcoder_params_t *p_src)
6689 {
6690 
6691  ni_t408_config_t* p_t408 = &(p_cfg->niParamT408);
6692  ni_encoder_cfg_params_t *p_enc = &p_src->cfg_enc_params;
6693  int i = 0;
6694 
6695  if ((!p_ctx) || (!p_cfg) || (!p_src))
6696  {
6697  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Null pointer parameters passed\n",
6698  __func__);
6699  return;
6700  }
6701 
6702  ni_set_default_template(p_ctx, p_cfg);
6703 
6704  p_cfg->i32picWidth = p_src->source_width;
6705  p_cfg->i32picHeight = p_src->source_height;
6706  p_t408->gop_preset_index = p_enc->gop_preset_index;
6707  p_t408->use_recommend_enc_params = p_enc->use_recommend_enc_params;
6708  p_t408->cu_size_mode = p_enc->cu_size_mode;
6709  p_t408->max_num_merge = p_enc->max_num_merge;
6710 
6711  // enable_dynamic_8x8_merge, enable_dynamic_16x16_merge, enable_dynamic_32x32_merge,
6712  // trans_rate, enable_hvs_qp_scale:
6713  // are not present in Rev B p_config
6714 
6715  p_cfg->ui8rcEnable = p_enc->rc.enable_rate_control;
6716 
6717  if (p_src->bitrate != 0)
6718  {
6719  p_cfg->i32bitRate = p_src->bitrate;
6720  }
6721 
6722  if ((p_enc->rc.enable_rate_control == 0) &&
6723  ((p_enc->rc.enable_mb_level_rc == 1) || (p_enc->rc.enable_cu_level_rate_control == 1)))
6724  {
6725  p_enc->rc.enable_mb_level_rc = p_enc->rc.enable_cu_level_rate_control = 0;
6726  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "force enable_mb_level_rc & enable_cu_level_rate_control to 0 because rate control is disabled\n");
6727  }
6728 
6729  p_t408->enable_cu_level_rate_control = p_enc->rc.enable_cu_level_rate_control;
6730  p_t408->enable_hvs_qp = p_enc->rc.enable_hvs_qp;
6731  p_t408->hvs_qp_scale = p_enc->rc.hvs_qp_scale;
6732  p_t408->minQpI = p_enc->rc.min_qp;
6733  p_t408->minQpP = p_enc->rc.min_qp;
6734  p_t408->minQpB = p_enc->rc.min_qp;
6735  p_t408->maxQpI = p_enc->rc.max_qp;
6736  p_t408->maxQpP = p_enc->rc.max_qp;
6737  p_t408->maxQpB = p_enc->rc.max_qp;
6738 
6739  // TBD intraMinQp and intraMaxQp are not configurable in Rev A; should it
6740  // be in Rev B?
6741 
6742  p_t408->max_delta_qp = p_enc->rc.max_delta_qp;
6743  p_cfg->i32vbvBufferSize = p_enc->rc.vbv_buffer_size;
6744  p_cfg->i8intraQpDelta = p_enc->rc.intra_qp_delta;
6745  p_cfg->ui8fillerEnable = p_enc->rc.enable_filler;
6746  p_cfg->ui8picSkipEnable = p_enc->rc.enable_pic_skip;
6747  p_cfg->ui16maxFrameSize = p_enc->maxFrameSize / 2000;
6748  p_t408->intra_period = p_enc->intra_period;
6749  p_t408->roiEnable = p_enc->roi_enable;
6750  p_t408->useLongTerm = p_enc->long_term_ref_enable;
6751  if (QUADRA)
6752  {
6753  p_cfg->ui32setLongTermInterval = p_enc->long_term_ref_interval;
6754  p_cfg->ui8setLongTermCount = p_enc->long_term_ref_count;
6755  }
6756  p_t408->conf_win_top = p_enc->conf_win_top;
6757  p_t408->conf_win_bottom = p_enc->conf_win_bottom;
6758  p_t408->conf_win_left = p_enc->conf_win_left;
6759  p_t408->conf_win_right = p_enc->conf_win_right;
6760  p_t408->avcIdrPeriod = p_enc->intra_period;
6761 
6762  if (QUADRA)
6763  {
6764  if (p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo != p_enc->frame_rate)
6765  {
6766  p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo = p_enc->frame_rate;
6767  p_cfg->i32frameRateDenominator = 1;
6768  if (p_src->fps_denominator != 0 &&
6769  (p_src->fps_number % p_src->fps_denominator) != 0)
6770  {
6771  uint32_t numUnitsInTick = 1000;
6772  p_cfg->i32frameRateDenominator = numUnitsInTick + 1;
6773  p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo += 1;
6774  p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo *= numUnitsInTick;
6775  }
6776  }
6777  }
6778  else
6779  {
6780  if (p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo != p_enc->frame_rate)
6781  {
6782  p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo = p_enc->frame_rate;
6783  p_t408->numUnitsInTick = 1000;
6784  if (p_src->fps_denominator != 0 &&
6785  (p_src->fps_number % p_src->fps_denominator) != 0)
6786  {
6787  p_t408->numUnitsInTick += 1;
6788  p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo += 1;
6789  }
6790  p_t408->timeScale = p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo * 1000;
6791  if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264 == p_ctx->codec_format)
6792  {
6793  p_t408->timeScale *= 2;
6794  }
6795  }
6796  }
6797 
6798  p_t408->intra_qp = p_enc->rc.intra_qp;
6799 
6800  // "repeatHeaders" value 1 (all I frames) maps to forcedHeaderEnable
6801  // value 2; all other values are ignored
6802  if (p_t408->forcedHeaderEnable != p_enc->forced_header_enable &&
6803  p_enc->forced_header_enable == NI_ENC_REPEAT_HEADERS_ALL_I_FRAMES)
6804  {
6805  p_t408->forcedHeaderEnable = 2;
6806  p_cfg->ui8repeatHeaders = p_enc->forced_header_enable;
6807  }
6808 
6809  p_t408->decoding_refresh_type = p_enc->decoding_refresh_type;
6810 
6811  if (STD_AVC == p_cfg->ui8bitstreamFormat)
6812  {
6813  switch (p_t408->decoding_refresh_type)
6814  {
6815  case 0: // Non-IRAP I-p_frame
6816  {
6817  // intra_period set to user-configured (above), avcIdrPeriod set to 0
6818  p_t408->avcIdrPeriod = 0;
6819  break;
6820  }
6821  case 1: // CRA
6822  case 2: // IDR
6823  {
6824  // intra_period set to 0, avcIdrPeriod set to user-configured (above)
6825  p_t408->intra_period = 0;
6826  break;
6827  }
6828  default:
6829  {
6830  ni_log(
6831  NI_LOG_ERROR,
6832  "ERROR: %s() unknown value for p_t408->decoding_refresh_type: %d\n",
6833  __func__, p_t408->decoding_refresh_type);
6834  break;
6835  }
6836  }
6837  } else if (STD_HEVC == p_cfg->ui8bitstreamFormat ||
6838  STD_AV1 == p_cfg->ui8bitstreamFormat)
6839  {
6840  p_t408->avcIdrPeriod = 0;
6841  }
6842 
6843  // Rev. B: H.264 only parameters.
6844  p_t408->enable_transform_8x8 = p_enc->enable_transform_8x8;
6845  p_t408->avc_slice_mode = p_enc->avc_slice_mode;
6846  p_t408->avc_slice_arg = p_enc->avc_slice_arg;
6847  p_t408->entropy_coding_mode = p_enc->entropy_coding_mode;
6848 
6849  // Rev. B: shared between HEVC and H.264
6850  if (p_t408->intra_mb_refresh_mode != p_enc->intra_mb_refresh_mode)
6851  {
6852  p_t408->intra_mb_refresh_mode = p_enc->intra_mb_refresh_mode;
6853  if (1 != p_t408->intra_mb_refresh_mode)
6854  {
6855  p_t408->intra_mb_refresh_mode = 1;
6856  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "force intraRefreshMode to 1 because quadra only supports intra refresh by rows\n");
6857  }
6858  }
6859 
6860  if (p_t408->intra_mb_refresh_arg != p_enc->intra_mb_refresh_arg)
6861  {
6862  p_t408->intra_mb_refresh_arg = p_enc->intra_mb_refresh_arg;
6863  if (1 == p_t408->intra_mb_refresh_mode)
6864  {
6865  int mbHeight = (p_cfg->ui8bitstreamFormat == STD_AVC) ? 16 : 64;
6866  int mbRows = (p_cfg->i32picHeight + mbHeight - 1) / mbHeight;
6867  p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration = (mbRows + p_t408->intra_mb_refresh_arg - 1) / p_t408->intra_mb_refresh_arg;
6868  }
6869  }
6870 
6871  p_cfg->ui8intraResetRefresh = p_enc->intra_reset_refresh;
6872 
6873  // TBD Rev. B: could be shared for HEVC and H.264
6874  p_t408->enable_mb_level_rc = p_enc->rc.enable_mb_level_rc;
6875 
6876  // profile setting: if user specified profile
6877  if (0 != p_enc->profile)
6878  {
6879  p_t408->profile = p_enc->profile;
6880  }
6881 
6882  p_t408->level = p_enc->level_idc;
6883 
6884  // main, extended or baseline profile of 8 bit (if input is 10 bit, Quadra auto converts to 8 bit) H.264 requires the following:
6885  // main: profile = 2 transform8x8Enable = 0
6886  // extended: profile = 3 entropyCodingMode = 0, transform8x8Enable = 0
6887  // baseline: profile = 1 entropyCodingMode = 0, transform8x8Enable = 0 and
6888  // gop with no B frames (gopPresetIdx=1, 2, 6, or 0
6889  // (custom with no B frames)
6890  if (STD_AVC == p_cfg->ui8bitstreamFormat)
6891  {
6892  if (2 == p_t408->profile)
6893  {
6894  p_t408->enable_transform_8x8 = 0;
6895  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_transform_8x8 set to 0 for profile 2 (main)\n");
6896  }
6897  else if (3 == p_t408->profile || 1 == p_t408->profile)
6898  {
6899  p_t408->entropy_coding_mode = p_t408->enable_transform_8x8 = 0;
6900  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "entropy_coding_mode and enable_transform_8x8 set to 0 "
6901  "for profile 3 (extended) or 1 (baseline)\n");
6902  }
6903  }
6904 
6905  if (QUADRA)
6906  {
6907  if (0 == p_t408->entropy_coding_mode && 1 == p_enc->EnableRdoQuant)
6908  {
6909  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "RDOQ does not support entropy_coding_mode 0 (CAVLC) "
6910  "force EnableRdoQuant 0 to accommodate HW limiation\n");
6911  p_enc->EnableRdoQuant = 0;
6912  }
6913  }
6914 
6915 #ifndef QUADRA
6916  if (!QUADRA)
6917  {
6918  if (GOP_PRESET_IDX_CUSTOM == p_t408->gop_preset_index)
6919  {
6920  p_t408->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size = p_enc->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size;
6921  for (i = 0; i < p_t408->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
6922  {
6923  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type = p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type;
6924  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset = p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset;
6925  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_qp = p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_qp + p_t408->intra_qp;
6926  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pic_L0 = p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pic_L0;
6927  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L0 = p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L0;
6928  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L1 = p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L1;
6929  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id = p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id;
6930  }
6931  }
6932  }
6933  else // QUADRA
6934 #endif
6935  {
6936  if (p_enc->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size &&
6937  (GOP_PRESET_IDX_CUSTOM == p_t408->gop_preset_index ||
6938  GOP_PRESET_IDX_DEFAULT == p_t408->gop_preset_index))
6939  {
6940  p_t408->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size =
6941  p_enc->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size;
6942  for (i = 0; i < p_t408->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
6943  {
6944  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset =
6945  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset;
6946  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_offset =
6947  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_offset;
6948  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_factor =
6949  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_factor;
6950  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id =
6951  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id;
6952  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type =
6953  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type;
6954  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pics =
6955  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pics;
6956  for (int j = 0;
6957  j < p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pics; j++)
6958  {
6959  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic =
6960  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic;
6961  p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic_used =
6962  p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic_used;
6963  }
6964  }
6965  }
6966  }
6967 
6968  p_ctx->key_frame_type = p_t408->decoding_refresh_type; //Store to use when force key p_frame
6969 
6970  // forceFrameType=1 requires intraPeriod=0 and avcIdrPeriod=0 and gopPresetIdx=8
6971  if (1 == p_src->force_frame_type)
6972  {
6973  p_t408->intra_period = 0;
6974  p_t408->avcIdrPeriod = 0;
6975  p_t408->gop_preset_index = 8;
6976  p_ctx->force_frame_type = 1;
6977  }
6978 
6979  p_cfg->hdrEnableVUI = p_src->hdrEnableVUI;
6980 
6981  if (p_cfg->i32hwframes != p_src->hwframes)
6982  {
6983  if (p_src->hwframes && p_ctx->auto_dl_handle == 0)
6984  {
6985  p_cfg->i32hwframes = p_src->hwframes;
6986  }
6987  else
6988  {
6989  p_cfg->i32hwframes = 0;
6990  }
6991  }
6992  p_cfg->ui16rootBufId = p_src->rootBufId;
6993 
6994  //set VUI info deprecated
6995  //p_cfg->ui32VuiDataSizeBits = p_src->ui32VuiDataSizeBits;
6996  //p_cfg->ui32VuiDataSizeBytes = p_src->ui32VuiDataSizeBytes;
6997  //memcpy(p_cfg->ui8VuiRbsp, p_src->ui8VuiRbsp, NI_MAX_VUI_SIZE);
6998  //if ((p_src->pos_num_units_in_tick > p_src->ui32VuiDataSizeBits) || (p_src->pos_time_scale > p_src->ui32VuiDataSizeBits))
6999  //{
7000  // ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() VUI filling error\n", __func__);
7001  // return;
7002  //}
7003  //else
7004  //{
7005  // ni_fix_VUI(p_cfg->ui8VuiRbsp, p_src->pos_num_units_in_tick, p_t408->numUnitsInTick);
7006  // ni_fix_VUI(p_cfg->ui8VuiRbsp, p_src->pos_time_scale, p_t408->timeScale);
7007  //}
7008 
7009  if (p_src->enable_vfr)
7010  {
7011  p_cfg->ui8fixedframerate = 0;
7012  } else
7013  {
7014  p_cfg->ui8fixedframerate = 1;
7015  }
7016 
7017  //new QUADRA param
7018  if (p_enc->EnableAUD != 0)
7019  {
7020  p_cfg->ui8EnableAUD = p_enc->EnableAUD;
7021  }
7022  if (p_enc->lookAheadDepth != 0)
7023  {
7024  p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth = p_enc->lookAheadDepth;
7025  }
7026  if (p_enc->rdoLevel != 1)
7027  {
7028  p_cfg->ui8rdoLevel = p_enc->rdoLevel;
7029  }
7030  if (p_enc->crf != -1)
7031  {
7032  p_cfg->i8crf = p_enc->crf;
7033  }
7034  if (p_enc->HDR10MaxLight != 0)
7035  {
7036  p_cfg->ui16HDR10MaxLight = p_enc->HDR10MaxLight;
7037  }
7038  if (p_enc->HDR10AveLight != 0)
7039  {
7040  p_cfg->ui16HDR10AveLight = p_enc->HDR10AveLight;
7041  }
7042  if (p_enc->HDR10CLLEnable != 0)
7043  {
7044  p_cfg->ui8HDR10CLLEnable = p_enc->HDR10CLLEnable;
7045  }
7046  if (p_enc->HDR10Enable != 0)
7047  {
7048  p_cfg->ui8hdr10_enable = p_enc->HDR10Enable;
7049  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx0 = p_enc->HDR10dx0;
7050  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy0 = p_enc->HDR10dy0;
7051  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx1 = p_enc->HDR10dx1;
7052  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy1 = p_enc->HDR10dy1;
7053  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx2 = p_enc->HDR10dx2;
7054  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy2 = p_enc->HDR10dy2;
7055  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_wx = p_enc->HDR10wx;
7056  p_cfg->ui16hdr10_wy = p_enc->HDR10wy;
7057  p_cfg->ui32hdr10_maxluma = p_enc->HDR10maxluma;
7058  p_cfg->ui32hdr10_minluma = p_enc->HDR10minluma;
7059  }
7060 
7061  if (p_enc->EnableRdoQuant != 0)
7062  {
7063  p_cfg->ui8EnableRdoQuant = p_enc->EnableRdoQuant;
7064  }
7065  if (p_enc->ctbRcMode != 0)
7066  {
7067  p_cfg->ui8ctbRcMode = p_enc->ctbRcMode;
7068  }
7069  if (p_enc->gopSize != 0)
7070  {
7071  p_cfg->ui8gopSize = p_enc->gopSize;
7072  }
7073  if (p_src->use_low_delay_poc_type != 0)
7074  {
7075  p_cfg->ui8useLowDelayPocType = p_src->use_low_delay_poc_type;
7076  }
7077  if (p_enc->gopLowdelay != 0)
7078  {
7079  p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay = p_enc->gopLowdelay;
7080  }
7081  if (p_enc->gdrDuration != 0)
7082  {
7083  p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration = p_enc->gdrDuration;
7084  }
7085  if (p_enc->colorDescPresent)
7086  {
7087  p_cfg->ui8colorDescPresent = 1;
7088  p_cfg->ui8colorPrimaries = p_enc->colorPrimaries;
7089  p_cfg->ui8colorTrc = p_enc->colorTrc;
7090  p_cfg->ui8colorSpace = p_enc->colorSpace;
7091  p_cfg->ui8videoFullRange = p_enc->videoFullRange;
7092  }
7093  if (p_enc->videoFullRange)
7094  {
7095  p_cfg->ui8videoFullRange = p_enc->videoFullRange;
7096  }
7097  if (p_enc->hrdEnable != 0)
7098  {
7099  p_cfg->ui8hrdEnable = p_enc->hrdEnable;
7100  }
7101 
7102  p_cfg->ui8planarFormat = p_src->cfg_enc_params.planar;
7103  p_cfg->ui16aspectRatioWidth = p_enc->aspectRatioWidth;
7104  p_cfg->ui16aspectRatioHeight = p_enc->aspectRatioHeight;
7105 
7106  if (p_enc->ltrRefInterval != 0)
7107  {
7108  p_cfg->ui32ltrRefInterval = p_enc->ltrRefInterval;
7109  p_cfg->i32ltrRefQpOffset = p_enc->ltrRefQpOffset;
7110  p_cfg->ui32ltrFirstGap = p_enc->ltrFirstGap;
7111  p_cfg->ui32ltrNextInterval = p_enc->ltrNextInterval;
7112  }
7113  if (p_enc->multicoreJointMode != 0)
7114  {
7115  p_cfg->ui8multicoreJointMode = p_enc->multicoreJointMode;
7116  }
7117  p_cfg->ui32QLevel = p_enc->qlevel;
7118 
7119  if (p_enc->chromaQpOffset != 0)
7120  {
7121  p_cfg->i8chromaQpOffset = p_enc->chromaQpOffset;
7122  }
7123 
7124  if (p_enc->tolCtbRcInter != 0.1)
7125  {
7126  p_cfg->i32tolCtbRcInter = (int32_t)(p_enc->tolCtbRcInter * 1000);
7127  }
7128 
7129  if (p_enc->tolCtbRcIntra != 0.1)
7130  {
7131  p_cfg->i32tolCtbRcIntra = (int32_t)(p_enc->tolCtbRcIntra * 1000);
7132  }
7133 
7134  if (p_enc->bitrateWindow != -255)
7135  {
7136  p_cfg->i16bitrateWindow = p_enc->bitrateWindow;
7137  }
7138 
7139  if (p_enc->inLoopDSRatio != 1)
7140  {
7141  p_cfg->ui8inLoopDSRatio = p_enc->inLoopDSRatio;
7142  }
7143 
7144  if (p_enc->blockRCSize != 0)
7145  {
7146  p_cfg->ui8blockRCSize = p_enc->blockRCSize;
7147  }
7148 
7149  if (p_enc->rcQpDeltaRange != 10)
7150  {
7151  p_cfg->ui8rcQpDeltaRange = p_enc->rcQpDeltaRange;
7152  }
7153 
7154  // convert enable_mb_level_rc, enable_cu_level_rate_control, and enable_hvs_qp to ctbRcMode
7155  if (QUADRA)
7156  {
7157  // ctbRcMode has priority over enable_mb_level_rc, enable_cu_level_rate_control, and enable_hvs_qp
7158  if (!p_cfg->ui8ctbRcMode)
7159  {
7160  if (p_t408->enable_mb_level_rc || p_t408->enable_cu_level_rate_control)
7161  {
7162  if (p_t408->enable_hvs_qp)
7163  {
7164  p_cfg->ui8ctbRcMode = 3;
7165  }
7166  else
7167  {
7168  p_cfg->ui8ctbRcMode = 2;
7169  }
7170  }
7171  else if (p_t408->enable_hvs_qp)
7172  {
7173  p_cfg->ui8ctbRcMode = 1;
7174  }
7175  }
7176  }
7177 
7178  if (p_src->low_delay_mode != 0)
7179  {
7180  p_cfg->ui8LowDelay = !!(p_src->low_delay_mode);
7181  }
7182 
7183  if (p_enc->enable_ssim != 0)
7184  {
7185  p_cfg->ui8enableSSIM = p_enc->enable_ssim;
7186  }
7187 
7188  if (p_enc->av1_error_resilient_mode != 0)
7189  {
7190  p_cfg->ui8av1ErrResilientMode = p_enc->av1_error_resilient_mode;
7191  }
7192 
7193  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "lowDelay=%d\n", p_src->low_delay_mode);
7194  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8bitstreamFormat=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8bitstreamFormat);
7195  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32picWidth=%d\n", p_cfg->i32picWidth);
7196  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32picHeight=%d\n", p_cfg->i32picHeight);
7197  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32meBlkMode=%d\n", p_cfg->i32meBlkMode);
7198  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8sliceMode=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8sliceMode);
7199  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32frameRateInfo=%d\n", p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo);
7200  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32vbvBufferSize=%d\n", p_cfg->i32vbvBufferSize);
7201  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32userQpMax=%d\n", p_cfg->i32userQpMax);
7202  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enableSSIM=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8enableSSIM);
7203  // AVC only
7204  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32maxIntraSize=%d\n", p_cfg->i32maxIntraSize);
7205  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32userMaxDeltaQp=%d\n", p_cfg->i32userMaxDeltaQp);
7206  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32userMinDeltaQp=%d\n", p_cfg->i32userMinDeltaQp);
7207  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32userQpMin=%d\n", p_cfg->i32userQpMin);
7208  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32bitRate=%d\n", p_cfg->i32bitRate);
7209  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32bitRateBL=%d\n", p_cfg->i32bitRateBL);
7210  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8rcEnable=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8rcEnable);
7211  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32srcBitDepth=%d\n", p_cfg->i32srcBitDepth);
7212  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8enablePTS=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8enablePTS);
7213  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8lowLatencyMode=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8lowLatencyMode);
7214  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui32sourceEndian=%u\n", p_cfg->ui32sourceEndian);
7215  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "hdrEnableVUI=%u\n", p_cfg->hdrEnableVUI);
7216  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32hwframes=%i\n", p_cfg->i32hwframes);
7217 
7218  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "** ni_t408_config_t: \n");
7219  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "profile=%d\n", p_t408->profile);
7220  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "level=%d\n", p_t408->level);
7221  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "tier=%d\n", p_t408->tier);
7222 
7223  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "internalBitDepth=%d\n", p_t408->internalBitDepth);
7224  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "losslessEnable=%d\n", p_t408->losslessEnable);
7225  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "constIntraPredFlag=%d\n", p_t408->constIntraPredFlag);
7226 
7227  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "decoding_refresh_type=%d\n", p_t408->decoding_refresh_type);
7228  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intra_qp=%d\n", p_t408->intra_qp);
7229  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intra_period=%d\n", p_t408->intra_period);
7230  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "roi_enable=%d\n", p_t408->roiEnable);
7231 
7232  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "useLongTerm=%u\n", p_t408->useLongTerm);
7233  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "setLongTermInterval=%u\n", p_cfg->ui32setLongTermInterval);
7234  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "setLongTermCount=%u\n", p_cfg->ui8setLongTermCount);
7235 
7236  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "conf_win_top=%d\n", p_t408->conf_win_top);
7237  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "conf_win_bottom=%d\n", p_t408->conf_win_bottom);
7238  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "conf_win_left=%d\n", p_t408->conf_win_left);
7239  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "conf_win_right=%d\n", p_t408->conf_win_right);
7240 
7241  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "independSliceMode=%d\n", p_t408->independSliceMode);
7242  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "independSliceModeArg=%d\n", p_t408->independSliceModeArg);
7243 
7244  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "dependSliceMode=%d\n", p_t408->dependSliceMode);
7245  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "dependSliceModeArg=%d\n", p_t408->dependSliceModeArg);
7246 
7247  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intraRefreshMode=%d\n", p_t408->intraRefreshMode);
7248 
7249  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intraRefreshArg=%d\n", p_t408->intraRefreshArg);
7250 
7251  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "use_recommend_enc_params=%d\n", p_t408->use_recommend_enc_params);
7252  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "scalingListEnable=%d\n", p_t408->scalingListEnable);
7253 
7254  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "cu_size_mode=%d\n", p_t408->cu_size_mode);
7255  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "tmvpEnable=%d\n", p_t408->tmvpEnable);
7256  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "wppEnable=%d\n", p_t408->wppEnable);
7257  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "max_num_merge=%d\n", p_t408->max_num_merge);
7258  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "disableDeblk=%d\n", p_t408->disableDeblk);
7259  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "lfCrossSliceBoundaryEnable=%d\n", p_t408->lfCrossSliceBoundaryEnable);
7260  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "betaOffsetDiv2=%d\n", p_t408->betaOffsetDiv2);
7261  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "tcOffsetDiv2=%d\n", p_t408->tcOffsetDiv2);
7262  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "skipIntraTrans=%d\n", p_t408->skipIntraTrans);
7263  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "saoEnable=%d\n", p_t408->saoEnable);
7264  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intraNxNEnable=%d\n", p_t408->intraNxNEnable);
7265  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "bitAllocMode=%d\n", p_t408->bitAllocMode);
7266 
7267  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_cu_level_rate_control=%d\n", p_t408->enable_cu_level_rate_control);
7268 
7269  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_hvs_qp=%d\n", p_t408->enable_hvs_qp);
7270 
7271  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "hvs_qp_scale=%d\n", p_t408->hvs_qp_scale);
7272 
7273  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "max_delta_qp=%d\n", p_t408->max_delta_qp);
7274 
7275  // CUSTOM_GOP
7276  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "gop_preset_index=%d\n", p_t408->gop_preset_index);
7277 #ifndef QUADRA
7278  if (!QUADRA)
7279  {
7280  if (p_t408->gop_preset_index == GOP_PRESET_IDX_CUSTOM)
7281  {
7282  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size=%d\n", p_t408->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size);
7283  for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
7284  //for (i = 0; i < p_t408->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
7285  {
7286  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].pic_type=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type);
7287  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].poc_offset=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset);
7288  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].pic_qp=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_qp);
7289  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].num_ref_pic_L0=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pic_L0);
7290  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].ref_poc_L0=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L0);
7291  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].ref_poc_L1=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L1);
7292  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].temporal_id=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id);
7293  }
7294  }
7295  }
7296  else // QUADRA
7297 #endif
7298  {
7299  if (p_t408->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
7300  {
7301  int j;
7302  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size=%d\n", p_t408->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size);
7303  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_GOP_NUM; i++)
7304  {
7305  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].poc_offset=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset);
7306  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].qp_offset=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_offset);
7307  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].qp_factor=%f\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_factor);
7308  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].temporal_id=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id);
7309  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].pic_type=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type);
7310  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].num_ref_pics=%d\n", i, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pics);
7311  for (j = 0; j < NI_MAX_REF_PIC; j++)
7312  {
7313  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].rps[%d].ref_pic=%d\n", i, j, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic);
7314  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].rps[%d].ref_pic_used=%d\n", i, j, p_t408->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic_used);
7315  }
7316  }
7317  }
7318  }
7319 
7320  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "roiEnable=%d\n", p_t408->roiEnable);
7321 
7322  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "numUnitsInTick=%u\n", p_t408->numUnitsInTick);
7323  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "timeScale=%u\n", p_t408->timeScale);
7324  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "numTicksPocDiffOne=%u\n", p_t408->numTicksPocDiffOne);
7325 
7326  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "chromaCbQpOffset=%d\n", p_t408->chromaCbQpOffset);
7327  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "chromaCrQpOffset=%d\n", p_t408->chromaCrQpOffset);
7328 
7329  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "initialRcQp=%d\n", p_t408->initialRcQp);
7330 
7331  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrYEnable=%u\n", p_t408->nrYEnable);
7332  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrCbEnable=%u\n", p_t408->nrCbEnable);
7333  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrCrEnable=%u\n", p_t408->nrCrEnable);
7334 
7335  // ENC_NR_WEIGHT
7336  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrIntraWeightY=%u\n", p_t408->nrIntraWeightY);
7337  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrIntraWeightCb=%u\n", p_t408->nrIntraWeightCb);
7338  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrIntraWeightCr=%u\n", p_t408->nrIntraWeightCr);
7339  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrInterWeightY=%u\n", p_t408->nrInterWeightY);
7340  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrInterWeightCb=%u\n", p_t408->nrInterWeightCb);
7341  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrInterWeightCr=%u\n", p_t408->nrInterWeightCr);
7342 
7343  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrNoiseEstEnable=%u\n", p_t408->nrNoiseEstEnable);
7344  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrNoiseSigmaY=%u\n", p_t408->nrNoiseSigmaY);
7345  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrNoiseSigmaCb=%u\n", p_t408->nrNoiseSigmaCb);
7346  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "nrNoiseSigmaCr=%u\n", p_t408->nrNoiseSigmaCr);
7347 
7348  // newly added for T408
7349  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "monochromeEnable=%u\n", p_t408->monochromeEnable);
7350  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "strongIntraSmoothEnable=%u\n",
7351  p_t408->strongIntraSmoothEnable);
7352 
7353  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "weightPredEnable=%u\n", p_t408->weightPredEnable);
7354  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "bgDetectEnable=%u\n", p_t408->bgDetectEnable);
7355  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "bgThrDiff=%u\n", p_t408->bgThrDiff);
7356  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "bgThrMeanDiff=%u\n", p_t408->bgThrMeanDiff);
7357  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "bgLambdaQp=%u\n", p_t408->bgLambdaQp);
7358  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "bgDeltaQp=%d\n", p_t408->bgDeltaQp);
7359 
7360  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "customLambdaEnable=%u\n", p_t408->customLambdaEnable);
7361  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "customMDEnable=%u\n", p_t408->customMDEnable);
7362  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu04DeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu04DeltaRate);
7363  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu08DeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu08DeltaRate);
7364  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu16DeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu16DeltaRate);
7365  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu32DeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu32DeltaRate);
7366  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu04IntraPlanarDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu04IntraPlanarDeltaRate);
7367  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu04IntraDcDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu04IntraDcDeltaRate);
7368  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu04IntraAngleDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu04IntraAngleDeltaRate);
7369  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu08IntraPlanarDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu08IntraPlanarDeltaRate);
7370  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu08IntraDcDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu08IntraDcDeltaRate);
7371  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu08IntraAngleDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu08IntraAngleDeltaRate);
7372  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu16IntraPlanarDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu16IntraPlanarDeltaRate);
7373  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu16IntraDcDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu16IntraDcDeltaRate);
7374  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu16IntraAngleDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu16IntraAngleDeltaRate);
7375  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu32IntraPlanarDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu32IntraPlanarDeltaRate);
7376  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu32IntraDcDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu32IntraDcDeltaRate);
7377  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "pu32IntraAngleDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->pu32IntraAngleDeltaRate);
7378  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "cu08IntraDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->cu08IntraDeltaRate);
7379  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "cu08InterDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->cu08InterDeltaRate);
7380  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "cu08MergeDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->cu08MergeDeltaRate);
7381  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "cu16IntraDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->cu16IntraDeltaRate);
7382  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "cu16InterDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->cu16InterDeltaRate);
7383  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "cu16MergeDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->cu16MergeDeltaRate);
7384  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "cu32IntraDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->cu32IntraDeltaRate);
7385  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "cu32InterDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->cu32InterDeltaRate);
7386  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "cu32MergeDeltaRate=%d\n", p_t408->cu32MergeDeltaRate);
7387  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "coefClearDisable=%d\n", p_t408->coefClearDisable);
7388  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "minQpI=%d\n", p_t408->minQpI);
7389  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "maxQpI=%d\n", p_t408->maxQpI);
7390  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "minQpP=%d\n", p_t408->minQpP);
7391  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "maxQpP=%d\n", p_t408->maxQpP);
7392  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "minQpB=%d\n", p_t408->minQpB);
7393  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "maxQpB=%d\n", p_t408->maxQpB);
7394 
7395  // for H.264 on T408
7396  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "avcIdrPeriod=%d\n", p_t408->avcIdrPeriod);
7397  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "rdoSkip=%d\n", p_t408->rdoSkip);
7398  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "lambdaScalingEnable=%d\n", p_t408->lambdaScalingEnable);
7399  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_transform_8x8=%d\n", p_t408->enable_transform_8x8);
7400  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "avc_slice_mode=%d\n", p_t408->avc_slice_mode);
7401  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "avc_slice_arg=%d\n", p_t408->avc_slice_arg);
7402  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intra_mb_refresh_mode=%d\n", p_t408->intra_mb_refresh_mode);
7403  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intra_mb_refresh_arg=%d\n", p_t408->intra_mb_refresh_arg);
7404  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_mb_level_rc=%d\n", p_t408->enable_mb_level_rc);
7405  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "entropy_coding_mode=%d\n", p_t408->entropy_coding_mode);
7406  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "forcedHeaderEnable=%u\n", p_t408->forcedHeaderEnable);
7407 
7408  //QUADRA
7409  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8EnableAUD=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8EnableAUD);
7410  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8LookAheadDepth=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth);
7411  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8rdoLevel=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8rdoLevel);
7412  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i8crf=%d\n", p_cfg->i8crf);
7413  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16HDR10MaxLight=%d\n", p_cfg->ui16HDR10MaxLight);
7414  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16HDR10AveLight=%d\n", p_cfg->ui16HDR10AveLight);
7415  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8HDR10CLLEnable=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8HDR10CLLEnable);
7416  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8EnableRdoQuant=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8EnableRdoQuant);
7417  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8ctbRcMode=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8ctbRcMode);
7418  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8gopSize=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8gopSize);
7419  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8useLowDelayPocType=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8useLowDelayPocType);
7420  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8gopLowdelay=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay);
7421  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16gdrDuration=%d\n", p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration);
7422  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8hrdEnable=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8hrdEnable);
7423  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8colorDescPresent=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8colorDescPresent);
7424  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8colorPrimaries=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8colorPrimaries);
7425  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8colorTrc=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8colorTrc);
7426  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8colorSpace=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8colorSpace);
7427  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16aspectRatioWidth=%d\n", p_cfg->ui16aspectRatioWidth);
7428  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16aspectRatioHeight=%d\n", p_cfg->ui16aspectRatioHeight);
7429  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16rootBufId=%d\n", p_cfg->ui16rootBufId);
7430  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8planarFormat=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8planarFormat);
7431  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui32ltrRefInterval=%u\n", p_cfg->ui32ltrRefInterval);
7432  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32ltrRefQpOffset=%d\n", p_cfg->i32ltrRefQpOffset);
7433  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui32ltrFirstGap=%u\n", p_cfg->ui32ltrFirstGap);
7434  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui32ltrNextInterval=%u\n", p_cfg->ui32ltrNextInterval);
7435  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8multicoreJointMode=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8multicoreJointMode);
7436  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8videoFullRange=%u\n", p_cfg->ui8videoFullRange);
7437  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui32QLevel=%u\n", p_cfg->ui32QLevel);
7438  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i8chromaQpOffset=%d\n", p_cfg->i8chromaQpOffset);
7439  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32tolCtbRcInter=0x%x\n", p_cfg->i32tolCtbRcInter);
7440  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i32tolCtbRcIntra=0x%x\n", p_cfg->i32tolCtbRcIntra);
7441  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "i16bitrateWindow=%d\n", p_cfg->i16bitrateWindow);
7442  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8inLoopDSRatio=%u\n", p_cfg->ui8inLoopDSRatio);
7443  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8blockRCSize=%u\n", p_cfg->ui8blockRCSize);
7444  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8rcQpDeltaRange=%u\n", p_cfg->ui8rcQpDeltaRange);
7445  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8LowDelay=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8LowDelay);
7446  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8hdr10_enable=%u\n", p_cfg->ui8hdr10_enable);
7447  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16hdr10_dx0=%u\n", p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx0);
7448  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16hdr10_dy0=%u\n", p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy0);
7449  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16hdr10_dx1=%u\n", p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx1);
7450  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16hdr10_dy1=%u\n", p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy1);
7451  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16hdr10_dx2=%u\n", p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dx2);
7452  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16hdr10_dy2=%u\n", p_cfg->ui16hdr10_dy2);
7453  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16hdr10_wx=%u\n", p_cfg->ui16hdr10_wx);
7454  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui16hdr10_wy=%u\n", p_cfg->ui16hdr10_wy);
7455  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui32hdr10_maxluma=%u\n", p_cfg->ui32hdr10_maxluma);
7456  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui32hdr10_minluma=%u\n", p_cfg->ui32hdr10_minluma);
7457  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8av1ErrResilientMode=%u\n", p_cfg->ui8av1ErrResilientMode);
7458  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ui8intraResetRefresh=%d\n", p_cfg->ui8intraResetRefresh);
7459 }
7460 
7461 /*!******************************************************************************
7462  * \brief Setup and initialize all xcoder configuration to default (Rev. B)
7463  *
7464  * \param
7465  *
7466  * \return
7467  ******************************************************************************/
7468 void ni_set_default_template(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_encoder_config_t* p_config)
7469 {
7470  uint8_t i = 0;
7471 
7472  if( (!p_ctx) || (!p_config) )
7473  {
7474  ni_log(
7475  NI_LOG_ERROR,
7476  "ERROR: ni_set_default_template() Null pointer parameters passed\n",
7477  __func__);
7478  return;
7479  }
7480 
7481  memset(p_config, 0, sizeof(ni_encoder_config_t));
7482 
7483  // fill in common attributes values
7484  p_config->i32picWidth = 720;
7485  p_config->i32picHeight = 480;
7486  p_config->i32meBlkMode = 0; // (AVC ONLY) 0 means use all possible block partitions
7487  p_config->ui8sliceMode = 0; // 0 means 1 slice per picture
7488  p_config->i32frameRateInfo = 30;
7489  p_config->i32frameRateDenominator = 1;
7490  p_config->i32vbvBufferSize = 3000; //0; parameter is ignored if rate control is off, if rate control is on, 0 means do not check vbv constraints
7491  p_config->i32userQpMax = 51; // this should also be h264-only parameter
7492 
7493  // AVC only
7494  if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264 == p_ctx->codec_format)
7495  {
7496  p_config->i32maxIntraSize = 8000000; // how big an intra p_frame can get?
7497  p_config->i32userMaxDeltaQp = 51;
7498  p_config->i32userMinDeltaQp = 51;
7499  p_config->i32userQpMin = 8;
7500  }
7501 
7502  p_config->i32bitRate = 0;
7503  p_config->i32bitRateBL = 0; // no documentation on this parameter in documents
7504  p_config->ui8rcEnable = 0;
7505  p_config->i32srcBitDepth = p_ctx->src_bit_depth;
7506  p_config->ui8enablePTS = 0;
7507  p_config->ui8lowLatencyMode = 0;
7508 
7509  // profiles for H.264: 1 = baseline, 2 = main, 3 = extended, 4 = high
7510  // 5 = high10 (default 8 bit: 4, 10 bit: 5)
7511  // profiles for HEVC: 1 = main, 2 = main10 (default 8 bit: 1, 10 bit: 2)
7512 
7513  // bitstream type: H.264 or HEVC
7514  if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264 == p_ctx->codec_format)
7515  {
7516  p_config->ui8bitstreamFormat = STD_AVC;
7517 
7518  p_config->niParamT408.profile = 4;
7519  if (10 == p_ctx->src_bit_depth)
7520  {
7521  p_config->niParamT408.profile = 5;
7522  }
7523  } else if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_JPEG == p_ctx->codec_format)
7524  {
7525  p_config->ui8bitstreamFormat = STD_JPEG;
7526  } else if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_AV1 == p_ctx->codec_format)
7527  {
7528  p_config->ui8bitstreamFormat = STD_AV1;
7529 
7530  p_config->niParamT408.profile = 1;
7531  } else
7532  {
7533  ni_assert(NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H265 == p_ctx->codec_format);
7534 
7535  p_config->ui8bitstreamFormat = STD_HEVC;
7536 
7537  p_config->niParamT408.profile = 1;
7538  if (10 == p_ctx->src_bit_depth)
7539  {
7540  p_config->niParamT408.profile = 2;
7541  }
7542  }
7543 
7544  p_config->hdrEnableVUI = 0;
7545  p_config->ui32sourceEndian = p_ctx->src_endian;
7546 
7547  p_config->niParamT408.level = 0;
7548  p_config->niParamT408.tier = 0; // 0 means main tier
7549 
7550  p_config->niParamT408.internalBitDepth = p_ctx->src_bit_depth;
7551  p_config->niParamT408.losslessEnable = 0;
7552  p_config->niParamT408.constIntraPredFlag = 0;
7553 
7554  if (QUADRA)
7555  p_config->niParamT408.gop_preset_index = GOP_PRESET_IDX_DEFAULT;
7556  else
7557  p_config->niParamT408.gop_preset_index = GOP_PRESET_IDX_IBBBP;
7558 
7559  p_config->niParamT408.decoding_refresh_type = 1;
7560  p_config->niParamT408.intra_qp = 22;
7561  // avcIdrPeriod (H.264 on T408), NOT shared with intra_period
7562  p_config->niParamT408.intra_period = 120;
7563  p_config->niParamT408.avcIdrPeriod = 120;
7564 
7565  p_config->niParamT408.conf_win_top = 0;
7566  p_config->niParamT408.conf_win_bottom = 0;
7567  p_config->niParamT408.conf_win_left = 0;
7568  p_config->niParamT408.conf_win_right = 0;
7569 
7570  p_config->niParamT408.independSliceMode = 0;
7571  p_config->niParamT408.independSliceModeArg = 0;
7572  p_config->niParamT408.dependSliceMode = 0;
7573  p_config->niParamT408.dependSliceModeArg = 0;
7574  p_config->niParamT408.intraRefreshMode = 0;
7575  p_config->niParamT408.intraRefreshArg = 0;
7576 
7577  p_config->niParamT408.use_recommend_enc_params = 0; //1;
7578  p_config->niParamT408.scalingListEnable = 0;
7579 
7580  p_config->niParamT408.cu_size_mode = 7;
7581  p_config->niParamT408.tmvpEnable = 1;
7582  p_config->niParamT408.wppEnable = 0;
7583  p_config->niParamT408.max_num_merge = 2;
7584  p_config->niParamT408.disableDeblk = 0;
7585  p_config->niParamT408.lfCrossSliceBoundaryEnable = 1;
7586  p_config->niParamT408.betaOffsetDiv2 = 0;
7587  p_config->niParamT408.tcOffsetDiv2 = 0;
7588  p_config->niParamT408.skipIntraTrans = 1;
7589  p_config->niParamT408.saoEnable = 1;
7590  p_config->niParamT408.intraNxNEnable = 1;
7591 
7592  p_config->niParamT408.bitAllocMode = 0;
7593 
7594  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_GOP_NUM; i++)
7595  {
7596  p_config->niParamT408.fixedBitRatio[i] = 1;
7597  }
7598 
7599  if (QUADRA)
7600  p_config->niParamT408.enable_cu_level_rate_control = 0;
7601  else
7602  p_config->niParamT408.enable_cu_level_rate_control = 1;
7603 
7604  p_config->niParamT408.enable_hvs_qp = 0;
7605  p_config->niParamT408.hvs_qp_scale = 2;
7606 
7607  p_config->niParamT408.max_delta_qp = 10;
7608 
7609  // CUSTOM_GOP
7610  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size = 0;
7611 #ifndef QUADRA
7612  if (!QUADRA)
7613  {
7614  for (i = 0; i < p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
7615  {
7616  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type = PIC_TYPE_I;
7617  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset = 0;
7618  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_qp = 0;
7619  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pic_L0 = 0;
7620  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L0 = 0;
7621  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L1 = 0;
7622  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id = 0;
7623  }
7624  }
7625  else // QUADRA
7626 #endif
7627  {
7628  int j;
7629  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_GOP_NUM; i++)
7630  {
7631  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset = 0;
7632  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_offset = 0;
7633  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_factor =
7634  (float)0.3; // QP Factor range is between 0.3 and 1, higher values mean lower quality and less bits
7635  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id = 0;
7636  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type = PIC_TYPE_I;
7637  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pics= 0;
7638  for (j = 0; j < NI_MAX_REF_PIC; j++)
7639  {
7640  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic = 0;
7641  p_config->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic_used = 0;
7642  }
7643  }
7644  }
7645 
7646  p_config->niParamT408.roiEnable = 0;
7647 
7648  p_config->niParamT408.numUnitsInTick = 1000;
7649  p_config->niParamT408.timeScale = p_config->i32frameRateInfo * 1000;
7650  if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264 == p_ctx->codec_format)
7651  {
7652  p_config->niParamT408.timeScale *= 2;
7653  }
7654 
7655  p_config->niParamT408.numTicksPocDiffOne = 0;
7656 
7657  p_config->niParamT408.chromaCbQpOffset = 0;
7658  p_config->niParamT408.chromaCrQpOffset = 0;
7659 
7660  p_config->niParamT408.initialRcQp = 63; //-1;
7661 
7662  p_config->niParamT408.nrYEnable = 0;
7663  p_config->niParamT408.nrCbEnable = 0;
7664  p_config->niParamT408.nrCrEnable = 0;
7665 
7666  // ENC_NR_WEIGHT
7667  p_config->niParamT408.nrIntraWeightY = 7;
7668  p_config->niParamT408.nrIntraWeightCb = 7;
7669  p_config->niParamT408.nrIntraWeightCr = 7;
7670  p_config->niParamT408.nrInterWeightY = 4;
7671  p_config->niParamT408.nrInterWeightCb = 4;
7672  p_config->niParamT408.nrInterWeightCr = 4;
7673 
7674  p_config->niParamT408.nrNoiseEstEnable = 0;
7675  p_config->niParamT408.nrNoiseSigmaY = 0;
7676  p_config->niParamT408.nrNoiseSigmaCb = 0;
7677  p_config->niParamT408.nrNoiseSigmaCr = 0;
7678 
7679  p_config->niParamT408.useLongTerm = 0;
7680 
7681  // newly added for T408
7682  p_config->niParamT408.monochromeEnable = 0;
7683  p_config->niParamT408.strongIntraSmoothEnable = 1;
7684 
7685  p_config->niParamT408.weightPredEnable = 0;
7686  p_config->niParamT408.bgDetectEnable = 0;
7687  p_config->niParamT408.bgThrDiff = 8; // matching the C-model
7688  p_config->niParamT408.bgThrMeanDiff = 1; // matching the C-model
7689  p_config->niParamT408.bgLambdaQp = 32; // matching the C-model
7690  p_config->niParamT408.bgDeltaQp = 3; // matching the C-model
7691 
7692  p_config->niParamT408.customLambdaEnable = 0;
7693  p_config->niParamT408.customMDEnable = 0;
7694  p_config->niParamT408.pu04DeltaRate = 0;
7695  p_config->niParamT408.pu08DeltaRate = 0;
7696  p_config->niParamT408.pu16DeltaRate = 0;
7697  p_config->niParamT408.pu32DeltaRate = 0;
7698  p_config->niParamT408.pu04IntraPlanarDeltaRate = 0;
7699  p_config->niParamT408.pu04IntraDcDeltaRate = 0;
7700  p_config->niParamT408.pu04IntraAngleDeltaRate = 0;
7701  p_config->niParamT408.pu08IntraPlanarDeltaRate = 0;
7702  p_config->niParamT408.pu08IntraDcDeltaRate = 0;
7703  p_config->niParamT408.pu08IntraAngleDeltaRate = 0;
7704  p_config->niParamT408.pu16IntraPlanarDeltaRate = 0;
7705  p_config->niParamT408.pu16IntraDcDeltaRate = 0;
7706  p_config->niParamT408.pu16IntraAngleDeltaRate = 0;
7707  p_config->niParamT408.pu32IntraPlanarDeltaRate = 0;
7708  p_config->niParamT408.pu32IntraDcDeltaRate = 0;
7709  p_config->niParamT408.pu32IntraAngleDeltaRate = 0;
7710  p_config->niParamT408.cu08IntraDeltaRate = 0;
7711  p_config->niParamT408.cu08InterDeltaRate = 0;
7712  p_config->niParamT408.cu08MergeDeltaRate = 0;
7713  p_config->niParamT408.cu16IntraDeltaRate = 0;
7714  p_config->niParamT408.cu16InterDeltaRate = 0;
7715  p_config->niParamT408.cu16MergeDeltaRate = 0;
7716  p_config->niParamT408.cu32IntraDeltaRate = 0;
7717  p_config->niParamT408.cu32InterDeltaRate = 0;
7718  p_config->niParamT408.cu32MergeDeltaRate = 0;
7719  p_config->niParamT408.coefClearDisable = 0;
7720  p_config->niParamT408.minQpI = 8;
7721  p_config->niParamT408.maxQpI = 51;
7722  p_config->niParamT408.minQpP = 8;
7723  p_config->niParamT408.maxQpP = 51;
7724  p_config->niParamT408.minQpB = 8;
7725  p_config->niParamT408.maxQpB = 51;
7726 
7727  // for H.264 on T408
7728  p_config->niParamT408.rdoSkip = 0;
7729  p_config->niParamT408.lambdaScalingEnable = 0;
7730  p_config->niParamT408.enable_transform_8x8 = 1;
7731  p_config->niParamT408.avc_slice_mode = 0;
7732  p_config->niParamT408.avc_slice_arg = 0;
7733  p_config->niParamT408.intra_mb_refresh_mode = 0;
7734  p_config->niParamT408.intra_mb_refresh_arg = 0;
7735  if (QUADRA)
7736  p_config->niParamT408.enable_mb_level_rc = 0;
7737  else
7738  p_config->niParamT408.enable_mb_level_rc = 1;
7739  p_config->niParamT408.entropy_coding_mode = 1; // 1 means CABAC, make sure profile is main or above, can't have CABAC in baseline
7740  p_config->niParamT408.forcedHeaderEnable = 0; // first IDR frame
7741 
7742  //QUADRA
7743  p_config->ui8EnableAUD = 0;
7744  p_config->ui8LookAheadDepth = 0;
7745  p_config->ui8rdoLevel = 1;
7746  p_config->i8crf = -1;
7747  p_config->ui16HDR10MaxLight = 0;
7748  p_config->ui16HDR10AveLight = 0;
7749  p_config->ui8HDR10CLLEnable = 0;
7750  p_config->ui8EnableRdoQuant = 0;
7751  p_config->ui8ctbRcMode = 0;
7752  p_config->ui8gopSize = 0;
7753  p_config->ui8useLowDelayPocType = 0;
7754  p_config->ui8gopLowdelay = 0;
7755  p_config->ui16gdrDuration = 0;
7756  p_config->ui8hrdEnable = 0;
7757  p_config->ui8colorDescPresent = 0;
7758  p_config->ui8colorPrimaries = 0;
7759  p_config->ui8colorTrc = 0;
7760  p_config->ui8colorSpace = 0;
7761  p_config->ui16aspectRatioWidth = 0;
7762  p_config->ui16aspectRatioHeight = 0;
7763  p_config->ui8planarFormat = NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_PLANAR;
7764  p_config->ui32ltrRefInterval = 0;
7765  p_config->i32ltrRefQpOffset = 0;
7766  p_config->ui32ltrFirstGap= 0;
7767  p_config->ui32ltrNextInterval = 1;
7768  p_config->ui8multicoreJointMode = 0;
7769  p_config->ui8videoFullRange = 0;
7770  p_config->ui32setLongTermInterval = 0;
7771  p_config->ui8setLongTermCount = 2;
7772  p_config->ui32QLevel = -1;
7773  p_config->i8chromaQpOffset = 0;
7774  p_config->i32tolCtbRcInter = (int32_t)(0.1 * 1000);
7775  p_config->i32tolCtbRcIntra = (int32_t)(0.1 * 1000);
7776  p_config->i16bitrateWindow = -255;
7777  p_config->ui8inLoopDSRatio = 1;
7778  p_config->ui8blockRCSize = 0;
7779  p_config->ui8rcQpDeltaRange = 10;
7780  p_config->ui8LowDelay = 0;
7781  p_config->ui8fixedframerate = 1;
7782  p_config->ui8enableSSIM = 0;
7783  p_config->ui8hdr10_enable = 0;
7784  p_config->ui16hdr10_dx0 = 0;
7785  p_config->ui16hdr10_dy0 = 0;
7786  p_config->ui16hdr10_dx1 = 0;
7787  p_config->ui16hdr10_dy1 = 0;
7788  p_config->ui16hdr10_dx2 = 0;
7789  p_config->ui16hdr10_dy2 = 0;
7790  p_config->ui16hdr10_wx = 0;
7791  p_config->ui16hdr10_wy = 0;
7792  p_config->ui32hdr10_maxluma = 0;
7793  p_config->ui32hdr10_minluma = 0;
7794  p_config->ui8av1ErrResilientMode = 0;
7795  p_config->ui8intraResetRefresh = 0;
7796 }
7797 
7798 /*!******************************************************************************
7799 * \brief Perform validation on custom dec parameters (Rev. B)
7800 *
7801 * \param
7802 *
7803 * \return
7804 ******************************************************************************/
7805 ni_retcode_t ni_validate_custom_dec_template(ni_xcoder_params_t *p_src,
7806  ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
7807  ni_decoder_config_t *p_cfg,
7808  char *p_param_err,
7809  uint32_t max_err_len)
7810 {
7811  ni_retcode_t param_ret = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7812  ni_retcode_t warning = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
7813  int w = p_src->source_width;
7814  int h = p_src->source_height;
7815  char *p_param_warn = NULL;
7816  int i;
7817 
7818  if (!p_ctx || !p_cfg || !p_param_err)
7819  {
7820  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Null pointer parameters passed\n",
7821  __func__);
7822  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7823  LRETURN;
7824  }
7825 
7826  // Zero out the error buffer
7827  p_param_warn = malloc(sizeof(p_ctx->param_err_msg));
7828  if (!p_param_warn)
7829  {
7830  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() p_param_warn malloc failure\n",
7831  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
7832  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
7833  LRETURN;
7834  }
7835 
7836  memset(p_param_err, 0, max_err_len);
7837  memset(p_param_warn, 0, max_err_len);
7838 
7839 
7840  //if (p_cfg->i32bitRate > NI_MAX_BITRATE)
7841  //{
7842  // strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid i32bitRate: too big", max_err_len);
7843  // param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_BRATE;
7844  // LRETURN;
7845  //}
7846 
7847  if (p_cfg->ui8HWFrame == 0 &&
7848  (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[1].ui8Enabled || p_cfg->asOutputConfig[2].ui8Enabled))
7849  {
7850  strncpy(p_param_err, "Incompatible output format: hw frame must be used if out1 or out2 used", max_err_len);
7851  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
7852  LRETURN;
7853  }
7854 
7855  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_NUM_OF_DECODER_OUTPUTS; i++)
7856  {
7857  //checking cropping param
7858  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8CropMode == NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_MANUAL)
7859  {
7860  if (NI_MINIMUM_CROPPED_LENGTH > w - p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16X ||
7861  NI_MINIMUM_CROPPED_LENGTH > h - p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16Y)
7862  {
7863  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid crop offset: extends past 48x48 minimum window", max_err_len);
7864  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
7865  LRETURN;
7866  }
7867  if (NI_MINIMUM_CROPPED_LENGTH > p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16W ||
7868  NI_MINIMUM_CROPPED_LENGTH > p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16H)
7869  {
7870  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid crop w or h: must be at least 48x48 minimum window", max_err_len);
7871  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_SMALL;
7872  LRETURN;
7873  }
7874  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16W > w ||
7875  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16H > h)
7876  {
7877  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid crop w or h: must be smaller than input", max_err_len);
7878  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
7879  LRETURN;
7880  }
7881  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16W + p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16X > w ||
7882  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16H + p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16Y > h)
7883  {
7884  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid crop rect: must fit in input", max_err_len);
7885  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
7886  LRETURN;
7887  }
7888  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16X & 1 ||
7889  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16Y & 1 ||
7890  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16W & 1 ||
7891  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16H & 1)
7892  {
7893  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid crop value: even values only", max_err_len);
7894  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
7895  LRETURN;
7896  }
7897  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8Enabled == 0)
7898  {
7899  strncpy(p_param_warn, "crop param used but output not enabled!", max_err_len);
7900  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
7901  }
7902 
7903  }
7904 
7905  //checking scaling param
7906  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8ScaleEnabled)
7907  {
7908  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Height > h ||
7909  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Width > w)
7910  { //may need to revisit if based on cropped input or base input for w/h limit
7911  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid scale dimensions: must downscale only", max_err_len);
7912  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
7913  LRETURN;
7914  }
7915  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Height == 0 ||
7916  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Width == 0)
7917  { //may need to revisit if based on cropped input or base input for w/h limit
7918  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid scale dimensions: zero", max_err_len);
7919  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_TOO_SMALL;
7920  LRETURN;
7921  }
7922  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Height & 1 ||
7923  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Width & 1 )
7924  {
7925  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid scale value: even values only", max_err_len);
7926  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
7927  LRETURN;
7928  }
7929  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8CropMode == NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_MANUAL)
7930  {
7931  //reject if scale dimensions exceed crop dimensions
7932  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Height > p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16H ||
7933  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Width > p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16W)
7934  {
7935  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid scale dimensions: downscale only after cropping", max_err_len);
7936  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
7937  LRETURN;
7938  }
7939  }
7940  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8Enabled == 0)
7941  {
7942  strncpy(p_param_warn, "scale param used but output not enabled!", max_err_len);
7943  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
7944  }
7945  }
7946  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8Enabled == 0)
7947  {
7948  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8Force8Bit || p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8SemiPlanarEnabled)
7949  {
7950  strncpy(p_param_warn, "force8bit or semiPlanar used but output not enabled!", max_err_len);
7951  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
7952  }
7953  }
7954 
7955  //check tiled format compatibility
7956  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8SemiPlanarEnabled == NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_TILED4X4)
7957  {
7958  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8Enabled == 0)
7959  {
7960  continue;
7961  }
7962  if (p_cfg->ui8HWFrame == 0)
7963  {
7964  strncpy(p_param_err,
7965  "Invalid pairing: out=HW must be set with tiled format",
7966  max_err_len);
7967  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
7968  LRETURN;
7969  }
7970  if (p_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_VP9)
7971  {
7972  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid pairing: VP9 not compatible with tiled format",
7973  max_err_len);
7974  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
7975  LRETURN;
7976  }
7977  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8ScaleEnabled)
7978  {
7979  //only no need to check crop compat if scale is set
7980  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Height % 4 ||
7981  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Height < 128)
7982  {
7983  strncpy(p_param_err,
7984  "Invalid scale height: mult of 4 only, >= 128",
7985  max_err_len);
7986  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
7987  LRETURN;
7988  }
7989  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Width % 4 ||
7990  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sOutputPictureSize.ui16Width < NI_MIN_WIDTH)
7991  {
7992  //minimum supported dec is 128 but min enc is 144 so round up
7993  strncpy(p_param_err,
7994  "Invalid scale width: mult of 128 only, >= 144",
7995  max_err_len);
7996  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
7997  LRETURN;
7998  }
7999  }
8000  else if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8CropMode == NI_DEC_CROP_MODE_MANUAL)
8001  {
8002  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16H % 4 ||
8003  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16H < 128)
8004  {
8005  strncpy(p_param_err,
8006  "Invalid crop height: mult of 4 only, >= 128",
8007  max_err_len);
8008  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
8009  LRETURN;
8010  }
8011  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16W % 4 ||
8012  p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].sCroppingRectable.ui16W < NI_MIN_WIDTH)
8013  {
8014  //minimum supported dec is 128 but min enc is 144 so round up
8015  strncpy(p_param_err,
8016  "Invalid crop width: mult of 128 only, >= 144",
8017  max_err_len);
8018  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
8019  LRETURN;
8020  }
8021  }
8022  if (p_cfg->asOutputConfig[i].ui8Force8Bit)
8023  {
8024  strncpy(p_param_err, "Force 8 bit: not supported with tiled format\n",
8025  max_err_len);
8026  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
8027  LRETURN;
8028  }
8029  }
8030 
8031  }//end forloop
8032  if (warning == NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN && param_ret == NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
8033  {
8034  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8035  strncpy(p_param_err, p_param_warn, max_err_len);
8036  }
8037 
8038 END:
8039 
8040  ni_aligned_free(p_param_warn);
8041  return param_ret;
8042 }
8043 
8044 // Check encoder level parameters
8045 static ni_retcode_t ni_check_level(int level, int codec_id)
8046 {
8047  const int l_levels_264[] = {10, 11, 12, 13, 20, 21, 22, 30, 31, 32,
8048  40, 41, 42, 50, 51, 52, 60, 61, 62, 0};
8049  const int l_levels_265[] = {10, 20, 21, 30, 31, 40, 41,
8050  50, 51, 52, 60, 61, 62, 0};
8051  const int l_levels_av1[] = {20, 21, 30, 31, 40, 41, 50, 51, 0};
8052  const int *l_levels = l_levels_264;
8053 
8054  if (level == 0)
8055  {
8056  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
8057  }
8058 
8059  if (codec_id == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H265)
8060  {
8061  l_levels = l_levels_265;
8062  } else if (codec_id == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_AV1)
8063  {
8064  l_levels = l_levels_av1;
8065  }
8066 
8067  while (*l_levels != 0)
8068  {
8069  if (*l_levels == level)
8070  {
8071  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
8072  }
8073  l_levels++;
8074  }
8075 
8076  return NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
8077 }
8078 
8079 /*!******************************************************************************
8080  * \brief Perform validation on custom parameters (Rev. B)
8081  *
8082  * \param
8083  *
8084  * \return
8085  ******************************************************************************/
8086 ni_retcode_t ni_validate_custom_template(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
8087  ni_encoder_config_t *p_cfg,
8088  ni_xcoder_params_t *p_src,
8089  char *p_param_err,
8090  uint32_t max_err_len)
8091 {
8092  ni_retcode_t param_ret = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
8093  ni_retcode_t warning = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
8094  char* p_param_warn = malloc(sizeof(p_ctx->param_err_msg));
8095  int i;
8096 
8097  if( (!p_ctx) || (!p_cfg) || (!p_src) || (!p_param_err) )
8098  {
8099  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Null pointer parameters passed\n",
8100  __func__);
8101  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8102  LRETURN;
8103  }
8104 
8105  //Zero out the error buffer
8106  memset(p_param_err, 0, max_err_len);
8107  memset(p_param_warn, 0, max_err_len);
8108 
8109  if (0 == p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo)
8110  {
8111  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid frame_rate of 0 value", max_err_len);
8112  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_FRATE;
8113  LRETURN;
8114  }
8115 
8116  if (((p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo + p_cfg->i32frameRateDenominator - 1) /
8117  p_cfg->i32frameRateDenominator) > NI_MAX_FRAMERATE)
8118  {
8119  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid i32frameRateInfo: too big", max_err_len);
8120  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_FRATE;
8121  LRETURN;
8122  }
8123 
8124  if (p_cfg->i32bitRate <= p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo)
8125  {
8126  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid i32bitRate: smaller than or equal to frame rate", max_err_len);
8127  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_BRATE;
8128  LRETURN;
8129  }
8130 
8131  if (p_cfg->i32bitRate > NI_MAX_BITRATE)
8132  {
8133  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid i32bitRate: too big", max_err_len);
8134  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_BRATE;
8135  LRETURN;
8136  }
8137 
8138  if (p_cfg->i32bitRate < NI_MIN_BITRATE )
8139  {
8140  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid i32bitRate: too low", max_err_len);
8141  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_BRATE;
8142  LRETURN;
8143  }
8144 
8145  if (p_src->source_width < XCODER_MIN_ENC_PIC_WIDTH)
8146  {
8147  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid Picture Width: too small", max_err_len);
8148  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_PIC_WIDTH;
8149  LRETURN;
8150  }
8151 
8152  if (p_src->source_width > XCODER_MAX_ENC_PIC_WIDTH)
8153  {
8154  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid Picture Width: too big", max_err_len);
8155  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_PIC_WIDTH;
8156  LRETURN;
8157  }
8158 
8159  if (p_src->source_height < XCODER_MIN_ENC_PIC_HEIGHT)
8160  {
8161  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid Picture Height: too small", max_err_len);
8162  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_PIC_HEIGHT;
8163  LRETURN;
8164  }
8165 
8166  if (p_src->source_height > XCODER_MAX_ENC_PIC_HEIGHT)
8167  {
8168  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid Picture Height: too big", max_err_len);
8169  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_PIC_HEIGHT;
8170  LRETURN;
8171  }
8172 
8173  if (p_cfg->ui8planarFormat >= NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_MAX)
8174  {
8175  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid input planar format: out of range", max_err_len);
8176  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
8177  LRETURN;
8178  }
8179  else if (p_cfg->ui8planarFormat == NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_TILED4X4)
8180  {
8181  if (!is_fw_rev_higher(p_ctx, (uint8_t)'6', (uint8_t)'7'))
8182  {
8183  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid input planar format: FW version < 6.8",
8184  max_err_len);
8185  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_FW_VERSION;
8186  LRETURN;
8187  }
8188  if (p_ctx->auto_dl_handle)
8189  {
8190  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid Encoder Selected: Tiled format must be on same device",
8191  max_err_len);
8192  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_HANDLE;
8193  LRETURN;
8194  }
8195  if (p_src->source_height % 4 != 0)
8196  {
8197  strncpy(p_param_err,
8198  "Invalid Picture Height: tiled format only supports "
8199  "multiples of 4",
8200  max_err_len);
8201  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_PIC_HEIGHT;
8202  LRETURN;
8203  }
8204  if (p_src->source_width % 4 != 0)
8205  {
8206  strncpy(p_param_err,
8207  "Invalid Picture Width: tiled format only supports "
8208  "multiples of 4",
8209  max_err_len);
8210  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_PIC_WIDTH;
8211  LRETURN;
8212  }
8213  }
8214  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS !=
8215  ni_check_level(p_src->cfg_enc_params.level_idc, p_ctx->codec_format))
8216  {
8217  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid Encoder Level: out of range", max_err_len);
8218  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
8219  LRETURN;
8220  }
8221 
8222  if ((p_src->cfg_enc_params.intra_mb_refresh_mode < 0 ||
8223  p_src->cfg_enc_params.intra_mb_refresh_mode > 4) ||
8224  (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264 == p_ctx->codec_format &&
8225  p_src->cfg_enc_params.intra_mb_refresh_mode == 4))
8226  {
8227  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid intra_mb_refresh_mode: out of range",
8228  max_err_len);
8229  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_OOR;
8230  LRETURN;
8231  }
8232 
8233  if (!QUADRA)
8234  {
8235  if (GOP_PRESET_IDX_CUSTOM == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8236  {
8237  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size < 1)
8238  {
8239  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom GOP paramaters: custom_gop_size too small", max_err_len);
8240  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
8241  LRETURN;
8242  }
8243  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size >
8244  NI_MAX_GOP_NUM)
8245  {
8246  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom GOP paramaters: custom_gop_size too big", max_err_len);
8247  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
8248  LRETURN;
8249  }
8250  }
8251  }
8252  else // QUADRA
8253  {
8254  if (GOP_PRESET_IDX_CUSTOM == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8255  {
8256  if (!p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
8257  {
8258  strncpy(p_param_err,
8259  "Invalid custom GOP paramaters: custom gop size must > 0",
8260  max_err_len);
8261  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
8262  LRETURN;
8263  }
8264  }
8265  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
8266  {
8267  if (GOP_PRESET_IDX_CUSTOM != p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index &&
8268  GOP_PRESET_IDX_DEFAULT != p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8269  {
8270  strncpy(p_param_err,
8271  "Invalid custom GOP paramaters: selected gopPresetIdx is "
8272  "not compatible with custom gop",
8273  max_err_len);
8274  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
8275  LRETURN;
8276  }
8277  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size < 1)
8278  {
8279  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom GOP paramaters: custom_gop_size too small", max_err_len);
8280  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
8281  LRETURN;
8282  }
8283  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size >
8284  NI_MAX_GOP_NUM)
8285  {
8286  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom GOP paramaters: custom_gop_size too big", max_err_len);
8287  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
8288  LRETURN;
8289  }
8290 
8291  for (i = 0; i < p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
8292  {
8293  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset >
8294  p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
8295  {
8296  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom gop parameters: poc_offset larger"
8297  " than GOP size", max_err_len);
8298  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
8299  LRETURN;
8300  }
8301  }
8302  }
8303 
8304  if(p_cfg->ui8enableSSIM != 0)
8305  {
8306  if (!is_fw_rev_higher(p_ctx, (uint8_t)'6', (uint8_t)'1'))
8307  {
8308  p_cfg->ui8enableSSIM = 0;
8309  strncpy(p_param_warn, "enableSSIM is not supported for FW lower than Rev 62. All ssim will be 0.", max_err_len);
8310  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8311  }
8312  if ((NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264 != p_ctx->codec_format) && (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H265 != p_ctx->codec_format))
8313  {
8314  p_cfg->ui8enableSSIM = 0;
8315  strncpy(p_param_warn, "enableSSIM is only supported on H.264 or H.265", max_err_len);
8316  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8317  }
8318  }
8319  }
8320 
8321  if (QUADRA)
8322  {
8323  if (p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth != 0)
8324  {
8325  if (1 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index ||
8326  3 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index ||
8327  7 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index ||
8328  9 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8329  {
8330  strncpy(p_param_err,
8331  "this gopPreset is not supported when lookaheadDepth > 0",
8332  max_err_len);
8333  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_GOP_PRESET;
8334  LRETURN;
8335  }
8336  if (p_src->source_width < 288)
8337  {
8338  strncpy(p_param_err,
8339  "lookAheadDepth requires input width of at least 288",
8340  max_err_len);
8341  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_PIC_WIDTH;
8342  LRETURN;
8343  }
8344  }
8345 
8346  if (GOP_PRESET_IDX_DEFAULT == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8347  {
8348  // when gop_preset_index = -1 (default), gop pattern is decided by gopSize and gopLowdelay
8349  //p_cfg->ui8gopSize = 0;
8350  //p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay = 0;
8351  }
8352  if (1 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8353  {
8354  p_cfg->niParamT408.intra_period = 1;
8355  p_cfg->niParamT408.avcIdrPeriod = 1;
8356  p_cfg->ui8gopSize = 1;
8357  p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration = 0;
8358  }
8359  if (2 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8360  {
8361  strncpy(p_param_err,
8362  "gopPresetIdx 2 is obsolete, suggest to use gopPresetIdx 9 "
8363  "instead",
8364  max_err_len);
8365  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_GOP_PRESET;
8366  LRETURN;
8367  }
8368  if (3 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8369  {
8370  p_cfg->ui8gopSize = 1;
8371  p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay = 1;
8372  }
8373  if (4 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8374  {
8375  p_cfg->ui8gopSize = 2;
8376  p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay = 0;
8377  }
8378  if (5 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8379  {
8380  p_cfg->ui8gopSize = 4;
8381  p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay = 0;
8382  }
8383  if (6 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8384  {
8385  strncpy(p_param_err,
8386  "gopPresetIdx 6 is obsolete, suggest to use gopPresetIdx 7 "
8387  "instead",
8388  max_err_len);
8389  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_GOP_PRESET;
8390  LRETURN;
8391  }
8392  if (7 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8393  {
8394  p_cfg->ui8gopSize = 4;
8395  p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay = 1;
8396  }
8397  if (8 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8398  {
8399  p_cfg->ui8gopSize = 8;
8400  p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay = 0;
8401  }
8402  if (9 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8403  {
8404  p_cfg->ui8gopSize = 1;
8405  p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay = 0;
8406  }
8407  }
8408 
8409  if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264 == p_ctx->codec_format)
8410  {
8411  if (!QUADRA)
8412  {
8413  if (10 == p_ctx->src_bit_depth)
8414  {
8415  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.profile != 5)
8416  {
8417  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid profile: must be 5 (high10)",
8418  max_err_len);
8419  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8420  LRETURN;
8421  }
8422  }
8423  else
8424  {
8425  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.profile < 1 || p_cfg->niParamT408.profile > 5)
8426  {
8427  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid profile: must be 1 (baseline), 2 (main),"
8428  " 3 (extended), 4 (high), or 5 (high10)", max_err_len);
8429  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8430  LRETURN;
8431  }
8432  }
8433  if (1 == p_cfg->niParamT408.profile &&
8434  ! (0 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index ||
8435  1 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index ||
8436  2 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index ||
8437  6 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index))
8438  {
8439  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid gopPresetIdx for H.264 baseline profile:"
8440  " must be 1, 2, 6 or 0 (custom with no B frames)", max_err_len);
8441  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8442  LRETURN;
8443  }
8444  if (1 == p_cfg->niParamT408.profile &&
8445  GOP_PRESET_IDX_CUSTOM == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index)
8446  {
8447  for (i = 0; i < p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size;
8448  i++)
8449  {
8450  if (2 == p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type)
8451  {
8452  strncpy(p_param_err, "H.264 baseline profile: custom GOP can not "
8453  "have B frames", max_err_len);
8454  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8455  LRETURN;
8456  }
8457  }
8458  }
8459  }
8460  else // QUADRA
8461  {
8462  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.profile < 1 || p_cfg->niParamT408.profile > 5 || p_cfg->niParamT408.profile == 3)
8463  {
8464  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid profile: must be 1 (baseline), 2 (main),"
8465  " 4 (high), or 5 (high10)", max_err_len);
8466  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8467  LRETURN;
8468  }
8469  if (10 == p_ctx->src_bit_depth && p_cfg->niParamT408.profile != 5)
8470  {
8471  strncpy(p_param_warn, "AVC Baseline/Main/High Profile do not support 10-bit, auto convert to 8-bit", max_err_len);
8472  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8473  }
8474  if (1 == p_cfg->niParamT408.profile)
8475  {
8476  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
8477  {
8478  for (i = 0; i < p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
8479  {
8480  if (2 == p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type)
8481  {
8482  strncpy(p_param_err, "H.264 baseline profile: custom GOP can not "
8483  "have B frames", max_err_len);
8484  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8485  LRETURN;
8486  }
8487  }
8488  } else if (((p_cfg->ui8gopSize != 1 || p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay)) &&
8489  (p_cfg->niParamT408.intra_period != 1))
8490  {
8491  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index != GOP_PRESET_IDX_DEFAULT ||
8492  p_cfg->ui8gopSize != 0 ||
8493  p_cfg
8494  ->ui8gopLowdelay) // if gopSize is 0 (default / adapative gop), autoset to 1
8495  {
8496  strncpy(p_param_err,
8497  "GOP size must be 1 and must not use low delay GOP (no "
8498  "B frames) for profile 1",
8499  max_err_len);
8500  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8501  LRETURN;
8502  }
8503  p_cfg->ui8gopSize = 1; //autoset to 1
8504  }
8505  }
8506  }
8507  }
8508  else if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H265 == p_ctx->codec_format)
8509  {
8510  if (!QUADRA)
8511  {
8512  if (10 == p_ctx->src_bit_depth)
8513  {
8514  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.profile != 2)
8515  {
8516  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid profile: must be 2 (main10)",
8517  max_err_len);
8518  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8519  LRETURN;
8520  }
8521  }
8522  else
8523  {
8524  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.profile < 1 || p_cfg->niParamT408.profile > 2)
8525  {
8526  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid profile: must be 1 (main) or 2 (main10)",
8527  max_err_len);
8528  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8529  LRETURN;
8530  }
8531  }
8532  }
8533  else // QUADRA
8534  {
8535  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.profile < 1 || p_cfg->niParamT408.profile > 2)
8536  {
8537  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid profile: must be 1 (main) or 2 (main10)",
8538  max_err_len);
8539  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8540  LRETURN;
8541  }
8542  if (10 == p_ctx->src_bit_depth && p_cfg->niParamT408.profile != 2)
8543  {
8544  strncpy(p_param_warn, "HEVC Main Profile does not support 10-bit, auto convert to 8-bit", max_err_len);
8545  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8546  }
8547  }
8548  } else if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_AV1 == p_ctx->codec_format)
8549  {
8550  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.profile != 1)
8551  {
8552  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid profile: must be 1 (main)",
8553  max_err_len);
8554  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8555  LRETURN;
8556  }
8557  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.level) // 0 means auto level
8558  {
8559  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.level < 20)
8560  {
8561  p_cfg->niParamT408.level = 20;
8562  strncpy(p_param_warn,
8563  "AV1 level < 2.0 is not supported, change to level 2.0",
8564  max_err_len);
8565  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8566  } else if (p_cfg->niParamT408.level > 51)
8567  {
8568  p_cfg->niParamT408.level = 51;
8569  strncpy(p_param_warn,
8570  "AV1 level > 5.1 is not supported, change to level 5.1",
8571  max_err_len);
8572  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8573  }
8574  }
8575 
8576  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.conf_win_top != 0)
8577  {
8578  p_cfg->niParamT408.conf_win_top = p_src->cfg_enc_params.conf_win_top =
8579  0;
8580  strncpy(p_param_warn, "confWinTop is not supported in AV1",
8581  max_err_len);
8582  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8583  }
8584  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.conf_win_bottom != 0)
8585  {
8586  p_cfg->niParamT408.conf_win_bottom =
8587  p_src->cfg_enc_params.conf_win_bottom = 0;
8588  strncpy(p_param_warn, "confWinBottom is not supported in AV1",
8589  max_err_len);
8590  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8591  }
8592  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.conf_win_left != 0)
8593  {
8594  p_cfg->niParamT408.conf_win_left =
8595  p_src->cfg_enc_params.conf_win_left = 0;
8596  strncpy(p_param_warn, "confWinLeft is not supported in AV1",
8597  max_err_len);
8598  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8599  }
8600  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.conf_win_right != 0)
8601  {
8602  p_cfg->niParamT408.conf_win_right =
8603  p_src->cfg_enc_params.conf_win_right = 0;
8604  strncpy(p_param_warn, "confWinRight is not supported in AV1",
8605  max_err_len);
8606  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8607  }
8608  if (p_cfg->ui8hdr10_enable)
8609  {
8610  strncpy(p_param_err,
8611  "masterDisplay not supported for AV1",
8612  max_err_len);
8613  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8614  }
8615  } else if (NI_CODEC_FORMAT_JPEG == p_ctx->codec_format)
8616  {
8617  if (p_cfg->ui8hdr10_enable)
8618  {
8619  strncpy(p_param_err,
8620  "masterDisplay not supported for jpeg",
8621  max_err_len);
8622  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8623  }
8624  }
8625 
8626  if (p_src->force_frame_type != 0 && p_src->force_frame_type != 1)
8627  {
8628  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid forceFrameType: out of range",
8629  max_err_len);
8630  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8631  LRETURN;
8632  }
8633 
8634  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.forcedHeaderEnable > 2)
8635  {
8636  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid forcedHeaderEnable: out of range",
8637  max_err_len);
8638  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
8639  LRETURN;
8640  }
8641 
8642  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.decoding_refresh_type < 0 ||
8643  p_cfg->niParamT408.decoding_refresh_type > 2)
8644  {
8645  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid decoding_refresh_type: out of range", max_err_len);
8646  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_DECODING_REFRESH_TYPE;
8647  LRETURN;
8648  }
8649 
8650  if (!QUADRA)
8651  {
8652  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index < 0 ||
8653  p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index > 8)
8654  {
8655  strcpy(p_param_err, "Invalid gop_preset_index: out of range");
8656  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_GOP_PRESET;
8657  LRETURN;
8658  }
8659 
8660  if (p_src->low_delay_mode && 1 != p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index &&
8661  2 != p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index &&
8662  3 != p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index &&
8663  6 != p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index &&
8664  7 != p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index &&
8665  !(0 == p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index &&
8666  1 == p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size))
8667  {
8668  strcpy(p_param_err, "GOP size must be 1 when lowDelay is enabled");
8669  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_GOP_PRESET;
8670  LRETURN;
8671  }
8672  }
8673  else // QUADRA
8674  {
8675  if (p_cfg->ui8gopSize > 8)
8676  {
8677  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid gopSize out of range", max_err_len);
8678  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_GOP_PRESET;
8679  LRETURN;
8680  }
8681 
8682  if (p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay &&
8683  p_cfg->ui8gopSize > 4)
8684  {
8685  strncpy(p_param_err, "GOP size must be <= 4 for low delay GOP", max_err_len);
8686  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_GOP_PRESET;
8687  LRETURN;
8688  }
8689 
8690  if (p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth)
8691  {
