8692  if (p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth < 4 || p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth > 40)
8693  {
8694  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid LookAheadDepth: out of range. <[4-40]>", max_err_len);
8695  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_LOOK_AHEAD_DEPTH;
8696  LRETURN;
8697  }
8698  if (p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay)
8699  {
8700  strncpy(p_param_err, "2-pass encode does not support low delay GOP", max_err_len);
8701  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_GOP_PRESET;
8702  LRETURN;
8703  }
8704  if (p_cfg->ui8planarFormat == NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_TILED4X4)
8705  {
8706  strncpy(p_param_err, "2-pass encode does not support tile4x4 format",
8707  max_err_len);
8708  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_LOOK_AHEAD_DEPTH;
8709  LRETURN;
8710  }
8711 
8712  }
8713 
8714  if (p_src->low_delay_mode || p_cfg->ui8picSkipEnable)
8715  {
8716  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
8717  {
8718  for (i = 0; i < p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
8719  {
8720  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset != (i+1))
8721  {
8722  if (p_src->low_delay_mode)
8723  strncpy(p_param_err, "Custom GOP must not include backward prediction when lowDelay is enabled", max_err_len);
8724  else
8725  strncpy(p_param_err, "Custom GOP must not include backward prediction when picSkip is enabled", max_err_len);
8726  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8727  LRETURN;
8728  }
8729  }
8730  } else if (1 != p_cfg->ui8gopSize && !p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay &&
8731  p_cfg->niParamT408.intra_period != 1)
8732  {
8733  if (p_src->low_delay_mode)
8734  strncpy(p_param_err, "Must use low delay GOP (gopPresetIdx 1,3,7,9) when lowDelay is enabled", max_err_len);
8735  else
8736  strncpy(p_param_err, "Must use low delay GOP (gopPresetIdx 1,3,7,9) when picSkip is enabled", max_err_len);
8737  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_GOP_PRESET;
8738  LRETURN;
8739  }
8740 
8741  if (p_cfg->ui8multicoreJointMode)
8742  {
8743  if (p_src->low_delay_mode)
8744  strncpy(p_param_err,
8745  "Cannot use multicoreJointMode when lowDelay is enabled",
8746  max_err_len);
8747  else
8748  strncpy(p_param_err,
8749  "Cannot use multicoreJointMode when picSkip is enabled",
8750  max_err_len);
8751  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8752  LRETURN;
8753  }
8754  }
8755 
8756  if (p_src->low_delay_mode)
8757  {
8758  if (p_cfg->ui16maxFrameSize == 0)
8759  {
8760  p_cfg->ui16maxFrameSize = ((p_src->source_width * p_src->source_height * 3 / 4) * p_ctx->bit_depth_factor) / 2000;
8761  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: maxFrameSize is not set in low delay mode. Set it to half of frame size %d\n",
8762  __func__, p_cfg->ui16maxFrameSize*2000);
8763  }
8764 
8765  // minimum acceptable value of maxFrameSize is bitrate / framerate in byte
8766  uint32_t min_maxFrameSize = ((p_cfg->i32bitRate / p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo * p_cfg->i32frameRateDenominator) / 8) / 2000;
8767 
8768  if (p_cfg->ui16maxFrameSize < min_maxFrameSize)
8769  {
8770  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s: maxFrameSize %d is too small. Changed to minimum value (bitrate/framerate in byte): %d\n",
8771  __func__, p_cfg->ui16maxFrameSize*2000, min_maxFrameSize*2000);
8772  p_cfg->ui16maxFrameSize = min_maxFrameSize;
8773  }
8774  }
8775  else
8776  {
8777  if (p_cfg->ui16maxFrameSize != 0)
8778  {
8779  strncpy(p_param_err, "maxFrameSize can only be used when lowDelay is enabled", max_err_len);
8780  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8781  LRETURN;
8782  }
8783  }
8784  }
8785 
8786  if (QUADRA)
8787  {
8788  if (p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration)
8789  {
8790  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
8791  {
8792  for (i = 0; i < p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
8793  {
8794  if (2 == p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type)
8795  {
8796  strncpy(p_param_err, "Custom GOP can not have B frames for intra refresh", max_err_len);
8797  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8798  LRETURN;
8799  }
8800  }
8801  }
8802  else if (p_cfg->ui8gopSize != 1 || p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay)
8803  {
8804  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index != GOP_PRESET_IDX_DEFAULT)
8805  {
8806  strncpy(p_param_err,
8807  "GOP must not contain B frames for gdrDuration",
8808  max_err_len);
8809  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8810  LRETURN;
8811  }
8812  strncpy(p_param_warn, "GOP size forced to 1 and low delay GOP force disabled (no B frames) for intra refresh", max_err_len);
8813  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8814  p_cfg->ui8gopSize = 1;
8815  p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay = 0;
8816  }
8817  if (p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration == 1)
8818  {
8819  strncpy(p_param_err,
8820  "intra refresh cycle (height / intraRefreshArg MB or CTU) must > 1",
8821  max_err_len);
8822  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8823  LRETURN;
8824  }
8825  if (p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth != 0)
8826  {
8827  strncpy(p_param_warn, "lookaheadDepth forced to 0 (disable 2-pass) for intra refresh", max_err_len);
8828  p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth = 0;
8829  }
8830  if (STD_HEVC == p_cfg->ui8bitstreamFormat ||
8831  STD_AV1 == p_cfg->ui8bitstreamFormat)
8832  {
8833  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.intra_period < p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration)
8834  {
8835  strncpy(p_param_warn, "intraPeriod forced to match intra refersh cycle (intraPeriod must >= intra refersh cycle)", max_err_len);
8836  p_cfg->niParamT408.intra_period = p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration;
8837  }
8838  }
8839  else if (STD_AVC == p_cfg->ui8bitstreamFormat)
8840  {
8841  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.avcIdrPeriod < p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration)
8842  {
8843  strncpy(p_param_warn, "intraPeriod forced to match intra refersh cycle (intraPeriod must >= intra refersh cycle)", max_err_len);
8844  p_cfg->niParamT408.avcIdrPeriod = p_cfg->ui16gdrDuration;
8845  }
8846  }
8847  }
8848 
8849  if ((p_cfg->ui8hrdEnable) || (p_cfg->ui8fillerEnable))
8850  {
8851  // enable rate control
8852  if (p_cfg->ui8rcEnable == 0)
8853  {
8854  p_cfg->ui8rcEnable = p_src->cfg_enc_params.rc.enable_rate_control = 1;
8855  }
8856 
8857  // enable hrd if it is off
8858  if (p_cfg->i32vbvBufferSize == 0)
8859  {
8860  p_cfg->i32vbvBufferSize = 3000;
8861  }
8862  }
8863 
8864  if (p_cfg->ui32ltrRefInterval || p_cfg->niParamT408.useLongTerm)
8865  {
8866  if (p_cfg->ui32ltrRefInterval && p_cfg->niParamT408.useLongTerm)
8867  {
8868  strncpy(p_param_err,
8869  "Can't enable ltrRefInterval and longTermReferenceEnable "
8870  "at same time",
8871  max_err_len);
8872  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8873  LRETURN;
8874  }
8875 
8876  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
8877  {
8878  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size > 1)
8879  {
8880  strncpy(p_param_err, "Custom GOP size can not be > 1 for long term reference", max_err_len);
8881  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8882  LRETURN;
8883  }
8884  } else if ((p_cfg->ui8gopSize != 1) && (p_cfg->ui8gopLowdelay == 0) &&
8885  (p_cfg->niParamT408.intra_period != 1))
8886  {
8887  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index != GOP_PRESET_IDX_DEFAULT)
8888  {
8889  strncpy(p_param_err,
8890  "GOP size can not be > 1 for long term reference",
8891  max_err_len);
8892  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8893  LRETURN;
8894  }
8895  strncpy(p_param_warn, "GOP size forced to 1 for long term reference", max_err_len);
8896  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8897  p_cfg->ui8gopSize = 1;
8898  }
8899 
8900  if (p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth != 0)
8901  {
8902  strncpy(p_param_warn, "lookaheadDepth forced to 0 (disable 2-pass) for long term reference", max_err_len);
8903  p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth = 0;
8904  }
8905  }
8906 
8907  if (p_cfg->ui32setLongTermInterval && (p_cfg->niParamT408.useLongTerm == 0))
8908  {
8909  strncpy(
8910  p_param_err,
8911  "Must set longTermReferenceEnable for longTermReferenceInterval",
8912  max_err_len);
8913  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
8914  LRETURN;
8915  }
8916 
8917  if (p_cfg->ui8av1ErrResilientMode)
8918  {
8919  if (STD_AV1 != p_cfg->ui8bitstreamFormat)
8920  {
8921  strncpy(p_param_warn, "AV1 err resilient mode forced to 0 when using other codecs", max_err_len);
8922  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8923  p_cfg->ui8av1ErrResilientMode = 0;
8924  }
8925  }
8926  }
8927 
8928  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.cu_size_mode < 0 ||
8929  p_cfg->niParamT408.cu_size_mode > 7)
8930  {
8931  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid cu_size_mode: out of range", max_err_len);
8932  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CU_SIZE_MODE;
8933  LRETURN;
8934  }
8935 
8936 
8937 
8938  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.use_recommend_enc_params < 0 ||
8939  p_cfg->niParamT408.use_recommend_enc_params > 3)
8940  {
8941  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid use_recommend_enc_params: out of range", max_err_len);
8942  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_USR_RMD_ENC_PARAM;
8943  LRETURN;
8944  }
8945 
8946  switch (p_cfg->niParamT408.use_recommend_enc_params)
8947  {
8948  case 0:
8949  case 2:
8950  case 3:
8951  {
8952  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.use_recommend_enc_params != 3)
8953  {
8954  // in FAST mode (recommendEncParam==3), max_num_merge value will be
8955  // decided in FW
8956  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.max_num_merge < 0 ||
8957  p_cfg->niParamT408.max_num_merge > 3)
8958  {
8959  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid max_num_merge: out of range", max_err_len);
8960  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_MAXNUMMERGE;
8961  LRETURN;
8962  }
8963  }
8964  break;
8965  }
8966 
8967  default: break;
8968  }
8969 
8970  if ( p_cfg->niParamT408.intra_qp < -1 ||
8971  p_cfg->niParamT408.intra_qp > 51 )
8972  {
8973  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid intra_qp: out of range", max_err_len);
8974  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_INTRA_QP;
8975  LRETURN;
8976  }
8977 
8978  if (QUADRA)
8979  {
8980  if (p_cfg->i8crf >= 0 && p_cfg->i8crf <= 51)
8981  {
8982  if (p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth < 4 || p_cfg->ui8LookAheadDepth > 40)
8983  {
8984  strncpy(p_param_err, "CRF requres LookAheadDepth <[4-40]>", max_err_len);
8985  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_LOOK_AHEAD_DEPTH;
8986  LRETURN;
8987  }
8988  if (p_cfg->ui8rcEnable == 1)
8989  {
8990  strncpy(p_param_err, "CRF requires RcEnable 0", max_err_len);
8991  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_RCENABLE;
8992  LRETURN;
8993  }
8994  if (p_cfg->ui8ctbRcMode > 0)
8995  {
8996  strncpy(p_param_warn, "Lookahead with CtbRcMode > 0 may degrade quality", max_err_len);
8997  warning = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
8998  //LRETURN;
8999  }
9000  }
9001  }
9002 
9003  if ( p_cfg->niParamT408.enable_mb_level_rc != 1 &&
9004  p_cfg->niParamT408.enable_mb_level_rc != 0 )
9005  {
9006  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid enable_mb_level_rc: out of range", max_err_len);
9007  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_RCENABLE;
9008  LRETURN;
9009  }
9010 
9011  {
9012  if ( p_cfg->niParamT408.minQpI < 0 ||
9013  p_cfg->niParamT408.minQpI > 51 )
9014  {
9015  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid min_qp: out of range", max_err_len);
9016  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_MN_QP;
9017  LRETURN;
9018  }
9019 
9020  if ( p_cfg->niParamT408.maxQpI < 0 ||
9021  p_cfg->niParamT408.maxQpI > 51 )
9022  {
9023  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid max_qp: out of range", max_err_len);
9024  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_MX_QP;
9025  LRETURN;
9026  }
9027  // TBD minQpP minQpB maxQpP maxQpB
9028 
9029  if ( p_cfg->niParamT408.enable_cu_level_rate_control != 1 &&
9030  p_cfg->niParamT408.enable_cu_level_rate_control != 0 )
9031  {
9032  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid enable_cu_level_rate_control: out of range", max_err_len);
9033  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CU_LVL_RC_EN;
9034  LRETURN;
9035  }
9036 
9037  //if (p_cfg->niParamT408.enable_cu_level_rate_control == 1)
9038  {
9039  if ( p_cfg->niParamT408.enable_hvs_qp != 1 &&
9040  p_cfg->niParamT408.enable_hvs_qp != 0 )
9041  {
9042  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid enable_hvs_qp: out of range", max_err_len);
9043  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_HVS_QP_EN;
9044  LRETURN;
9045  }
9046 
9047  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.enable_hvs_qp)
9048  {
9049  if ( p_cfg->niParamT408.max_delta_qp < 0 ||
9050  p_cfg->niParamT408.max_delta_qp > 51 )
9051  {
9052  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid max_delta_qp: out of range", max_err_len);
9053  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_MX_DELTA_QP;
9054  LRETURN;
9055  }
9056 #if 0 // TBD missing enable_hvs_qp_scale?
9057  if ( p_cfg->niParamT408.enable_hvs_qp_scale != 1 &&
9058  p_cfg->niParamT408.enable_hvs_qp_scale != 0 )
9059  {
9060  strcpy(p_param_err, "Invalid enable_hvs_qp_scale: out of range");
9061  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_HVS_QP_SCL;
9062  LRETURN;
9063  }
9064 
9065  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.enable_hvs_qp_scale == 1) {
9066  if ( p_cfg->niParamT408.hvs_qp_scale < 0 ||
9067  p_cfg->niParamT408.hvs_qp_scale > 4 )
9068  {
9069  strcpy(p_param_err, "Invalid hvs_qp_scale: out of range");
9070  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_HVS_QP_SCL;
9071  LRETURN;
9072  }
9073  }
9074 #endif
9075  }
9076  }
9077  // hrd is off when i32vbvBufferSize is 0
9078  if ((p_cfg->i32vbvBufferSize < 10 && p_cfg->i32vbvBufferSize != 0) || p_cfg->i32vbvBufferSize > 3000)
9079  {
9080  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid i32vbvBufferSize: out of range", max_err_len);
9081  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_VBV_BUFFER_SIZE;
9082  LRETURN;
9083  }
9084  }
9085 
9086  // check valid for common param
9087  param_ret = ni_check_common_params(&p_cfg->niParamT408, p_src, p_param_err, max_err_len);
9088  if (param_ret != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
9089  {
9090  LRETURN;
9091  }
9092 
9093  // check valid for RC param
9094  param_ret = ni_check_ratecontrol_params(p_cfg, p_param_err, max_err_len);
9095  if (param_ret != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
9096  {
9097  LRETURN;
9098  }
9099 
9100  if (p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index != GOP_PRESET_IDX_CUSTOM)
9101  {
9102  p_ctx->keyframe_factor =
9103  presetGopKeyFrameFactor[p_cfg->niParamT408.gop_preset_index];
9104  }
9105  if (warning == NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN && param_ret == NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
9106  {
9107  param_ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN;
9108  strncpy(p_param_err, p_param_warn, max_err_len);
9109  }
9110 
9111 END:
9112  ni_aligned_free(p_param_warn);
9113  return param_ret;
9114 }
9115 
9116 ni_retcode_t ni_check_common_params(ni_t408_config_t *p_param,
9117  ni_xcoder_params_t *p_src,
9118  char *p_param_err, uint32_t max_err_len)
9119 {
9120  ni_retcode_t ret = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
9121  int32_t low_delay = 0;
9122  int32_t intra_period_gop_step_size;
9123  int32_t i, j;
9124 
9125  if (!p_param || !p_src || !p_param_err)
9126  {
9127  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Null pointer parameters passed\n",
9128  __func__);
9129  ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
9130  LRETURN;
9131  }
9132 
9133  //Zero out the error buffer
9134  memset(p_param_err, 0, max_err_len);
9135 
9136  // check low-delay gop structure
9137  if (!QUADRA)
9138  {
9139  if (0 == p_param->gop_preset_index) // common gop
9140  {
9141  if (p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size > 1)
9142  {
9143  int minVal = p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[0].poc_offset;
9144  low_delay = 1;
9145  for (i = 1; i < p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
9146  {
9147  if (minVal > p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset)
9148  {
9149  low_delay = 0;
9150  break;
9151  } else
9152  {
9153  minVal = p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset;
9154  }
9155  }
9156  }
9157  }
9158  else if (p_param->gop_preset_index == 2 ||
9159  p_param->gop_preset_index == 3 ||
9160  p_param->gop_preset_index == 6 ||
9161  p_param->gop_preset_index == 7) // low-delay case (IPPP, IBBB)
9162  {
9163  low_delay = 1;
9164  }
9165 
9166  if (low_delay)
9167  {
9168  intra_period_gop_step_size = 1;
9169  }
9170  else
9171  {
9172  if (p_param->gop_preset_index == GOP_PRESET_IDX_CUSTOM)
9173  {
9174  intra_period_gop_step_size = p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size;
9175  }
9176  else
9177  {
9178  intra_period_gop_step_size = presetGopSize[p_param->gop_preset_index];
9179  }
9180  }
9181 
9182  if (((p_param->intra_period != 0) && ((p_param->intra_period < intra_period_gop_step_size+1) == 1)) ||
9183  ((p_param->avcIdrPeriod != 0) && ((p_param->avcIdrPeriod < intra_period_gop_step_size+1) == 1)))
9184  {
9185  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid intra_period and gop_preset_index: gop structure is larger than intra period", max_err_len);
9186  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_INTRA_PERIOD;
9187  LRETURN;
9188  }
9189 
9190  if (((!low_delay) && (p_param->intra_period != 0) && ((p_param->intra_period % intra_period_gop_step_size) != 0)) ||
9191  ((!low_delay) && (p_param->avcIdrPeriod != 0) && ((p_param->avcIdrPeriod % intra_period_gop_step_size) != 0)))
9192  {
9193  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid intra_period and gop_preset_index: intra period is not a multiple of gop structure size", max_err_len);
9194  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_INTRA_PERIOD;
9195  LRETURN;
9196  }
9197 
9198  if (p_param->gop_preset_index == GOP_PRESET_IDX_CUSTOM)
9199  {
9200  int temp_poc[NI_MAX_GOP_NUM];
9201  int min_poc = p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[0].poc_offset;
9202  for (i = 0; i < p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
9203  {
9204  if (p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id >= XCODER_MAX_NUM_TEMPORAL_LAYER)
9205  {
9206  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom gop parameters: temporal_id larger than 7", max_err_len);
9207  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
9208  LRETURN;
9209  }
9210 
9211  if (p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id < 0)
9212  {
9213  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom gop parameters: temporal_id is zero or negative", max_err_len);
9214  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
9215  LRETURN;
9216  }
9217  temp_poc[i] = p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset;
9218  if (min_poc > temp_poc[i])
9219  {
9220  min_poc = temp_poc[i];
9221  }
9222  }
9223  int count_pos = 0;
9224  for (i = 0; i < p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
9225  {
9226  for (j = 0; j < p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; j++)
9227  {
9228  if (temp_poc[j] == min_poc)
9229  {
9230  count_pos++;
9231  min_poc++;
9232  }
9233  }
9234  }
9235  if (count_pos != p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
9236  {
9237  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom gop parameters: poc_offset is invalid", max_err_len);
9238  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
9239  LRETURN;
9240  }
9241  }
9242  }
9243  else // QUADRA
9244  {
9245  if (p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
9246  {
9247  int temp_poc[NI_MAX_GOP_NUM];
9248  int min_poc = p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[0].poc_offset;
9249  for (i = 0; i < p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
9250  {
9251  if (p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id >= XCODER_MAX_NUM_TEMPORAL_LAYER)
9252  {
9253  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom gop parameters: temporal_id larger than 7", max_err_len);
9254  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
9255  LRETURN;
9256  }
9257 
9258  if (p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id < 0)
9259  {
9260  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom gop parameters: temporal_id is negative", max_err_len);
9261  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
9262  LRETURN;
9263  }
9264 
9265  for (j = 0; j < p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pics; j++)
9266  {
9267  if (p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic == 0)
9268  {
9269  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom gop parameters: ref pic delta cannot be 0", max_err_len);
9270  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
9271  LRETURN;
9272  }
9273  }
9274 
9275  temp_poc[i] = p_param->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset;
9276  if (min_poc > temp_poc[i])
9277  {
9278  min_poc = temp_poc[i];
9279  }
9280  }
9281  int count_pos = 0;
9282  for (i = 0; i < p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
9283  {
9284  for (j = 0; j < p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; j++)
9285  {
9286  if (temp_poc[j] == min_poc)
9287  {
9288  count_pos++;
9289  min_poc++;
9290  }
9291  }
9292  }
9293  if (count_pos != p_param->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
9294  {
9295  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid custom gop parameters: poc_offset is invalid", max_err_len);
9296  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSTOM_GOP;
9297  LRETURN;
9298  }
9299  }
9300  }
9301 
9302  if (0 == p_param->use_recommend_enc_params)
9303  {
9304  // RDO
9305  {
9306  int align_32_width_flag = p_src->source_width % 32;
9307  int align_16_width_flag = p_src->source_width % 16;
9308  int align_8_width_flag = p_src->source_width % 8;
9309  int align_32_height_flag = p_src->source_height % 32;
9310  int align_16_height_flag = p_src->source_height % 16;
9311  int align_8_height_flag = p_src->source_height % 8;
9312 
9313  if (((p_param->cu_size_mode & 0x1) == 0) && ((align_8_width_flag != 0) || (align_8_height_flag != 0)))
9314  {
9315  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid use_recommend_enc_params and cu_size_mode: picture width and height must be aligned with 8 pixels when enable CU8x8 of cu_size_mode. Recommend to set cu_size_mode |= 0x1 (CU8x8)", max_err_len);
9316  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSIZE_MODE_8X8_EN;
9317  LRETURN;
9318  }
9319  else if (((p_param->cu_size_mode & 0x1) == 0) && ((p_param->cu_size_mode & 0x2) == 0) && ((align_16_width_flag != 0) || (align_16_height_flag != 0)))
9320  {
9321  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid use_recommend_enc_params and cu_size_mode: picture width and height must be aligned with 16 pixels when enable CU16x16 of cu_size_mode. Recommend to set cu_size_mode |= 0x2 (CU16x16)", max_err_len);
9322  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSIZE_MODE_16X16_EN;
9323  LRETURN;
9324  }
9325  else if (((p_param->cu_size_mode & 0x1) == 0) && ((p_param->cu_size_mode & 0x2) == 0) && ((p_param->cu_size_mode & 0x4) == 0) && ((align_32_width_flag != 0) || (align_32_height_flag != 0)))
9326  {
9327  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid use_recommend_enc_params and cu_size_mode: picture width and height must be aligned with 32 pixels when enable CU32x32 of cu_size_mode. Recommend to set cu_size_mode |= 0x4 (CU32x32)", max_err_len);
9328  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CUSIZE_MODE_32X32_EN;
9329  LRETURN;
9330  }
9331  }
9332  }
9333 
9334  if ((p_param->conf_win_top < 0) || (p_param->conf_win_top > 8192))
9335  {
9336  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid conf_win_top: out of range", max_err_len);
9337  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CONF_WIN_TOP;
9338  LRETURN;
9339  }
9340  if (p_param->conf_win_top % 2)
9341  {
9342  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid conf_win_top: not multiple of 2", max_err_len);
9343  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CONF_WIN_TOP;
9344  LRETURN;
9345  }
9346 
9347  if ((p_param->conf_win_bottom < 0) || (p_param->conf_win_bottom > 8192))
9348  {
9349  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid conf_win_bottom: out of range", max_err_len);
9350  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CONF_WIN_BOT;
9351  LRETURN;
9352  }
9353  if (p_param->conf_win_bottom % 2)
9354  {
9355  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid conf_win_bottom: not multiple of 2", max_err_len);
9356  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CONF_WIN_BOT;
9357  LRETURN;
9358  }
9359 
9360  if ((p_param->conf_win_left < 0) || (p_param->conf_win_left > 8192))
9361  {
9362  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid conf_win_left: out of range", max_err_len);
9363  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CONF_WIN_L;
9364  LRETURN;
9365  }
9366  if (p_param->conf_win_left % 2)
9367  {
9368  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid conf_win_left: not multiple of 2", max_err_len);
9369  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CONF_WIN_L;
9370  LRETURN;
9371  }
9372 
9373  if (p_param->conf_win_right < 0 || p_param->conf_win_right > 8192)
9374  {
9375  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid conf_win_right: out of range", max_err_len);
9376  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CONF_WIN_R;
9377  LRETURN;
9378  }
9379  if (p_param->conf_win_right % 2)
9380  {
9381  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid conf_win_right: not multiple of 2", max_err_len);
9382  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_CONF_WIN_R;
9383  }
9384 
9385 END:
9386 
9387  return ret;
9388 }
9389 
9390 ni_retcode_t ni_check_ratecontrol_params(ni_encoder_config_t* p_cfg, char* p_param_err, uint32_t max_err_len)
9391 {
9392  ni_retcode_t ret = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
9393  ni_t408_config_t* p_param = &p_cfg->niParamT408;
9394 
9395  if( (!p_cfg) || (!p_param_err) )
9396  {
9397  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Null pointer parameters passed\n",
9398  __func__);
9399  ret = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
9400  LRETURN;
9401  }
9402 
9403  //Zero out the error buffer
9404  memset(p_param_err, 0, max_err_len);
9405 
9406  if (p_param->roiEnable != 0 && p_param->roiEnable != 1)
9407  {
9408  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid roiEnable: out of range", max_err_len);
9409  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
9410  LRETURN;
9411  }
9412 
9413  if (p_param->roiEnable && p_param->enable_hvs_qp)
9414  {
9415  strncpy(p_param_err, "hvsQPEnable and roiEnable: not mutually exclusive", max_err_len);
9416  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_INVALID_VALUE;
9417  LRETURN;
9418  }
9419 
9420  // TBD RevB
9421  if (p_cfg->ui8rcEnable == 1)
9422  {
9423  if (p_param->minQpP > p_param->maxQpP || p_param->minQpB > p_param->maxQpB)
9424  {
9425  strncpy(p_param_err, "Invalid min_qp(P/B) and max_qp(P/B): min_qp cannot be larger than max_qp", max_err_len);
9426  ret = NI_RETCODE_PARAM_ERROR_MX_QP;
9427  LRETURN;
9428  }
9429  }
9430 
9431 END:
9432 
9433  return ret;
9434 }
9435 
9436 
9437 /*!******************************************************************************
9438  * \brief Print xcoder user configurations
9439  *
9440  * \param
9441  *
9442  * \return
9443  *******************************************************************************/
9444 void ni_params_print(ni_xcoder_params_t *const p_encoder_params)
9445 {
9446  if (!p_encoder_params)
9447  {
9448  return;
9449  }
9450 
9451  ni_encoder_cfg_params_t *p_enc = &p_encoder_params->cfg_enc_params;
9452 
9453  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "XCoder Params:\n");
9454 
9455  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "preset=%d\n", p_encoder_params->preset);
9456  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "fps_number / fps_denominator=%u / %u\n",
9457  p_encoder_params->fps_number,
9458  p_encoder_params->fps_denominator);
9459 
9460  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "source_width x source_height=%dx%d\n", p_encoder_params->source_width, p_encoder_params->source_height);
9461  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "bitrate=%d\n", p_encoder_params->bitrate);
9462 
9463  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "profile=%d\n", p_enc->profile);
9464  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "level_idc=%d\n", p_enc->level_idc);
9465  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "high_tier=%d\n", p_enc->high_tier);
9466 
9467  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "frame_rate=%d\n", p_enc->frame_rate);
9468 
9469  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "use_recommend_enc_params=%d\n", p_enc->use_recommend_enc_params);
9470  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "cu_size_mode=%d\n", p_enc->cu_size_mode);
9471  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "max_num_merge=%d\n", p_enc->max_num_merge);
9472  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_dynamic_8x8_merge=%d\n", p_enc->enable_dynamic_8x8_merge);
9473  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_dynamic_16x16_merge=%d\n", p_enc->enable_dynamic_16x16_merge);
9474  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_dynamic_32x32_merge=%d\n", p_enc->enable_dynamic_32x32_merge);
9475  // trans_rate not available in Rev B
9476  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_rate_control=%d\n", p_enc->rc.enable_rate_control);
9477  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_cu_level_rate_control=%d\n", p_enc->rc.enable_cu_level_rate_control);
9478  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_hvs_qp=%d\n", p_enc->rc.enable_hvs_qp);
9479  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_hvs_qp_scale=%d\n", p_enc->rc.enable_hvs_qp_scale);
9480  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "hvs_qp_scale=%d\n", p_enc->rc.hvs_qp_scale);
9481  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "min_qp=%d\n", p_enc->rc.min_qp);
9482  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "max_qp=%d\n", p_enc->rc.max_qp);
9483  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "max_delta_qp=%d\n", p_enc->rc.max_delta_qp);
9484  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "vbv_buffer_size=%d\n", p_enc->rc.vbv_buffer_size);
9485  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_filler=%d\n", p_enc->rc.enable_filler);
9486  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_pic_skip=%d\n", p_enc->rc.enable_pic_skip);
9487 
9488  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "forcedHeaderEnable=%d\n", p_enc->forced_header_enable);
9489  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "roi_enable=%d\n", p_enc->roi_enable);
9490  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "long_term_ref_enable=%d\n", p_enc->long_term_ref_enable);
9491  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "long_term_ref_interval=%d\n", p_enc->long_term_ref_interval);
9492  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "long_term_ref_count=%d\n", p_enc->long_term_ref_count);
9493  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "conf_win_top=%d\n", p_enc->conf_win_top);
9494  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "conf_win_bottom=%d\n", p_enc->conf_win_bottom);
9495  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "conf_win_left=%d\n", p_enc->conf_win_left);
9496  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "conf_win_right=%d\n", p_enc->conf_win_right);
9497 
9498  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intra_qp=%d\n", p_enc->rc.intra_qp);
9499  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_mb_level_rc=%d\n", p_enc->rc.enable_mb_level_rc);
9500 
9501  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intra_period=%d\n", p_enc->intra_period);
9502  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "decoding_refresh_type=%d\n", p_enc->decoding_refresh_type);
9503 
9504  // Rev. B: H.264 only or HEVC-shared parameters, in ni_t408_config_t
9505  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "enable_transform_8x8=%d\n", p_enc->enable_transform_8x8);
9506  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "avc_slice_mode=%d\n", p_enc->avc_slice_mode);
9507  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "avc_slice_arg=%d\n", p_enc->avc_slice_arg);
9508  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "entropy_coding_mode=%d\n", p_enc->entropy_coding_mode);
9509  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intra_mb_refresh_mode=%d\n", p_enc->intra_mb_refresh_mode);
9510  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intra_mb_refresh_arg=%d\n", p_enc->intra_mb_refresh_arg);
9511  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "intra_reset_refresh=%d\n", p_enc->intra_reset_refresh);
9512 
9513  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "gop_preset_index=%d\n", p_enc->gop_preset_index);
9514 #ifndef QUADRA
9515  if (!QUADRA)
9516  {
9517  if (p_enc->gop_preset_index == GOP_PRESET_IDX_CUSTOM)
9518  {
9519  int i;
9520  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size=%d\n", p_enc->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size);
9521  for (i = 0; i < p_enc->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size; i++)
9522  {
9523  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].pic_type=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type);
9524  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].poc_offset=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset);
9525  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].pic_qp=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_qp);
9526  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].num_ref_pic_L0=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pic_L0);
9527  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].ref_poc_L0=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L0);
9528  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].ref_poc_L1=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].ref_poc_L1);
9529  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].temporal_id=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id);
9530  }
9531  }
9532  }
9533  else // QUADRA
9534 #endif
9535  {
9536  if (p_enc->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size)
9537  {
9538  int i, j;
9539  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size=%d\n", p_enc->custom_gop_params.custom_gop_size);
9540  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_GOP_NUM; i++)
9541  {
9542  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].poc_offset=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].poc_offset);
9543  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].qp_offset=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_offset);
9544  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].qp_factor=%lf\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].qp_factor);
9545  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].temporal_id=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].temporal_id);
9546  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].pic_type=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].pic_type);
9547  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].num_ref_pics=%d\n", i, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].num_ref_pics);
9548  for (j = 0; j < NI_MAX_REF_PIC; j++)
9549  {
9550  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].rps[%d].ref_pic=%d\n", i, j, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic);
9551  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "custom_gop_params.pic_param[%d].rps[%d].ref_pic_used=%d\n", i, j, p_enc->custom_gop_params.pic_param[i].rps[j].ref_pic_used);
9552  }
9553  }
9554  }
9555  }
9556 
9557  return;
9558 }
9559 
9560 /*!******************************************************************************
9561  * \brief decoder keep alive thread function triggers every 1 second
9562  *
9563  * \param void thread args
9564  *
9565  * \return void
9566  *******************************************************************************/
9567 void *ni_session_keep_alive_thread(void *arguments)
9568 {
9569  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
9570  ni_thread_arg_struct_t *args = (ni_thread_arg_struct_t *)arguments;
9571  ni_session_stats_t inst_info = {0};
9572  ni_session_context_t ctx = {0};
9573  uint32_t loop = 0;
9574  uint64_t endtime = ni_gettime_ns();
9575  //interval(nanoseconds) is equals to ctx.keep_alive_timeout/3(330,000,000ns approximately equal to 1/3 second).
9576  uint64_t interval = args->keep_alive_timeout * 330000000LL;
9577 #ifndef _ANDROID
9578 #ifdef __linux__
9579  struct sched_param sched_param;
9580 
9581  // Linux has a wide variety of signals, Windows has a few.
9582  // A large number of signals will interrupt the thread, which will cause heartbeat command interval more than 1 second.
9583  // So just mask the unuseful signals in Linux
9584  sigset_t signal;
9585  sigfillset(&signal);
9586  ni_pthread_sigmask(SIG_BLOCK, &signal, NULL);
9587 
9588  /* set up schedule priority
9589  * first try to run with RR mode.
9590  * if fails, try to set nice value.
9591  * if fails either, ignore it and run with default priority.
9592  * Note: Scheduling requires root permission. App is probably exectued
9593  * without root so the priority for this thread might just end up
9594  * being default.
9595  */
9596  if (((sched_param.sched_priority = sched_get_priority_max(SCHED_RR)) ==
9597  -1) ||
9598  sched_setscheduler(syscall(SYS_gettid), SCHED_RR, &sched_param) < 0)
9599  {
9600  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s cannot set scheduler: %s\n", __func__,
9601  strerror(NI_ERRNO));
9602  if (setpriority(PRIO_PROCESS, 0, -20) != 0)
9603  {
9604  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s cannot set nice value: %s\n", __func__,
9605  strerror(NI_ERRNO));
9606  }
9607  }
9608 
9609 #elif defined(_WIN32)
9610  /* set up schedule priority.
9611  * try to set the current thread to time critical level which is the highest prioriy
9612  * level.
9613  */
9614  if (SetThreadPriority(GetCurrentThread(), THREAD_PRIORITY_TIME_CRITICAL) ==
9615  0)
9616  {
9617  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s cannot set priority: %d.\n", __func__,
9618  GetLastError());
9619  }
9620 #endif
9621 #endif
9622 
9623  // Initializes the session context variables that keep alive command and query status command need.
9624  ni_device_session_context_init(&ctx);
9625  ctx.hw_id = args->hw_id;
9626  ctx.session_id = args->session_id;
9627  ctx.session_timestamp = args->session_timestamp;
9628  ctx.device_type = args->device_type;
9629  ctx.blk_io_handle = args->device_handle;
9630  ctx.event_handle = args->thread_event_handle;
9631  ctx.p_all_zero_buf = args->p_buffer;
9632  ctx.keep_alive_timeout = args->keep_alive_timeout;
9633  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s ctx.keep_alive_timeout: %us.\n", __func__,
9634  ctx.keep_alive_timeout);
9635 
9636  for (;;) // condition TBD
9637  {
9638  retval =
9639  ni_send_session_keep_alive(ctx.session_id, ctx.blk_io_handle,
9640  ctx.event_handle, ctx.p_all_zero_buf);
9641  retval = ni_query_session_stats(&ctx, ctx.device_type, &inst_info,
9642  retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config);
9643  (void)retval;
9644  CHECK_ERR_RC2((&ctx), retval, inst_info, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
9645  ctx.device_type, ctx.hw_id, &(ctx.session_id));
9646 
9647  // 1. If received failure, set the close_thread flag to TRUE, and exit,
9648  // then main thread will check this flag and return failure directly;
9649  // 2. skip checking VPU recovery.
9650  // If keep_alive thread detect the VPU RECOVERY before main thread,
9651  // the close_thread flag may damage the vpu recovery handling process.
9652  if ((NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval) &&
9653  (NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_VPU_RECOVERY != retval))
9654  {
9655  LRETURN;
9656  }
9657 
9658  endtime += interval;
9659  while (ni_gettime_ns() < endtime)
9660  {
9661  if (args->close_thread)
9662  {
9663  LRETURN;
9664  }
9665  ni_usleep(10000); // 10ms per loop
9666  }
9667  }
9668 
9669 END:
9670 
9671  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
9672  {
9673  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s abormal closed:%d\n", __func__, retval);
9674  // changing the value to be True here means the thread has been closed.
9675  args->close_thread = true;
9676  }
9677 
9678  ni_device_session_context_clear(&ctx);
9679 
9680  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
9681 
9682  return NULL;
9683 }
9684 
9685 /*!******************************************************************************
9686 * \brief Open a xcoder upload instance
9687 *
9688 * \param p_ctx - pointer to caller allocated uploader session context
9689 *
9690 * \return
9691 * On success
9692 * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
9693 *
9694 * On failure
9695 * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
9696 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
9697 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
9698 * NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
9699 *******************************************************************************/
9700 ni_retcode_t ni_uploader_session_open(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx)
9701 {
9702  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
9703  void * p_buffer = NULL;
9704  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
9705 
9706  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
9707 
9708  if (!p_ctx)
9709  {
9710  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): passed parameters are null!, return\n",
9711  __func__);
9712  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
9713  LRETURN;
9714  }
9715 
9716  //Create the session if the create session flag is set
9717  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
9718  {
9719  p_ctx->device_type = NI_DEVICE_TYPE_UPLOAD;
9720  p_ctx->pts_table = NULL;
9721  p_ctx->dts_queue = NULL;
9722  p_ctx->p_leftover = NULL;
9723  p_ctx->buffer_pool = NULL;
9724  p_ctx->prev_size = 0;
9725  p_ctx->sent_size = 0;
9726  p_ctx->status = 0;
9727  p_ctx->key_frame_type = 0;
9728  p_ctx->ready_to_close = 0;
9729  p_ctx->rc_error_count = 0;
9730  p_ctx->frame_num = 0;
9731  p_ctx->pkt_num = 0;
9732  p_ctx->pkt_index = 0;
9733 
9734  //malloc zero data buffer
9735  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE),
9736  NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN))
9737  {
9738  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() alloc all zero buffer failed\n",
9739  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
9740  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
9741  LRETURN;
9742  }
9743  memset(p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
9744 
9745  //malloc data buffer
9746  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN))
9747  {
9748  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() alloc data buffer failed\n",
9749  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
9750  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
9751  LRETURN;
9752  }
9753  memset(p_buffer, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
9754 
9755  //Set session ID to be invalid. In case we cannot open session, the session id wold remain invalid.
9756  //In case we can open sesison, the session id would become valid.
9757  ((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui16SessionId =
9758  (uint16_t)NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
9759 
9760  // First uint32_t is either an invaild session ID or a valid session ID, depending on if session could be opened
9761  ui32LBA = OPEN_SESSION_CODEC(NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER, ni_htonl(p_ctx->codec_format), 1/*1 for uploadMode*/);
9762  retval = ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
9763  p_buffer, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA);
9764  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
9765  {
9766  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR ni_nvme_send_read_cmd\n");
9767  LRETURN;
9768  }
9769  //Open will return a session status structure with a valid session id if it worked.
9770  //Otherwise the invalid session id set before the open command will stay
9771  p_ctx->session_id = ni_ntohs(((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui16SessionId);
9772  p_ctx->session_timestamp =
9773  ni_htonll(((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui64Session_timestamp);
9774  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
9775  {
9776  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
9777  "ERROR %s(): p_ctx->device_handle=%" PRIx64
9778  ", p_ctx->hw_id=%d, p_ctx->session_id=%d\n",
9779  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
9780  p_ctx->session_id);
9781  ni_encoder_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
9782  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
9783  LRETURN;
9784  }
9785  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
9786  "Uploader open session ID:0x%x,timestamp:%" PRIu64 "\n",
9787  p_ctx->session_id, p_ctx->session_timestamp);
9788 
9789  //Send keep alive timeout Info
9790  uint64_t keep_alive_timeout =
9791  p_ctx->keep_alive_timeout * 1000000; //send us to FW
9792  memset(p_buffer, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
9793  memcpy(p_buffer, &keep_alive_timeout, sizeof(keep_alive_timeout));
9794  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s keep_alive_timeout %" PRIx64 "\n", __func__,
9795  keep_alive_timeout);
9796  ui32LBA = CONFIG_SESSION_KeepAliveTimeout_W(p_ctx->session_id);
9797  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
9798  p_buffer, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA);
9799  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config, p_ctx->device_type,
9800  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
9801  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
9802 
9803  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
9804  {
9805  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
9806  "ERROR %s(): nvme write keep_alive_timeout command "
9807  "failed, blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %d\n",
9808  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id);
9809  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
9810  LRETURN;
9811  }
9812 
9813  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Open session completed\n");
9814  }
9815 
9816  // init for frame pts calculation
9817  p_ctx->is_first_frame = 1;
9818  p_ctx->last_pts = 0;
9819  p_ctx->last_dts = 0;
9820 
9821  ni_timestamp_init(p_ctx, &p_ctx->pts_table, "dec_pts");
9822  ni_timestamp_init(p_ctx, &p_ctx->dts_queue, "dec_dts");
9823 
9824  //p_ctx->active_video_width = 0;
9825  //p_ctx->active_video_height = 0;
9826 
9827  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
9828  "%s(): p_ctx->device_handle=%" PRIx64 ", p_ctx->hw_id=%d, "
9829  "p_ctx->session_id=%d\n",
9830  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
9831  p_ctx->session_id);
9832 
9833  p_ctx->hw_action = NI_CODEC_HW_NONE;
9834 
9835 #ifndef _WIN32
9836  // If this is a P2P upload session, open the Netint kernel driver
9837  if (p_ctx->isP2P)
9838  {
9839  int ret;
9840  char line[256];
9841  char syspath[256];
9842  struct stat bstat;
9843  char *block_dev;
9844  char *dom, *bus, *dev, *fnc;
9845  FILE *fp;
9846 
9847  p_ctx->netint_fd = open("/dev/netint", O_RDWR);
9848  if (p_ctx->netint_fd < 0)
9849  {
9850  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() Can't open device: %s\n", __func__,
9851  strerror(NI_ERRNO));
9852  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
9853  LRETURN;
9854  }
9855 
9856  // find the PCI domain:bus:device:function
9857  block_dev = &p_ctx->blk_xcoder_name[0];
9858  if (stat(block_dev, &bstat) < 0)
9859  {
9860  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "failed to get stat of file %s\n", block_dev);
9861  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
9862  LRETURN;
9863  }
9864 
9865  if ((bstat.st_mode & S_IFMT) != S_IFBLK)
9866  {
9867  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s is not a block device\n", block_dev);
9868  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
9869  LRETURN;
9870  }
9871 
9872  ret = snprintf(syspath, sizeof(syspath) - 1,
9873  "udevadm info -q path -n %s | perl -nle'print $& "
9874  "while m{(?<=/)[0-9a-f]{4}:[0-9a-f]{2}:[0-9a-f]{2}\\.[0-9a-f]}g' | tail -n 1", block_dev + 5);
9875  syspath[ret] = '\0';
9876 
9877  fp = popen(syspath, "r");
9878 
9879  if (fp == NULL)
9880  {
9881  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Failed to read address\n");
9882  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
9883  LRETURN;
9884  }
9885 
9886  if (fgets(line, 256, fp) == NULL)
9887  {
9888  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Failed to read line from address\n");
9889  pclose(fp);
9890  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
9891  LRETURN;
9892  }
9893 
9894  pclose(fp);
9895 
9896  errno = 0;
9897  p_ctx->domain = strtoul(line, &dom, 16);
9898 
9899  if (errno < 0)
9900  {
9901  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Failed to read PCI domain\n");
9902  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
9903  LRETURN;
9904  }
9905 
9906  errno = 0;
9907  p_ctx->bus = strtoul(dom + 1, &bus, 16);
9908 
9909  if (errno < 0)
9910  {
9911  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Failed to read PCI bus\n");
9912  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
9913  LRETURN;
9914  }
9915 
9916  errno = 0;
9917  p_ctx->dev = strtoul(bus + 1, &dev, 16);
9918 
9919  if (errno < 0)
9920  {
9921  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Failed to read PCI device\n");
9922  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
9923  LRETURN;
9924  }
9925 
9926  errno = 0;
9927  p_ctx->fn = strtoul(dev + 1, &fnc, 16);
9928 
9929  if (errno < 0)
9930  {
9931  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Failed to read PCI function\n");
9932  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
9933  LRETURN;
9934  }
9935 
9936  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "PCI slot = %d:%d:%d:%d\n", p_ctx->domain, p_ctx->bus,
9937  p_ctx->dev, p_ctx->fn);
9938  }
9939 #endif
9940 
9941 #ifdef XCODER_DUMP_ENABLED
9942  char dump_file[256] = { 0 };
9943 
9944  snprintf(dump_file, sizeof dump_file, "%s%u%s", "decoder_in_id",
9945  p_ctx->session_id, ".264");
9946  p_ctx->p_dump[0] = fopen(dump_file, "wb");
9947  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "dump_file = %s\n", dump_file);
9948 
9949  snprintf(dump_file, sizeof dump_file, "%s%u%s", "decoder_out_id",
9950  p_ctx->session_id, ".yuv");
9951  p_ctx->p_dump[1] = fopen(dump_file, "wb");
9952  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "dump_file = %s\n", dump_file);
9953 
9954  if (!p_ctx->p_dump[0] || !p_ctx->p_dump[1])
9955  {
9956  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): Cannot open dump file\n", __func__);
9957  }
9958 #endif
9959 
9960 END:
9961 
9962  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
9963  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
9964  return retval;
9965 }
9966 
9967 /*!******************************************************************************
9968 * \brief Copy a xcoder decoder worker thread info
9969 *
9970 * \param
9971 *
9972 * \return
9973 *******************************************************************************/
9974 ni_retcode_t ni_decoder_session_copy_internal(ni_session_context_t *src_p_ctx, ni_session_context_t *dst_p_ctx)
9975 {
9976  if (!src_p_ctx || !dst_p_ctx)
9977  {
9978  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: passed parameters are null!, return\n");
9979  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
9980  }
9981 
9982  dst_p_ctx->pext_mutex = &src_p_ctx->mutex; //for hwdl
9983  dst_p_ctx->max_nvme_io_size = src_p_ctx->max_nvme_io_size;
9984  dst_p_ctx->device_handle = src_p_ctx->device_handle;
9985  dst_p_ctx->blk_io_handle = src_p_ctx->blk_io_handle;
9986  dst_p_ctx->hw_id = src_p_ctx->hw_id;
9987 
9988  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
9989 }
9990 
9991 /*!******************************************************************************
9992 * \brief Send a YUV p_frame to upload session
9993 *
9994 * \param
9995 *
9996 * \return
9997 *******************************************************************************/
9998 int ni_hwupload_session_write(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx, ni_frame_t *p_frame,
9999  niFrameSurface1_t *hwdesc)
10000 {
10001  int retval = 0;
10002  uint32_t size = 0;
10003  //uint32_t metadata_size = NI_APP_ENC_FRAME_META_DATA_SIZE;
10004  uint32_t i = 0;
10005  uint32_t tx_size = 0, aligned_tx_size = 0;
10006  uint32_t sent_size = 0;
10007  uint32_t frame_size_bytes = 0;
10008  uint32_t retry_count = 0;
10009  ni_instance_buf_info_t buf_info = { 0 };
10010 #ifdef MEASURE_LATENCY
10011  uint64_t abs_time_ns;
10012 #endif
10013 
10014  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
10015  //niFrameSurface1_t* p_data3 = (niFrameSurface1_t*)((uint8_t*)p_frame->p_data[3]);
10017  //ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s:mar16 HW=%d ui16FrameIdx=%d i8InstID=%d device_handle=%d\n",
10018  // ishwframe, p_data3->ui16FrameIdx, p_data3->i8InstID, p_data3->device_handle);
10019 
10020  if (!p_ctx || !p_frame)
10021  {
10022  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
10023  __func__);
10024  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
10025  LRETURN;
10026  }
10027 
10028  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
10029  {
10030  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
10031  __func__);
10032  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
10033  LRETURN;
10034  }
10035 
10036 #ifdef MEASURE_LATENCY
10037  if ((p_frame->dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE) && (p_ctx->frame_time_q != NULL))
10038  {
10039  abs_time_ns = ni_gettime_ns();
10040  ni_lat_meas_q_add_entry((ni_lat_meas_q_t *)p_ctx->frame_time_q,
10041  abs_time_ns, p_frame->dts);
10042  }
10043 #endif
10044 
10045  frame_size_bytes = p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] + p_frame->data_len[2];// +p_frame->data_len[3] + p_frame->extra_data_len;
10046  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "frame size bytes =%u %d is metadata!\n", frame_size_bytes,
10047  0);
10048  p_ctx->status = 0;
10049  for (;;)
10050  {
10051  //retval = ni_query_instance_buf_info(p_ctx, INST_BUF_INFO_RW_WRITE,
10052  // NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER, &buf_info);
10053 
10054  retval = ni_query_instance_buf_info(p_ctx, INST_BUF_INFO_RW_UPLOAD,
10055  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER, &buf_info);
10056  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
10057  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
10058  //CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval); No need for this because
10059  //no VPU is involved for upload
10060  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval ||
10061  (buf_info.hw_inst_ind.buffer_avail == 0 && retry_count >= 500))
10062  {
10063  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "Upload write query retry %d\n", retry_count);
10064  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
10065  p_ctx->status = NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_WRITE_BUFFER_FULL;
10066  LRETURN;
10067  }
10068  if (buf_info.hw_inst_ind.buffer_avail == 0 && retry_count < 500)
10069  {
10070  retry_count++;
10071  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
10072  ni_usleep(100);
10073  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
10074  } else //available
10075  {
10076  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: avail %d, FID %d\n", __func__,
10077  buf_info.hw_inst_ind.buffer_avail,
10078  buf_info.hw_inst_ind.frame_index);
10079  break;
10080  }
10081  }
10082  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info hwupload write query success, available buf "
10083  "size %u >= frame size %u , retry %u\n",
10084  buf_info.buf_avail_size, frame_size_bytes, retry_count);
10085 
10086  {
10087 #ifdef XCODER_TIMESTAMP_DTS_ENABLED
10088  retval = ni_timestamp_register(p_ctx->buffer_pool, p_ctx->dts_queue,
10089  p_frame->dts, 0);
10090  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
10091  {
10092  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
10093  "ERROR %s(): ni_timestamp_register() for dts "
10094  "returned: %d\n",
10095  __func__, retval);
10096  }
10097 #endif
10098 
10099  //Apply write configuration here
10100  retval = ni_config_session_rw(p_ctx, SESSION_WRITE_CONFIG, 1,
10101  NI_CODEC_HW_UPLOAD, 0);
10102  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
10103  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
10104  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
10105 
10106  uint32_t ui32LBA =
10107  WRITE_INSTANCE_W(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
10108  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10109  "%s: p_data = %p, p_frame->buffer_size = %u, "
10110  "p_ctx->frame_num = %" PRIu64 ", LBA = 0x%x\n",
10111  __func__, p_frame->p_data, p_frame->buffer_size, p_ctx->frame_num,
10112  ui32LBA);
10113  sent_size = frame_size_bytes;
10114  if (sent_size % NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT)
10115  {
10116  sent_size =
10117  ((sent_size / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) +
10118  NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
10119  }
10120 
10121  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
10122  p_frame->p_buffer, sent_size, ui32LBA);
10123  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_cmd_xcoder_write, p_ctx->device_type,
10124  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
10125  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
10126  if (retval < 0)
10127  {
10128  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): nvme command failed\n", __func__);
10129  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
10130  LRETURN;
10131  }
10132 
10133  hwdesc->ui16FrameIdx = buf_info.hw_inst_ind.frame_index;
10134  hwdesc->ui16session_ID = p_ctx->session_id;
10135  hwdesc->device_handle =
10136  (int32_t)((int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle & 0xFFFFFFFF);
10137  hwdesc->bit_depth = p_ctx->bit_depth_factor;
10138  hwdesc->src_cpu = (uint8_t)NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER;
10139  hwdesc->output_idx = 0;
10140 
10141  p_ctx->frame_num++;
10142  size = frame_size_bytes;
10143 
10144 #ifdef XCODER_DUMP_DATA
10145  char dump_file[256];
10146  snprintf(dump_file, sizeof(dump_file), "%ld-%u-hwup-fme/fme-%04ld.yuv",
10147  (long)getpid(), p_ctx->session_id, (long)p_ctx->frame_num);
10148 
10149  FILE *f = fopen(dump_file, "wb");
10150  fwrite(p_frame->p_buffer,
10151  p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] + p_frame->data_len[2],
10152  1, f);
10153  fflush(f);
10154  fclose(f);
10155 #endif
10156  }
10157 
10158 #ifdef MEASURE_LATENCY
10159  if ((p_frame->dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE) && (p_ctx->frame_time_q != NULL))
10160  {
10161  abs_time_ns = ni_gettime_ns();
10162  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "DTS:%" PRId64 ",DELTA:%lu,uLAT:%lu;\n", p_frame->dts,
10163  abs_time_ns - p_ctx->prev_read_frame_time,
10164  ni_lat_meas_q_check_latency((ni_lat_meas_q_t *)p_ctx->frame_time_q,
10165  abs_time_ns, p_frame->dts));
10166  p_ctx->prev_read_frame_time = abs_time_ns;
10167  }
10168 #endif
10169 
10170  retval = size;
10171 
10172 END:
10173 
10174  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
10175  return retval;
10176 }
10177 
10178 /*!******************************************************************************
10179 * \brief Retrieve a HW descriptor of uploaded frame
10180 *
10181 * \param p_ctx pointer to uploader session context
10182 * hwdesc pointer to hw descriptor
10183 *
10184 * \return
10185 * On success
10186 * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
10187 * On failure
10188 * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
10189 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
10190 * NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
10191 *******************************************************************************/
10192 int ni_hwupload_session_read_hwdesc(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
10193  niFrameSurface1_t *hwdesc)
10194 {
10195  int retval = 0;
10196  ni_instance_buf_info_t hwdesc_info = { 0 };
10197  int query_retry = 0;
10198 
10199  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
10200 
10201  if (!p_ctx || !hwdesc)
10202  {
10203  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
10204  __func__);
10205  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
10206  LRETURN;
10207  }
10208 
10209  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
10210  {
10211  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
10212  __func__);
10213  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
10214  LRETURN;
10215  }
10216 
10217  for (;;)
10218  {
10219  query_retry++;
10220 #ifndef _WIN32
10221  retval = ni_query_instance_buf_info(p_ctx, INST_BUF_INFO_R_ACQUIRE,
10222  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER, &hwdesc_info);
10223 #else
10224  retval = ni_query_instance_buf_info(p_ctx, INST_BUF_INFO_RW_UPLOAD,
10225  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER, &hwdesc_info);
10226 #endif
10227  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
10228  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
10229  &(p_ctx->session_id));
10230 
10231  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
10232  {
10233  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Warning upload read hwdesc fail rc %d or ind "
10234  "!\n", retval);
10235 
10236  if (query_retry >= 1000)
10237  {
10238  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
10239  LRETURN;
10240  }
10241  ni_usleep(100);
10242  }
10243  else
10244  {
10245  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info hwupload read hwdesc success, "
10246  "frame_ind=%d !\n", hwdesc_info.hw_inst_ind.frame_index);
10247 
10248  hwdesc->ui16FrameIdx = hwdesc_info.hw_inst_ind.frame_index;
10249  hwdesc->ui16session_ID = p_ctx->session_id;
10250  hwdesc->device_handle =
10251  (int32_t)((int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle & 0xFFFFFFFF);
10252  hwdesc->bit_depth = p_ctx->bit_depth_factor;
10253  hwdesc->src_cpu = (uint8_t)NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER;
10254  hwdesc->output_idx = 0;
10255  LRETURN;
10256  }
10257  }
10258 
10259 END:
10260  return retval;
10261 }
10262 
10263 /*!*****************************************************************************
10264 * \brief clear a particular xcoder instance buffer/data
10265 *
10266 * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
10267 * \param ni_instance_buf_info_rw_type_t rw_type
10268 * \param ni_device_type_t device_type - xcoder type Encoder or Decoder
10269 * \param ni_instance_buf_info_t *out - Struct preallocated from the caller
10270 * where the resulting data will be placed
10271 *
10272 * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION,
10273 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC or NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on
10274 * failure
10275 ******************************************************************************/
10276 ni_retcode_t ni_clear_instance_buf(niFrameSurface1_t *surface,
10277  int32_t device_handle)
10278 {
10279  ni_nvme_command_t cmd = { 0 };
10280  void* p_buffer = NULL;
10281  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
10282  uint32_t dataLen = 0;
10283  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
10284 
10285  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter - device_handle %d\n", __func__,
10286  device_handle);
10287 
10288  if ((uint16_t)NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == surface->ui16session_ID)
10289  {
10290  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
10291  __func__);
10292  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
10293  LRETURN;
10294  }
10295 
10296  //malloc data buffer
10297  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN))
10298  {
10299  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
10300  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
10301  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
10302  LRETURN;
10303  }
10304  memset(p_buffer, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
10305  //maybe just set 13 aqs inst id again?
10306  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s():cdw10=0x%x FID = %d\n", __func__, cmd.cdw10,
10307  surface->ui16FrameIdx);
10308  ui32LBA = CLEAR_INSTANCE_BUF_W(((uint16_t)surface->ui16FrameIdx));
10309  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd((ni_device_handle_t)(int64_t)device_handle,
10310  NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE, p_buffer,
10311  NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA);
10312  //Cannot check sessio stats here since this isn't a session command.
10313  if (retval < 0)
10314  {
10315  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
10316  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
10317  LRETURN;
10318  }
10319 
10320 END:
10321 
10322  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
10323  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
10324  return retval;
10325 }
10326 
10327 /*!******************************************************************************
10328 * \brief Retrieve a hw desc p_frame from decoder
10329 * \param
10330 *
10331 * \return
10332 *******************************************************************************/
10333 ni_retcode_t ni_decoder_session_read_desc(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_frame_t* p_frame)
10334 {
10335  //Needs serious editing to support hwdesc read again, this is currently vanilla read
10336  //queue_info decoder_read_workerqueue;
10337  ni_instance_mgr_stream_info_t data = {0};
10338  int rx_size = 0;
10339  uint64_t frame_offset = 0;
10340  uint16_t yuvW = 0;
10341  uint16_t yuvH = 0;
10342  uint8_t *p_data_buffer;
10343  int i = 0;
10344  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
10345  int metadata_hdr_size = NI_FW_META_DATA_SZ -
10346  NI_MAX_NUM_OF_DECODER_OUTPUTS * sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t);
10347  int sei_size = 0;
10348  uint32_t total_bytes_to_read = 0;
10349  uint32_t total_yuv_met_size = 0;
10350  uint32_t read_size_bytes = 0;
10351  uint32_t actual_read_size = 0;
10352  int keep_processing = 1;
10353  ni_instance_buf_info_t buf_info = {0};
10354  int query_retry = 0;
10355  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
10356  unsigned int bytes_read_so_far = 0;
10357  int query_type = INST_BUF_INFO_RW_READ;
10358  int low_delay_notify = 0;
10359 #ifdef MEASURE_LATENCY
10360  uint64_t abs_time_ns;
10361 #endif
10362 
10363  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
10364 
10365  if (!p_ctx || !p_frame)
10366  {
10367  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
10368  __func__);
10369  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
10370  }
10371 
10372  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
10373 
10374  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
10375  {
10376  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
10377  __func__);
10378  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
10379  LRETURN;
10380  }
10381 
10382  p_data_buffer = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer;
10383 
10384  // p_frame->p_data[] can be NULL before actual resolution is returned by
10385  // decoder and buffer pool is allocated, so no checking here.
10386 
10387  total_bytes_to_read = p_frame->data_len[3] + metadata_hdr_size;
10388  total_yuv_met_size = p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] + p_frame->data_len[2] + metadata_hdr_size;
10389  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10390  "Total bytes to read %u total_yuv_met_size %u, low_delay %u\n",
10391  total_bytes_to_read, total_yuv_met_size, p_ctx->decoder_low_delay);
10392  if (p_ctx->decoder_low_delay > 0 && !p_ctx->ready_to_close)
10393  {
10394  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "frame_num = %" PRIu64 ", pkt_num = %" PRIu64 "\n",
10395  p_ctx->frame_num, p_ctx->pkt_num);
10396  if (p_ctx->frame_num >= p_ctx->pkt_num)
10397  {
10398  //nothing to query, leave
10399  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
10400  LRETURN;
10401  }
10402  query_type = INST_BUF_INFO_RW_READ_BUSY;
10403  }
10404  for (;;)
10405  {
10406  query_sleep(p_ctx);
10407 
10408  query_retry++;
10409  retval = ni_query_instance_buf_info(p_ctx, query_type,
10410  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER, &buf_info);
10411  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
10412  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
10413  &(p_ctx->session_id));
10414  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
10415 
10416  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info query buf_info.size = %u\n",
10417  buf_info.buf_avail_size);
10418 
10419  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
10420  {
10421  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "Dec read desc failed. Retry %d\n", query_retry);
10422 
10423  if (query_retry >= 1000)
10424  {
10425  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Warning: dec read desc failed %d retries. rc=%d"
10426  "\n", query_retry, retval);
10427  low_delay_notify = 1;
10428  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
10429  LRETURN;
10430  }
10431  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
10432  ni_usleep(NI_RETRY_INTERVAL_100US);
10433  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
10434  } else if (buf_info.buf_avail_size == DP_IPC_PASSTHRU)
10435  {
10436  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): Bad available buffer size %u\n", __FUNCTION__, buf_info.buf_avail_size);
10437  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
10438  LRETURN;
10439  } else if (buf_info.buf_avail_size == metadata_hdr_size)
10440  {
10441  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10442  "(HwFrame) Info only metadata hdr is available, seq change?\n");
10443  total_bytes_to_read = metadata_hdr_size;
10444  break;
10445  } else if (buf_info.buf_avail_size < total_yuv_met_size)
10446  {
10447  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "Dec read desc buf_size < frame_size. Retry %d\n", query_retry);
10448 
10449  // query to see if it is eos now, if we have sent it
10450  if (p_ctx->ready_to_close)
10451  {
10452  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info dec query, ready_to_close %u, query eos\n",
10453  p_ctx->ready_to_close);
10454  retval = ni_query_stream_info(p_ctx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER, &data);
10455  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
10456  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
10457  &(p_ctx->session_id));
10458  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
10459 
10460  if (data.is_flushed ||
10461  query_retry >= NI_MAX_DEC_SESSION_READ_QUERY_EOS_RETRIES) // 15000 retries
10462  {
10463  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info eos reached: is_flushed %u try %d.\n",
10464  data.is_flushed, query_retry);
10465  if (query_retry >= NI_MAX_DEC_SESSION_READ_QUERY_EOS_RETRIES) //15000 retries
10466  {
10467  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Info eos reached exceeding max retries: is_flushed %u try %d.\n",
10468  data.is_flushed, query_retry);
10469  }
10470  p_frame->end_of_stream = 1;
10471  low_delay_notify = 1;
10472  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
10473  LRETURN;
10474  }
10475  else
10476  {
10477  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "Dec read available buf size == %d, query try %d,"
10478  " retrying ..\n", buf_info.buf_avail_size, query_retry);
10479  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
10480  ni_usleep(NI_RETRY_INTERVAL_200US); // 200 us
10481  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
10482  continue;
10483  }
10484  }
10485 
10486  if (NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_WRITE_BUFFER_FULL == p_ctx->status &&
10487  query_retry < 1000 / 2)
10488  {
10489  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
10490  ni_usleep(NI_RETRY_INTERVAL_100US);
10491  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
10492 
10493  continue;
10494  } else
10495  {
10496  if (p_ctx->decoder_low_delay>0)
10497  {
10498  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Warning: low_delay mode non sequential input? Disabling LD\n");
10499  p_ctx->decoder_low_delay = -1;
10500  low_delay_notify = 1;
10501  }
10502  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Warning: dec read desc failed %d retries. rc=%d"
10503  "\n", query_retry, retval);
10504  }
10505  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
10506  LRETURN;
10507  }
10508  else
10509  {
10510  // We have to ensure there are adequate number of DTS for picture
10511  // reorder delay otherwise wait for more packets to be sent to decoder.
10512  ni_timestamp_table_t *p_dts_queue = p_ctx->dts_queue;
10513  if ((int)p_dts_queue->list.count < p_ctx->pic_reorder_delay + 1 &&
10514  !p_ctx->ready_to_close &&
10515  NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_WRITE_BUFFER_FULL != p_ctx->status)
10516  {
10517  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
10518  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10519  "At least %d packets should be sent before reading the "
10520  "first frame!\n",
10521  p_ctx->pic_reorder_delay + 1);
10522  LRETURN;
10523  }
10524  // get actual YUV transfer size if this is the stream's very first read
10525  if (0 == p_ctx->active_video_width || 0 == p_ctx->active_video_height)
10526  {
10527  retval = ni_query_stream_info(p_ctx, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER, &data);
10528  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
10529  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
10530  &(p_ctx->session_id));
10531  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
10532 
10533  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info dec YUV query, pic size %ux%u xfer frame size "
10534  "%ux%u frame-rate %u is_flushed %u\n",
10535  data.picture_width, data.picture_height,
10536  data.transfer_frame_stride, data.transfer_frame_height,
10537  data.frame_rate, data.is_flushed);
10538  p_ctx->active_video_width = data.transfer_frame_stride;
10539  p_ctx->active_video_height = data.transfer_frame_height;
10540  p_ctx->actual_video_width = data.picture_width;
10541  p_ctx->pixel_format = data.pix_format;
10542  p_ctx->bit_depth_factor = ni_get_bitdepth_factor_from_pixfmt(p_ctx->pixel_format);
10543  //p_ctx->bit_depth_factor = data.transfer_frame_stride / data.picture_width;
10544  p_ctx->is_first_frame = 1;
10545 
10546  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info dec YUV, adjust frame size from %ux%u to "
10547  "%ux%u\n", p_frame->video_width, p_frame->video_height,
10548  p_ctx->active_video_width, p_ctx->active_video_height);
10549 
10550  retval = ni_frame_buffer_alloc(
10551  p_frame, p_ctx->actual_video_width, p_ctx->active_video_height,
10552  p_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_H264, 1,
10553  p_ctx->bit_depth_factor,
10554  3, // Alloc space for write to data[3] and metadata
10555  1);
10556 
10557  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
10558  {
10559  LRETURN;
10560  }
10561  total_bytes_to_read = p_frame->data_len[3] + metadata_hdr_size;
10562  p_data_buffer = (uint8_t*)p_frame->p_buffer;
10563  // make sure we don't read more than available
10564  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info dec buf size: %u YUV frame + meta-hdr size: %u "
10565  "available: %u\n", p_frame->buffer_size,
10566  total_bytes_to_read, buf_info.buf_avail_size);
10567  }
10568  break;
10569  }
10570  }// end while1 query retry
10571 
10572  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "total_bytes_to_read %u max_nvme_io_size %u ylen %u cr len "
10573  "%u cb len %u hdr %d\n",
10574  total_bytes_to_read, p_ctx->max_nvme_io_size,
10575  p_frame->data_len[0], p_frame->data_len[1],
10576  p_frame->data_len[2], metadata_hdr_size);
10577 
10578  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "p_frame->data_len[3] = %u\n", p_frame->data_len[3]);
10579  if (buf_info.buf_avail_size < total_bytes_to_read)
10580  {
10581  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
10582 
10583  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
10584  "ERROR %s() avaliable size(%u) less than "
10585  "needed (%u)\n",
10586  __func__, buf_info.buf_avail_size, total_bytes_to_read);
10587  abort();
10588  }
10589 
10590  //Apply read configuration here
10591  retval = ni_config_session_rw(p_ctx, SESSION_READ_CONFIG, 1,
10592  NI_CODEC_HW_ENABLE, 0);
10593  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config, p_ctx->device_type,
10594  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
10595  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
10596 
10597  read_size_bytes = total_bytes_to_read;
10598  ui32LBA = READ_INSTANCE_R(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
10599  if (read_size_bytes % NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT)
10600  {
10601  read_size_bytes = ( (read_size_bytes / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
10602  }
10603 
10604  retval = ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
10605  p_data_buffer, read_size_bytes, ui32LBA);
10606  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_cmd_xcoder_read, p_ctx->device_type,
10607  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
10608  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
10609  if (retval < 0)
10610  {
10611  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): nvme command failed\n", __func__);
10612  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
10613  LRETURN;
10614  } else
10615  {
10616  // command issued successfully, now exit
10617  ni_metadata_dec_frame_t *p_meta =
10618  (ni_metadata_dec_frame_t *)((uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer +
10619  p_frame->data_len[0] +
10620  p_frame->data_len[1] +
10621  p_frame->data_len[2] +
10622  p_frame->data_len[3]);
10623 
10624  if (buf_info.buf_avail_size != metadata_hdr_size)
10625  {
10626  low_delay_notify = 1;
10627  // shift metadata to end of triple output
10628 #ifdef _WIN32
10629  p_data_buffer = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer +
10630  sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t) * NI_MAX_NUM_OF_DECODER_OUTPUTS;
10631  memcpy(p_meta, p_data_buffer, metadata_hdr_size);
10632 #else
10633  memcpy(p_meta,
10634  p_frame->p_buffer +
10635  sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t) * NI_MAX_NUM_OF_DECODER_OUTPUTS,
10636  metadata_hdr_size);
10637 #endif
10638  sei_size = p_meta->sei_size;
10639  niFrameSurface1_t *p_data3 =
10640  (niFrameSurface1_t *)((uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer +
10641  p_frame->data_len[0] +
10642  p_frame->data_len[1] +
10643  p_frame->data_len[2]);
10644 
10645  niFrameSurface1_t *p_data3_1 =
10646  (niFrameSurface1_t *)((uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer +
10647  sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t));
10648  niFrameSurface1_t *p_data3_2 =
10649  (niFrameSurface1_t *)((uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer +
10650  2 * sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t));
10651  // Libxcoder knows the handle so overwrite here
10652  p_data3->device_handle =
10653  (int32_t)((int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle & 0xFFFFFFFF);
10654  p_data3_1->device_handle =
10655  (int32_t)((int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle & 0xFFFFFFFF);
10656  p_data3_2->device_handle =
10657  (int32_t)((int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle & 0xFFFFFFFF);
10658  p_data3->ui16session_ID = p_data3_1->ui16session_ID =
10659  p_data3_2->ui16session_ID = (uint16_t)p_ctx->session_id;
10660  p_data3->src_cpu = p_data3_1->src_cpu = p_data3_2->src_cpu =
10661  (uint8_t)NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER;
10662 
10663  p_data3->output_idx = 0;
10664  p_data3_1->output_idx = 1;
10665  p_data3_2->output_idx = 2;
10666 
10667  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10668  "p_data3_1:sei_size=%d device_handle=%d == hw_id=%d ses_id=%d\n",
10669  sei_size, p_data3_1->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
10670  p_data3_1->ui16session_ID);
10671  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10672  "p_data3_1: ui16FrameIdx=%d NodeAddre=0x%x planar=%d bd=%d\n",
10673  p_data3_1->ui16FrameIdx, p_data3_1->ui32nodeAddress,
10674  p_data3_1->encoding_type, p_data3_1->bit_depth);
10675  ni_log(
10676  NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10677  "p_data3_2:sei_size=%d device_handle=%d == hw_id=%d ses_id=%d\n",
10678  sei_size, p_data3_2->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
10679  p_data3_2->ui16session_ID);
10680  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10681  "p_data3_2: ui16FrameIdx=%d NodeAddre=0x%x planar=%d bd=%d\n",
10682  p_data3_2->ui16FrameIdx, p_data3_2->ui32nodeAddress,
10683  p_data3_2->encoding_type, p_data3_2->bit_depth);
10684 
10685  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10686  "%s:sei_size=%d device_handle=%d == hw_id=%d "
10687  "ses_id=%d\n",
10688  __func__, sei_size, p_data3->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
10689  p_data3->ui16session_ID);
10690  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10691  "%s: ui16FrameIdx=%d NodeAddre=0x%x, "
10692  "planar=%d bd=%d\n",
10693  __func__, p_data3->ui16FrameIdx, p_data3->ui32nodeAddress,
10694  p_data3->encoding_type, p_data3->bit_depth);
10695  }
10696 
10697  total_bytes_to_read = total_bytes_to_read + sei_size;
10698  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10699  "decoder read desc success, retval %d "
10700  "total_bytes_to_read include sei %u sei_size %d\n",
10701  __func__, retval, total_bytes_to_read, sei_size);
10702 
10703  if (total_bytes_to_read > NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT)
10704  {
10705  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Oversized metadata!\n", __func__);
10706  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
10707  LRETURN;
10708  }
10709  }
10710 
10711  //bytes_read_so_far = total_bytes_to_read;
10712  // Note: session status is NOT reset but tracked between send
10713  // and recv to catch and recover from a loop condition
10714  //total_bytes_to_read = p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] + p_frame->data_len[2] + p_frame->data_len[3] + metadata_hdr_size + sei_size; //since only HW desc
10715  bytes_read_so_far = total_bytes_to_read;
10716  //bytes_read_so_far = p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] + p_frame->data_len[2] + p_frame->data_len[3] + metadata_hdr_size + sei_size; //since only HW desc
10717  rx_size = ni_create_frame(p_frame, bytes_read_so_far, &frame_offset, true);
10718  p_ctx->frame_pkt_offset = frame_offset;
10719 
10720  if (rx_size > 0)
10721  {
10722  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): s-state %d first_frame %d\n", __func__,
10723  p_ctx->session_run_state, p_ctx->is_first_frame);
10724  if (ni_timestamp_get_with_threshold(
10725  p_ctx->dts_queue, 0, (int64_t *)&p_frame->dts,
10726  XCODER_FRAME_OFFSET_DIFF_THRES, 0,
10727  p_ctx->buffer_pool) != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
10728  {
10729  if (p_ctx->last_dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE && !p_ctx->ready_to_close)
10730  {
10731  p_ctx->pic_reorder_delay++;
10732  p_frame->dts = p_ctx->last_dts + p_ctx->last_dts_interval;
10733  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Padding DTS: %" PRId64 "\n", p_frame->dts);
10734  } else
10735  {
10736  p_frame->dts = NI_NOPTS_VALUE;
10737  }
10738  }
10739 
10740  if (p_ctx->is_first_frame)
10741  {
10742  for (i = 0; i < p_ctx->pic_reorder_delay; i++)
10743  {
10744  if (p_ctx->last_pts == NI_NOPTS_VALUE &&
10745  p_ctx->last_dts == NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
10746  {
10747  // If the p_frame->pts is unknown in the very beginning we assume
10748  // p_frame->pts == 0 as well as DTS less than PTS by 1000 * 1/timebase
10749  if (p_frame->pts >= p_frame->dts &&
10750  p_frame->pts - p_frame->dts < 1000)
10751  {
10752  break;
10753  }
10754  }
10755 
10756  if (ni_timestamp_get_with_threshold(
10757  p_ctx->dts_queue, 0, (int64_t *)&p_frame->dts,
10758  XCODER_FRAME_OFFSET_DIFF_THRES,
10759  p_ctx->frame_num % 500 == 0,
10760  p_ctx->buffer_pool) != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
10761  {
10762  p_frame->dts = NI_NOPTS_VALUE;
10763  }
10764  }
10765  // Reset for DTS padding counting
10766  p_ctx->pic_reorder_delay = 0;
10767  }
10768  if (p_ctx->codec_format == NI_CODEC_FORMAT_JPEG)//fw won't save frameoffset when decoding jpeg.
10769  {
10770  if (p_ctx->is_first_frame)
10771  {
10772  p_ctx->is_first_frame = 0;
10773  }
10774  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->pts_offsets[p_ctx->frame_num % NI_FIFO_SZ];
10775  p_frame->flags = p_ctx->flags_array[p_ctx->frame_num % NI_FIFO_SZ];
10776  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "p_frame->pts = %u, frame_num = %d, p_frame->dts = %u\n",
10777  p_frame->pts, p_ctx->frame_num, p_frame->dts);
10778  }
10779  else if (p_ctx->is_dec_pkt_512_aligned)
10780  {
10781  if (p_ctx->is_first_frame)
10782  {
10783  p_ctx->is_first_frame = 0;
10784 
10785  if (p_frame->dts == NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
10786  {
10787  p_frame->pts = NI_NOPTS_VALUE;
10788  }
10789  // if not a bitstream retrieve the pts of the frame corresponding to the first YUV output
10790  else if((p_ctx->pts_offsets[0] != NI_NOPTS_VALUE) && (p_ctx->pkt_index != -1))
10791  {
10792  ni_metadata_dec_frame_t* p_metadata =
10793  (ni_metadata_dec_frame_t*)((uint8_t*)p_frame->p_buffer +
10794  p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] +
10795  p_frame->data_len[2] + p_frame->data_len[3]);
10796  int num_fw_pkts =
10797  (int)p_metadata->metadata_common.ui64_data.frame_offset / 512;
10798  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: num_fw_pkts %d frame_offset %" PRIu64 "\n",
10799  __func__, num_fw_pkts,
10800  p_metadata->metadata_common.ui64_data.frame_offset);
10801  int idx = 0;
10802  uint64_t cumul = p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[0];
10803  bool bFound = (num_fw_pkts >= cumul);
10804  while (cumul < num_fw_pkts) // look for pts index
10805  {
10806  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: cumul %" PRIu64 "\n", __func__, cumul);
10807  if (idx == NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT)
10808  {
10809  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
10810  "Invalid index computation > "
10811  "NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT!\n");
10812  break;
10813  } else
10814  {
10815  idx ++;
10816  cumul += p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[idx];
10817  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10818  "%s: idx %d pkt_offsets_index[idx] %" PRIu64 "\n",
10819  __func__, idx, p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[idx]);
10820  }
10821  }
10822  //if ((idx != NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT) && (idx >= 0))
10823  if ((idx != NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT) && bFound)
10824  {
10825  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->pts_offsets[idx];
10826  p_frame->flags = p_ctx->flags_array[idx];
10827  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10828  "%s: (first frame) idx %d last_dts %" PRId64 ""
10829  " dts %" PRId64 " last_pts %" PRId64 " pts %" PRId64 "\n",
10830  __func__, idx, p_ctx->last_dts, p_frame->dts,
10831  p_ctx->last_pts, p_frame->pts);
10832  } else if (idx != NI_MAX_DEC_REJECT &&
10833  p_ctx->session_run_state == SESSION_RUN_STATE_RESETTING)
10834  {
10835  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10836  "xcoder_dec_receive(): session %u recovering and "
10837  "adjusting ts.\n",
10838  __func__, p_ctx->session_id);
10839  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->pts_offsets[idx];
10840  p_frame->flags = p_ctx->flags_array[idx];
10841  p_ctx->session_run_state = SESSION_RUN_STATE_NORMAL;
10842  }
10843  else // use pts = 0 as offset
10844  {
10845  p_frame->pts = 0;
10846  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10847  "%s: (zero default) dts %" PRId64 " pts "
10848  "%" PRId64 "\n",
10849  __func__, p_frame->dts, p_frame->pts);
10850  }
10851  }
10852  else
10853  {
10854  p_frame->pts = 0;
10855  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10856  "%s: (not bitstream) dts %" PRId64 " pts "
10857  "%" PRId64 "\n",
10858  __func__, p_frame->dts, p_frame->pts);
10859  }
10860  }
10861  else
10862  {
10863  int64_t pts_delta = p_frame->dts - p_ctx->last_dts;
10864  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->last_pts + pts_delta;
10865 
10866  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10867  "%s: (!is_first_frame idx) last_dts %" PRId64 ""
10868  " dts %" PRId64 " pts_delta %" PRId64 " last_pts "
10869  "%" PRId64 " pts %" PRId64 "\n",
10870  __func__, p_ctx->last_dts, p_frame->dts, pts_delta,
10871  p_ctx->last_pts, p_frame->pts);
10872  }
10873  }
10874  else
10875  {
