10876  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: frame_offset %" PRIu64 "\n", __func__,
10877  frame_offset);
10878  if (p_ctx->is_first_frame)
10879  {
10880  p_ctx->is_first_frame = 0;
10881  }
10882  // search for the pkt_offsets of received frame according to frame_offset.
10883  // here we get the index(i) which promises (p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[i] <= frame_offset && p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[i] > frame_offset)
10884  // i = -1 if not found
10885  i = rotated_array_binary_search(p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min,
10886  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index, NI_FIFO_SZ,
10887  frame_offset);
10888  if (i >= 0)
10889  {
10890  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->pts_offsets[i];
10891  p_frame->flags = p_ctx->flags_array[i];
10892  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10893  "%s: (found pts) dts %" PRId64 " pts "
10894  "%" PRId64 " frame_offset %" PRIu64 " i %d "
10895  "pkt_offsets_index_min %" PRIu64 " "
10896  "pkt_offsets_index %" PRIu64 "\n",
10897  __func__, p_frame->dts, p_frame->pts, frame_offset, i,
10898  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index_min[i],
10899  p_ctx->pkt_offsets_index[i]);
10900 
10901  p_frame->p_custom_sei_set = p_ctx->pkt_custom_sei_set[i];
10902  p_ctx->pkt_custom_sei_set[i] = NULL;
10903  } else
10904  {
10905  //backup solution pts
10906  p_frame->pts = p_ctx->last_pts + (p_frame->dts - p_ctx->last_dts);
10907  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
10908  "ERROR: Frame pts %" PRId64 " not found for offset "
10909  "%" PRIu64 "\n", p_frame->pts, frame_offset);
10910  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10911  "%s: (not found use default) dts %" PRId64 " pts %" PRId64
10912  "\n",
10913  __func__, p_frame->dts, p_frame->pts);
10914  }
10915  }
10916 
10917  p_frame->pts = guess_correct_pts(p_ctx, p_frame->pts, p_frame->dts);
10918  p_ctx->last_pts = p_frame->pts;
10919  if (p_frame->dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE && p_ctx->last_dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE)
10920  p_ctx->last_dts_interval = p_frame->dts - p_ctx->last_dts;
10921  p_ctx->last_dts = p_frame->dts;
10922  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: (best_effort_timestamp) pts %" PRId64 "\n",
10923  __func__, p_frame->pts);
10924  p_ctx->frame_num++;
10925  }
10926 
10927 #ifdef XCODER_DUMP_ENABLED
10928  fwrite(p_frame->data[0], rx_size, 1, p_ctx->p_dump[1]);
10929 #endif
10930 
10931  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): received data: [0x%08x]\n", __func__, rx_size);
10932  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10933  "%s(): p_frame->start_of_stream=%u, "
10934  "p_frame->end_of_stream=%u, p_frame->video_width=%u, "
10935  "p_frame->video_height=%u\n",
10936  __func__, p_frame->start_of_stream, p_frame->end_of_stream,
10937  p_frame->video_width, p_frame->video_height);
10938  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): p_frame->data_len[0/1/2]=%u/%u/%u\n", __func__,
10939  p_frame->data_len[0], p_frame->data_len[1], p_frame->data_len[2]);
10940 
10941  if (p_ctx->frame_num % 500 == 0)
10942  {
10943  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
10944  "Decoder pts queue size = %d dts queue size = %d\n\n",
10945  p_ctx->pts_table->list.count, p_ctx->dts_queue->list.count);
10946  // scan and clean up
10947  ni_timestamp_scan_cleanup(p_ctx->pts_table, p_ctx->dts_queue,
10948  p_ctx->buffer_pool);
10949  }
10950 
10951 #ifdef MEASURE_LATENCY
10952  if ((p_frame->dts != NI_NOPTS_VALUE) && (p_ctx->frame_time_q != NULL))
10953  {
10954  abs_time_ns = ni_gettime_ns();
10955  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "DTS:%lld,DELTA:%lu,dLAT:%lu;\n", p_frame->dts,
10956  abs_time_ns - p_ctx->prev_read_frame_time,
10957  ni_lat_meas_q_check_latency((ni_lat_meas_q_t *)p_ctx->frame_time_q,
10958  abs_time_ns, p_frame->dts));
10959  p_ctx->prev_read_frame_time = abs_time_ns;
10960  }
10961 #endif
10962 
10963 END:
10964 
10965  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
10966 
10967  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
10968  {
10969  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): bad exit, retval = %d\n", __func__, retval);
10970  if (retval == NI_RETCODE_ERROR_VPU_RECOVERY)
10971  {
10972  low_delay_signal(p_ctx);
10973  }
10974 
10975  return retval;
10976  } else
10977  {
10978  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit, rx_size = %d\n", __func__, rx_size);
10979  if (low_delay_notify)
10980  {
10981  low_delay_signal(p_ctx);
10982  }
10983 
10984  return rx_size;
10985  }
10986 }
10987 
10988 /*!******************************************************************************
10989 * \brief Retrieve a YUV p_frame from decoder
10990 *
10991 * \param
10992 *
10993 * \return
10994 *******************************************************************************/
10995 int ni_hwdownload_session_read(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, ni_frame_t* p_frame, niFrameSurface1_t* hwdesc)
10996 {
10997  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
10998  int rx_size = 0;
10999  uint64_t frame_offset = 0;
11000  uint16_t yuvW = 0;
11001  uint16_t yuvH = 0;
11002  uint8_t *p_data_buffer;
11003  int i = 0;
11004  int metadata_hdr_size = NI_FW_META_DATA_SZ -
11005  NI_MAX_NUM_OF_DECODER_OUTPUTS * sizeof(niFrameSurface1_t);
11006  uint32_t total_bytes_to_read = 0;
11007  uint32_t read_size_bytes = 0;
11008  uint32_t actual_read_size = 0;
11009  static long long decq_count = 0LL;
11010  int keep_processing = 1;
11011  int query_retry = 0;
11012  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
11013 
11014  //ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "hwcontext.c:ni_hwdl_frame() hwdesc %d %d %d\n",
11015  // hwdesc->ui16FrameIdx,
11016  // hwdesc->i8InstID,
11017  // hwdesc->ui16session_ID);
11018 
11019  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
11020 
11021  if ((!p_ctx) || (!p_frame))
11022  {
11023  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
11024  __func__);
11025  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11026  }
11027 
11028  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
11029  {
11030  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
11031  __func__);
11032  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
11033  LRETURN;
11034  }
11035 
11036  p_data_buffer = (uint8_t *)p_frame->p_buffer;
11037 
11038  for (i = 0; i < NI_MAX_NUM_DATA_POINTERS - 1; i++) //discount the hwdesc
11039  {
11040  if (!p_frame->p_data[i])
11041  {
11042  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): No receive buffer allocated.\n",
11043  __func__);
11044  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11045  LRETURN;
11046  }
11047  }
11048 
11049  if (0 == p_frame->data_len[0])
11050  {
11051  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): p_frame->data_len[0] = 0!.\n",
11052  __func__);
11053  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11054  LRETURN;
11055  }
11056 
11057  if (hwdesc->encoding_type == NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_SEMIPLANAR)
11058  {
11059  p_frame->data_len[2] = 0;
11060  } else if (hwdesc->encoding_type == NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_TILED4X4)
11061  {
11062  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
11063  "ERROR %s(): NI_PIXEL_PLANAR_FORMAT_TILED4X4 not supported in download.\n",
11064  __func__);
11065  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11066  LRETURN;
11067  }
11068  total_bytes_to_read = p_frame->data_len[0] + p_frame->data_len[1] +
11069  p_frame->data_len[2];// +metadata_hdr_size;
11070  unsigned int bytes_read_so_far = 0;
11071  uint32_t output_chunk_offset = hwdesc->ui32nodeAddress / FRAME_CHUNK_INDEX_SIZE; //for reading output1 or output2
11072  uint32_t output_minor_offset = hwdesc->ui32nodeAddress - output_chunk_offset * FRAME_CHUNK_INDEX_SIZE;
11073  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Total bytes to download %u, start offset = %u, chunkOffset "
11074  "%u, minorOffset %u\n",
11075  total_bytes_to_read, hwdesc->ui32nodeAddress,
11076  output_chunk_offset, output_minor_offset);
11077 
11078  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "total_bytes_to_read %u max_nvme_io_size %u ylen %u cr len "
11079  "%u cb len %u hdr %d\n",
11080  total_bytes_to_read, p_ctx->max_nvme_io_size,
11081  p_frame->data_len[0], p_frame->data_len[1],
11082  p_frame->data_len[2], metadata_hdr_size);
11083 
11084  //Apply read configuration here
11085  retval =
11086  ni_config_session_rw(p_ctx, SESSION_READ_CONFIG, 1,
11087  (output_minor_offset << NI_CODEC_HW_PAYLOAD_OFFSET) |
11088  NI_CODEC_HW_ENABLE | NI_CODEC_HW_DOWNLOAD,
11089  hwdesc->ui16FrameIdx);
11090  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config, hwdesc->src_cpu,
11091  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
11092  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
11093  if (retval < 0)
11094  {
11095  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): nvme command failed\n", __func__);
11096  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
11097  LRETURN;
11098  } else
11099  {
11100  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
11101  "Config HW download read desc success, retval %d total_bytes_to_read %u\n",
11102  retval, total_bytes_to_read);
11103  }
11104 
11105  read_size_bytes = total_bytes_to_read;
11106  ui32LBA = READ_INSTANCE_R(p_ctx->session_id, hwdesc->src_cpu);
11107  ui32LBA += output_chunk_offset;
11108  if (read_size_bytes % NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT)
11109  {
11110  read_size_bytes = ( (read_size_bytes / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
11111  }
11112 
11113  retval = ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(
11114  (ni_device_handle_t)(int64_t)hwdesc->device_handle,
11115  NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE, p_data_buffer, read_size_bytes, ui32LBA);
11116  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_cmd_xcoder_read, hwdesc->src_cpu,
11117  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
11118  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
11119  if (retval < 0)
11120  {
11121  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): nvme command failed\n", __func__);
11122  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
11123  LRETURN;
11124  } else
11125  {
11126  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
11127  "HW download read desc success, retval %d total_bytes_to_read %u\n",
11128  retval, total_bytes_to_read);
11129  }
11130 
11131  //Unset applied read configuration here
11132  retval = ni_config_session_rw(p_ctx, SESSION_READ_CONFIG, 0, 0, 0);
11133  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config, hwdesc->src_cpu,
11134  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
11135  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
11136 
11137  if (retval < 0)
11138  {
11139  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): nvme command failed\n", __func__);
11140  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
11141  LRETURN;
11142  } else
11143  {
11144  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
11145  "Unconfig HW download read desc success, retval %d total_bytes_to_read %u\n",
11146  retval, total_bytes_to_read);
11147  }
11148 
11149  bytes_read_so_far = total_bytes_to_read;
11150  // Note: session status is NOT reset but tracked between send
11151  // and recv to catch and recover from a loop condition
11152 
11153  if (p_ctx->is_auto_dl)
11154  rx_size = (int)bytes_read_so_far;
11155  else
11156  {
11157  rx_size =
11158  ni_create_frame(p_frame, bytes_read_so_far, &frame_offset, false);
11159  p_ctx->frame_pkt_offset = frame_offset;
11160  }
11161 
11162 
11163 #ifdef XCODER_DUMP_ENABLED
11164  fwrite(p_frame->data[0], rx_size, 1, p_ctx->p_dump[1]);
11165 #endif
11166 
11167  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "xcoder_dec_receive(): received data: [0x%08x]\n",
11168  __func__, rx_size);
11169  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
11170  "xcoder_dec_receive(): p_frame->start_of_stream=%u, "
11171  "p_frame->end_of_stream=%u, p_frame->video_width=%u, "
11172  "p_frame->video_height=%u\n",
11173  __func__, p_frame->start_of_stream, p_frame->end_of_stream,
11174  p_frame->video_width, p_frame->video_height);
11175  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
11176  "%s(): p_ctx->frame_num %" PRIu64 ", "
11177  "p_frame->data_len[0/1/2]=%u/%u/%u\n",
11178  __func__, p_ctx->frame_num, p_frame->data_len[0], p_frame->data_len[1],
11179  p_frame->data_len[2]);
11180 
11181  //if (decq_count % 500 == 0)
11182  //{
11183  // ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Decoder pts queue size = %d dts queue size = %d\n\n",
11184  // p_ctx->pts_table->list.count, p_ctx->dts_queue)->list.count);
11185  // // scan and clean up
11186  // ni_timestamp_scan_cleanup(p_ctx->pts_table, p_ctx->dts_queue, p_ctx->buffer_pool);
11187  //}
11188 
11189 END:
11190 
11191  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11192  {
11193  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): bad exit, retval = %d\n", __func__, retval);
11194  return retval;
11195  } else
11196  {
11197  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit, rx_size = %d\n", __func__, rx_size);
11198  return rx_size;
11199  }
11200 }
11201 
11202 /*!******************************************************************************
11203 * \brief Close an xcoder upload instance
11204 *
11205 * \param p_ctx pointer to uploader session context
11206 *
11207 * \return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
11208 *******************************************************************************/
11209 ni_retcode_t ni_uploader_session_close(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx)
11210 {
11211 #ifndef _WIN32
11212  if (p_ctx->isP2P)
11213  {
11214  if (p_ctx->netint_fd)
11215  {
11216  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: close driver fd %d\n", __func__,
11217  p_ctx->netint_fd);
11218  close(p_ctx->netint_fd);
11219  }
11220  }
11221 #endif
11222  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
11223 }
11224 
11225 /*!******************************************************************************
11226 * \brief Send a p_config command to configure uploading parameters.
11227 *
11228 * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
11229 * \param[in] pool_size pool size to create
11230 * \param[in] pool 0 = normal pool, 1 = P2P pool
11231 *
11232 * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success,
11233 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
11234 * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on failure
11235 *******************************************************************************/
11236 ni_retcode_t ni_config_instance_set_uploader_params(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
11237  uint32_t pool_size,
11238  uint32_t pool)
11239 {
11240  void* p_uploader_config = NULL;
11241  ni_uploader_config_t* p_cfg = NULL;
11242  uint32_t buffer_size = sizeof(ni_encoder_config_t);
11243  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
11244  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
11245  int i = 0;
11246  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
11247 
11248  if (!p_ctx)
11249  {
11250  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
11251  __func__);
11252  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11253  LRETURN;
11254  }
11255 
11256  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
11257  {
11258  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
11259  __func__);
11260  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
11261  LRETURN;
11262  }
11263 
11264  buffer_size = ((buffer_size + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
11265  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_uploader_config, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE),
11266  buffer_size))
11267  {
11268  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
11269  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
11270  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
11271  LRETURN;
11272  }
11273  memset(p_uploader_config, 0, buffer_size);//
11274 
11275  p_cfg = (ni_uploader_config_t*)p_uploader_config;
11276  p_cfg->ui16picWidth = p_ctx->active_video_width;
11277  p_cfg->ui16picHeight = p_ctx->active_video_height;
11278  p_cfg->ui8poolSize = pool_size;
11279  p_cfg->ui8PixelFormat = p_ctx->pixel_format;
11280  p_cfg->ui8Pool = pool;
11281 
11282  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "ni_config_instance_set_uploader_params():%d x %d x Format %d with %d framepool\n",
11283  p_cfg->ui16picWidth, p_cfg->ui16picHeight, p_cfg->ui8PixelFormat, p_cfg->ui8poolSize);
11284 
11285  //configure the session here
11286  ui32LBA =
11287  CONFIG_INSTANCE_SetEncPara_W(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_ENCODER);
11288 
11289  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
11290  p_uploader_config, buffer_size, ui32LBA);
11291  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
11292  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
11293  &(p_ctx->session_id));
11294  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11295  {
11296  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: ni_nvme_send_admin_cmd failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n", (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
11297  //Close the session since we can't configure it
11298  retval = ni_encoder_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
11299  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11300  {
11301  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: ni_uploader_session_close failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n", (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
11302  }
11303 
11304  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
11305  }
11306 
11307 END:
11308 
11309  ni_aligned_free(p_uploader_config);
11310  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
11311 
11312  return retval;
11313 }
11314 
11315 /*!******************************************************************************
11316 * \brief Send a p_config command to configure decoding parameters.
11317 *
11318 * \param ni_session_context_t p_ctx - xcoder Context
11319 * \param uint32_t max_pkt_size - overwrite maximum packet size if nonzero
11320 *
11321 * \return - NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS on success, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION, NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED on failure
11322 *******************************************************************************/
11323 ni_retcode_t ni_config_instance_set_decoder_params(ni_session_context_t* p_ctx, uint32_t max_pkt_size)
11324 {
11325  void* p_decoder_config = NULL;
11326  ni_decoder_config_t* p_cfg = NULL;
11327  uint32_t buffer_size = sizeof(ni_decoder_config_t);
11328  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
11329  int i = 0;
11330  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
11331  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
11332 
11333  if (!p_ctx)
11334  {
11335  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
11336  __func__);
11337  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11338  LRETURN;
11339  }
11340 
11341  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
11342  {
11343  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
11344  __func__);
11345  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
11346  LRETURN;
11347  }
11348 
11349  buffer_size = ((buffer_size + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) * NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
11350  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_decoder_config, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
11351  {
11352  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate p_decoder_config buffer\n",
11353  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
11354  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
11355  LRETURN;
11356  }
11357  memset(p_decoder_config, 0, buffer_size);
11358 
11359  ni_set_custom_dec_template(p_ctx, p_decoder_config, p_ctx->p_session_config, max_pkt_size);
11360  retval = ni_validate_custom_dec_template(p_ctx->p_session_config, p_ctx, p_decoder_config, p_ctx->param_err_msg, sizeof(p_ctx->param_err_msg));
11361  if (NI_RETCODE_PARAM_WARN == retval)
11362  {
11363  ni_log(NI_LOG_INFO, "WARNING: %s . %s\n", __func__, p_ctx->param_err_msg);
11364  fflush(stdout);
11365  }
11366  else if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11367  {
11368  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s failed. %s\n", __func__,
11369  p_ctx->param_err_msg);
11370  fflush(stdout);
11371  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11372  LRETURN;
11373  }
11374 
11375  // configure the session here
11376  ui32LBA = CONFIG_INSTANCE_SetDecPara_W(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_DECODER);
11377 
11378  //Flip the bytes!!
11379  //p_cfg = (ni_decoder_config_t*)p_decoder_config;
11380  //p_cfg->i32picWidth = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32picWidth);
11381  //p_cfg->i32picHeight = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32picHeight);
11382  //p_cfg->i32meBlkMode = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32meBlkMode);
11383  //p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32frameRateInfo);
11384  //p_cfg->i32vbvBufferSize = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32vbvBufferSize);
11385  //p_cfg->i32userQpMax = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32userQpMax);
11386  //p_cfg->i32maxIntraSize = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32maxIntraSize);
11387  //p_cfg->i32userMaxDeltaQp = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32userMaxDeltaQp);
11388  //p_cfg->i32userMinDeltaQp = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32userMinDeltaQp);
11389  //p_cfg->i32userQpMin = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32userQpMin);
11390  //p_cfg->i32bitRate = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32bitRate);
11391  //p_cfg->i32bitRateBL = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32bitRateBL);
11392  //p_cfg->i32srcBitDepth = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32srcBitDepth);
11393  //p_cfg->hdrEnableVUI = ni_htonl(p_cfg->hdrEnableVUI);
11394  //p_cfg->ui32VuiDataSizeBits = ni_htonl(p_cfg->ui32VuiDataSizeBits);
11395  //p_cfg->ui32VuiDataSizeBytes = ni_htonl(p_cfg->ui32VuiDataSizeBytes);
11396  //p_cfg->i32hwframes = ni_htonl(p_cfg->i32hwframes);
11397  // flip the 16 bytes of the reserved field using 32 bits pointers
11398  //for (i = 0; i < (16 >> 2); i++)
11399  //{
11400  // ((uint32_t*)p_cfg->ui8Reserved)[i] = ni_htonl(((uint32_t*)p_cfg->ui8Reserved)[i]);
11401  //}
11403  //for (i = 0; i < (NI_MAX_VUI_SIZE >> 2); i++) // apply on 32 bits
11404  //{
11405  // ((uint32_t*)p_cfg->ui8VuiRbsp)[i] = ni_htonl(((uint32_t*)p_cfg->ui8VuiRbsp)[i]);
11406  //}
11407 
11408  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: ui32LBA = 0x%x\n", __func__, ui32LBA);
11409  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
11410  p_decoder_config, buffer_size, ui32LBA);
11411  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
11412  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
11413  &(p_ctx->session_id));
11414  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11415  {
11416  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: ni_nvme_send_admin_cmd failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n", (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
11417  //Close the session since we can't configure it
11418  retval = ni_decoder_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
11419  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11420  {
11421  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: ni_encoder_session_close failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n", (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
11422  }
11423 
11424  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
11425  }
11426 
11427 END:
11428 
11429  ni_aligned_free(p_decoder_config);
11430  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
11431  return retval;
11432 }
11433 
11434 /*!******************************************************************************
11435  * \brief read a hardware descriptor from a scaler session
11436  *
11437  * \param[in] p_ctx pointer to session context
11438  * \param[out] p_frame pointer to frame to write hw descriptor
11439  *
11440  * \return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
11441  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION
11442  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
11443  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
11444  * NI_RETCODE_FAILURE
11445  *******************************************************************************/
11446 ni_retcode_t ni_scaler_session_read_hwdesc(
11447  ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
11448  ni_frame_t *p_frame)
11449 {
11450  ni_retcode_t retval;
11451  ni_instance_buf_info_t sInstanceBuf = {0};
11452  niFrameSurface1_t *pFrameSurface;
11453  int query_retry = 0;
11454 
11455  if (!p_ctx)
11456  {
11457  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
11458  __func__);
11459  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11460  }
11461 
11462  if (p_ctx->session_id == NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID)
11463  {
11464  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
11465  __func__);
11466  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
11467  }
11468 
11469  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
11470 
11471  for (;;)
11472  {
11473  query_retry++;
11474 
11475  retval = ni_query_instance_buf_info(p_ctx, INST_BUF_INFO_RW_UPLOAD,
11476  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER, &sInstanceBuf);
11477 
11478  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
11479  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
11480  &(p_ctx->session_id));
11481 
11482  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
11483  {
11484  if (query_retry >= 1000)
11485  {
11486  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Warning hwdesc read fail rc %d\n", retval);
11487  LRETURN;
11488  }
11489  }
11490  else
11491  {
11492  pFrameSurface = (niFrameSurface1_t *) p_frame->p_data[3];
11493  pFrameSurface->ui16FrameIdx = sInstanceBuf.hw_inst_ind.frame_index;
11494  pFrameSurface->ui16session_ID = p_ctx->session_id;
11495  pFrameSurface->device_handle =
11496  (int32_t)((int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle & 0xFFFFFFFF);
11497  pFrameSurface->src_cpu = (uint8_t) NI_DEVICE_TYPE_SCALER;
11498  pFrameSurface->output_idx = 0;
11499 
11500  /* A frame index of zero is invalid, the memory acquisition failed */
11501  if (pFrameSurface->ui16FrameIdx == 0)
11502  {
11503  if (query_retry >= 1000)
11504  {
11505  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "Warning: 2D could not acquire frame\n");
11506  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
11507  LRETURN;
11508  }
11509  ni_usleep(100);
11510  continue;
11511  }
11512  LRETURN;
11513  }
11514  }
11515 
11516 END:
11517 
11518  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
11519 
11520  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11521  {
11522  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
11523  "Warning scalar read hwdesc fail rc %d or ind "
11524  "!\n",
11525  __func__, retval);
11526  retval = NI_RETCODE_FAILURE;
11527  }
11528 
11529  return retval;
11530 }
11531 
11532 /*!******************************************************************************
11533 * \brief Grab bitdepth factor from NI_PIX_FMT
11534 *
11535 * \param[in] pix_fmt ni_pix_fmt_t
11536 *
11537 * \return 1 or 2 for success, -1 for error
11538 *******************************************************************************/
11539 int ni_get_bitdepth_factor_from_pixfmt(int pix_fmt)
11540 {
11541  switch (pix_fmt)
11542  {
11543  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P:
11544  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV12:
11545  case NI_PIX_FMT_8_TILED4X4:
11546  return 1;
11547  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE:
11548  case NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE:
11549  case NI_PIX_FMT_10_TILED4X4:
11550  return 2;
11551  default:
11552  {
11553  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() non applicable format %d\n", __func__,
11554  pix_fmt);
11555  break;
11556  }
11557  }
11558  return -1;
11559 }
11560 
11561 /*!******************************************************************************
11562 * \brief Grab planar info from NI_PIX_FMT
11563 *
11564 * \param[in] pix_fmt ni_pix_fmt_t
11565 *
11566 * \return 0 or 1 for success, -1 for error
11567 *******************************************************************************/
11568 int ni_get_planar_from_pixfmt(int pix_fmt)
11569 {
11570  switch (pix_fmt)
11571  {
11572  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P:
11573  case NI_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE:
11574  return 1;
11575  break;
11576  case NI_PIX_FMT_NV12:
11577  case NI_PIX_FMT_P010LE:
11578  return 0;
11579  break;
11580  default:
11581  {
11582  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() non applicable format %d\n", __func__,
11583  pix_fmt);
11584  break;
11585  }
11586  }
11587  return -1;
11588 }
11589 
11590 #ifndef _WIN32
11591 /*!*****************************************************************************
11592  * \brief Get an address offset from a hw descriptor
11593  *
11594  * \param[in] p_ctx ni_session_context_t to be referenced
11595  * \param[in] hwdesc Pointer to caller allocated niFrameSurface1_t
11596  * \param[out] p_offset Value of offset
11597  *
11598  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
11599  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
11600  ******************************************************************************/
11601 ni_retcode_t ni_get_memory_offset(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx, const niFrameSurface1_t *hwdesc,
11602  uint32_t *p_offset)
11603 {
11604  if (!hwdesc)
11605  {
11606  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed null parameter\n", __func__);
11607  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11608  }
11609 
11610  if (hwdesc->ui16FrameIdx <= NI_GET_MIN_HWDESC_P2P_BUF_ID(p_ctx->ddr_config) ||
11611  hwdesc->ui16FrameIdx > NI_GET_MAX_HWDESC_P2P_BUF_ID(p_ctx->ddr_config))
11612  {
11613  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() pass invalid data\n", __func__);
11614  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11615  }
11616 
11617  *p_offset = (hwdesc->ui16FrameIdx - NI_GET_MIN_HWDESC_P2P_BUF_ID(p_ctx->ddr_config)) *
11618  NI_HWDESC_UNIFIED_MEMBIN_SIZE;
11619 
11620  return NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
11621 }
11622 #endif
11623 
11624 /* AI functions */
11625 ni_retcode_t ni_config_instance_network_binary(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
11626  void *nb_data, uint32_t nb_size)
11627 {
11628  void *p_ai_config = NULL;
11629  void *p_nb_data = NULL;
11630  uint32_t buffer_size;
11631  // uint8_t *p_data;
11632  // uint32_t transferred, this_size;
11633  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
11634  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
11635  uint32_t config_size;
11636  void *p_buffer = NULL;
11637  uint32_t dataLen;
11638  ni_instance_buf_info_t buf_info = {0};
11639  int retry_count = 0;
11640 
11641  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
11642 
11643  if (!p_ctx)
11644  {
11645  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
11646  __func__);
11647  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11648  LRETURN;
11649  }
11650 
11651  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
11652  {
11653  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
11654  __func__);
11655  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
11656  LRETURN;
11657  }
11658 
11659  config_size = (sizeof(ni_ai_config_t) + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) &
11660  ~(NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1);
11661  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_ai_config, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), config_size))
11662  {
11663  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: Cannot allocate ai config buffer.\n");
11664  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
11665  LRETURN;
11666  }
11667 
11668  ((ni_ai_config_t *)p_ai_config)->ui32NetworkBinarySize = nb_size;
11669  ni_calculate_sha256(nb_data, nb_size,
11670  ((ni_ai_config_t *)p_ai_config)->ui8Sha256);
11671 
11672  buffer_size =
11673  (nb_size + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) & ~(NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1);
11674  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_nb_data, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), buffer_size))
11675  {
11676  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: Cannot allocate encConf buffer.\n");
11677  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
11678  LRETURN;
11679  }
11680 
11681  /* FIXME: can be avoided? */
11682  memcpy(p_nb_data, nb_data, nb_size);
11683 
11684  /* configure network binary size to be written */
11685  ui32LBA = CONFIG_INSTANCE_SetAiPara_W(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI);
11686  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): LBA 0x%x, nb_size %u\n", __func__, ui32LBA,
11687  nb_size);
11688 
11689  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
11690  p_ai_config, config_size, ui32LBA);
11691  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
11692  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
11693  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11694  {
11695  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
11696  "ERROR: ni_nvme_send_admin_cmd failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64
11697  ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n",
11698  (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
11699  //Close the session since we can't configure it
11700  retval = ni_ai_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
11701  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11702  {
11703  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
11704  "ERROR: ni_ai_session_close failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64
11705  ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n",
11706  (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
11707  p_ctx->session_id);
11708  }
11709 
11710  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
11711  LRETURN;
11712  }
11713 
11714  dataLen = (sizeof(ni_network_layer_info_t) + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) &
11715  ~(NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1);
11716  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), dataLen))
11717  {
11718  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: Cannot allocate buffer.\n");
11719  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
11720  LRETURN;
11721  }
11722 
11723  for (;;)
11724  {
11725  /* test if the model is already exist. if not, then continue to write binary data */
11726  memset(p_buffer, 0, dataLen);
11727  ui32LBA =
11728  QUERY_INSTANCE_NL_SIZE_R(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI);
11729  retval =
11730  ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
11731  p_buffer, dataLen, ui32LBA);
11732  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
11733  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
11734  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
11735  {
11736  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
11737  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
11738  LRETURN;
11739  }
11740  if (((ni_instance_buf_info_t *)p_buffer)->buf_avail_size > 0)
11741  {
11742  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): network binary registered\n", __func__);
11743  LRETURN;
11744  }
11745 
11746  /* if this model is not ready, try to require nbuffer to write */
11747  retval = ni_query_instance_buf_info(p_ctx, INST_BUF_INFO_RW_WRITE,
11748  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI, &buf_info);
11749  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
11750  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
11751  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
11752  {
11753  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): Query Write buffer Failed\n", __func__);
11754  LRETURN;
11755  }
11756  if (buf_info.buf_avail_size < nb_size)
11757  {
11758  /*
11759  * Cannot aquire the write access to nbuffer because someone else on the go,
11760  * Retry to see if model is ready.
11761  */
11762  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE,
11763  "AI write query failed or buf_size %u < "
11764  "frame_size %u.\n", buf_info.buf_avail_size, nb_size);
11765  } else
11766  {
11767  /* Grant write access to nbuffer */
11768  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
11769  "Info ai write query success, available buf "
11770  "size %u >= frame size %u !\n",
11771  buf_info.buf_avail_size, nb_size);
11772  break;
11773  }
11774  retry_count++;
11775  /* Wait for at least 30s */
11776  if (retry_count < NI_MAX_AI_NETWORK_BINARY_BUFFER_QUERY_RETRIES)
11777  {
11778  ni_usleep(100);
11779  } else
11780  {
11781  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "AI network binary configuration polling timeout\n");
11782  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_RESOURCE_UNAVAILABLE;
11783  LRETURN;
11784  }
11785  }
11786 
11787 #if 1
11788  /* write network binary data */
11789  ui32LBA = WRITE_INSTANCE_W(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI);
11790  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): write nb LBA 0x%x\n", __func__, ui32LBA);
11791  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
11792  p_nb_data, buffer_size, ui32LBA);
11793  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "write complete retval %d\n", retval);
11794  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_cmd_xcoder_write, p_ctx->device_type,
11795  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
11796  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11797  {
11798  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
11799  "ERROR: ni_nvme_send_admin_cmd failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64
11800  ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n",
11801  (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
11802  //Close the session since we can't configure it
11803  retval = ni_ai_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
11804  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11805  {
11806  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
11807  "ERROR: ni_ai_session_close failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64
11808  ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n",
11809  (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
11810  p_ctx->session_id);
11811  }
11812 
11813  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
11814  LRETURN;
11815  }
11816 
11817 #else
11818  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): write nb buffer_size %u\n", __func__,
11819  buffer_size);
11820  for (transferred = 0; transferred < buffer_size; transferred += this_size)
11821  {
11822  this_size = p_ctx->max_nvme_io_size < (buffer_size - transferred) ?
11823  p_ctx->max_nvme_io_size :
11824  (buffer_size - transferred);
11825 
11826  if (this_size & (4096 - 1))
11827  {
11828  this_size = (this_size + (4096 - 1)) & ~(4096 - 1);
11829  }
11830  /* write network binary data */
11831  ui32LBA = WRITE_INSTANCE_W(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI) +
11832  (transferred >> 12);
11833  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
11834  "%s(): write nb LBA 0x%x, this_size %u, page_offset %u\n",
11835  __func__, ui32LBA, this_size, (transferred >> 12));
11836  p_data = (uint8_t *)p_nb_data + transferred;
11837  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(
11838  p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
11839  (uint8_t *)p_nb_data + transferred, this_size, ui32LBA);
11840  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): write retval %d\n", __func__, retval);
11841  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_cmd_xcoder_write, p_ctx->device_type,
11842  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
11843  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11844  {
11845  ni_log(
11846  NI_LOG_ERROR,
11847  "ERROR: ni_nvme_send_admin_cmd failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64
11848  ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n",
11849  (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
11850  //Close the session since we can't configure it
11851  retval = ni_ai_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
11852  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
11853  {
11854  ni_log(
11855  NI_LOG_ERROR,
11856  "ERROR: ni_ai_session_close failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64
11857  ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n",
11858  (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
11859  p_ctx->session_id);
11860  }
11861 
11862  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
11863  LRETURN;
11864  }
11865  }
11866 
11867 #endif
11868 
11869 END:
11870 
11871  ni_aligned_free(p_ai_config);
11872  ni_aligned_free(p_nb_data);
11873  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
11874 
11875  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
11876 
11877  return retval;
11878 }
11879 
11880 ni_retcode_t ni_ai_session_write(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
11881  ni_frame_t *p_frame)
11882 {
11883  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
11884  int i = 0;
11885  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
11886  ni_instance_buf_info_t buf_info = {0};
11887  uint32_t frame_size_bytes;
11888  uint32_t sent_size = 0;
11889  int32_t query_retry = 0;
11890  int32_t query_count = 0;
11891 
11892  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
11893 
11894  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
11895 
11896  if (!p_ctx || !p_frame)
11897  {
11898  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): passed parameters is null\n",
11899  __func__);
11900  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11901  LRETURN;
11902  }
11903 
11904  if (p_frame->data_len[0] == 0)
11905  {
11906  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() invalid data length\n",
11907  __func__);
11908  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
11909  LRETURN;
11910  }
11911 
11912  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
11913  {
11914  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
11915  __func__);
11916  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
11917  LRETURN;
11918  }
11919 
11920  frame_size_bytes = p_frame->data_len[0];
11921  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): frame_size_bytes %u\n", __func__,
11922  frame_size_bytes);
11923 
11924  if (!p_frame->end_of_stream)
11925  {
11926  for (;;)
11927  {
11928  retval = ni_query_instance_buf_info(p_ctx, INST_BUF_INFO_RW_WRITE,
11929  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI, &buf_info);
11930  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
11931  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id,
11932  &(p_ctx->session_id));
11933 
11934  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval ||
11935  buf_info.buf_avail_size < frame_size_bytes)
11936  {
11937 
11938  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "AI write query failed or buf_size < "
11939  "frame_size. Retry %d\n", query_retry);
11940  // extend to 5000 retries for 8K encode on FPGA
11941  if (query_retry >= NI_MAX_ENCODER_QUERY_RETRIES)
11942  {
11943  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
11944  "ERROR: ai query buf info exceeding max retries: "
11945  "%d, ",
11946  NI_MAX_ENCODER_QUERY_RETRIES);
11947  p_ctx->status = NI_RETCODE_NVME_SC_WRITE_BUFFER_FULL;
11948  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
11949  LRETURN;
11950  }
11951  query_retry++;
11952  ni_usleep(100);
11953  } else
11954  {
11955  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info ai write query success, available buf "
11956  "size %u >= frame size %u !\n",
11957  buf_info.buf_avail_size, frame_size_bytes);
11958  break;
11959  }
11960  }
11961  }
11962 
11963  ui32LBA = WRITE_INSTANCE_W(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI);
11964  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Ai session write: p_data = %p, p_frame->buffer_size = %u, "
11965  "p_ctx->frame_num = %" PRIu64 ", LBA = 0x%x\n",
11966  p_frame->p_data, p_frame->buffer_size, p_ctx->frame_num,
11967  ui32LBA);
11968 
11969  sent_size = frame_size_bytes;
11970  if (sent_size & (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1))
11971  {
11972  sent_size = (sent_size + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1) &
11973  ~(NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1);
11974  }
11975 
11976  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
11977  p_frame->p_buffer, sent_size, ui32LBA);
11978  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_cmd_xcoder_write, p_ctx->device_type,
11979  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
11980  if (retval < 0)
11981  {
11982  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): nvme command failed\n", __func__);
11983  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
11984  LRETURN;
11985  }
11986 
11987  p_ctx->frame_num++;
11988 
11989  retval = frame_size_bytes;
11990 
11991 END:
11992 
11993  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
11994 
11995  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
11996 
11997  return retval;
11998 }
11999 
12000 ni_retcode_t ni_ai_session_read(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
12001  ni_packet_t *p_packet)
12002 {
12003  uint32_t actual_read_size = 0;
12004  uint8_t *p_data = NULL;
12005  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12006  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
12007  ni_instance_buf_info_t buf_info = {0};
12008  int retry_count = 0;
12009 
12010  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
12011 
12012  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
12013 
12014  if (!p_ctx || !p_packet || !p_packet->p_data)
12015  {
12016  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
12017  __func__);
12018  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
12019  LRETURN;
12020  }
12021 
12022  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
12023  {
12024  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
12025  __func__);
12026  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
12027  LRETURN;
12028  }
12029 
12030  for (;;)
12031  {
12032  retval = ni_query_instance_buf_info(p_ctx, INST_BUF_INFO_RW_READ,
12033  NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI, &buf_info);
12034  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_query,
12035  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
12036 
12037  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info ai read query rc %d, available buf size %u, "
12038  "frame_num=%" PRIu64 ", pkt_num=%" PRIu64 "\n",
12039  retval, buf_info.buf_avail_size, p_ctx->frame_num,
12040  p_ctx->pkt_num);
12041 
12042  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
12043  {
12044  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Buffer info query failed in ai read!!!!\n");
12045  LRETURN;
12046  } else if (0 == buf_info.buf_avail_size)
12047  {
12048  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Info ai read available buf size %u, eos %u !\n",
12049  buf_info.buf_avail_size, p_packet->end_of_stream);
12050  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12051  LRETURN;
12052  } else
12053  {
12054  break;
12055  }
12056  }
12057  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Ai read buf_avail_size %u\n", buf_info.buf_avail_size);
12058 
12059  assert(buf_info.buf_avail_size == p_packet->data_len);
12060 
12061  ui32LBA = READ_INSTANCE_R(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI);
12062  actual_read_size = buf_info.buf_avail_size;
12063  if (actual_read_size & (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1))
12064  {
12065  actual_read_size = (actual_read_size + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) &
12066  ~(NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1);
12067  }
12068 
12069  retval = ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
12070  p_packet->p_data, actual_read_size, ui32LBA);
12071  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_cmd_xcoder_read, p_ctx->device_type,
12072  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
12073  if (retval < 0)
12074  {
12075  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): nvme command failed\n", __func__);
12076  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
12077  LRETURN;
12078  }
12079 
12080  retval = p_packet->data_len;
12081 
12082 END:
12083 
12084  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
12085 
12086  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
12087 
12088  return retval;
12089 }
12090 
12091 ni_retcode_t ni_config_read_inout_layers(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx,
12092  ni_network_data_t *p_network)
12093 {
12094  void *p_buffer = NULL;
12095  void *p_info = NULL;
12096  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12097  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
12098  uint32_t dataLen;
12099  int32_t query_retry = 0;
12100  int l;
12101  uint32_t offset = 0;
12102  ni_network_layer_params_t *layer_param;
12103  uint32_t buffer_size;
12104  uint32_t this_size;
12105 
12106  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
12107 
12108  if (!p_ctx || !p_network)
12109  {
12110  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
12111  __func__);
12112  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
12113  LRETURN;
12114  }
12115 
12116  /* query available size can be read. */
12117  dataLen = (sizeof(ni_network_layer_info_t) + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) &
12118  ~(NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1);
12119  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), dataLen))
12120  {
12121  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
12122  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
12123  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
12124  LRETURN;
12125  }
12126  memset(p_buffer, 0, dataLen);
12127 
12128  for (;;)
12129  {
12130  ui32LBA =
12131  QUERY_INSTANCE_NL_SIZE_R(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI);
12132  retval =
12133  ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
12134  p_buffer, dataLen, ui32LBA);
12135  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_cmd_xcoder_read, p_ctx->device_type,
12136  p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
12137  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
12138  {
12139  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
12140  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
12141  LRETURN;
12142  }
12143 
12144  if (((ni_instance_buf_info_t *)p_buffer)->buf_avail_size > 0)
12145  {
12146  break;
12147  }
12148 
12149  query_retry++;
12150  if (query_retry > 10000)
12151  {
12152  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: query retry exceeds\n", __func__);
12153  }
12154  ni_usleep(200);
12155  continue;
12156  }
12157 
12158  if (((ni_instance_buf_info_t *)p_buffer)->buf_avail_size == 0)
12159  {
12160  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_RESOURCE_UNAVAILABLE;
12161  LRETURN;
12162  }
12163 
12164  assert(((ni_instance_buf_info_t *)p_buffer)->buf_avail_size ==
12165  sizeof(ni_network_layer_info_t));
12166 
12167  /* query the real network layer data */
12168  dataLen = (sizeof(ni_network_layer_info_t) + (NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1)) &
12169  ~(NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1);
12170  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_info, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), dataLen))
12171  {
12172  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate info buffer\n",
12173  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
12174  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
12175  LRETURN;
12176  }
12177  memset(p_info, 0, dataLen);
12178 
12179  ui32LBA = QUERY_INSTANCE_NL_R(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI);
12180  if (ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
12181  p_info, dataLen, ui32LBA) < 0)
12182  {
12183  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "%s(): NVME command Failed\n", __func__);
12184  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
12185  LRETURN;
12186  }
12187 
12188  p_network->linfo = *((ni_network_layer_info_t *)p_info);
12189 
12190  for (l = 0, p_network->input_num = 0, buffer_size = 0;
12191  l < NI_MAX_NETWORK_INPUT_NUM; l++)
12192  {
12193  layer_param = &p_network->linfo.in_param[l];
12194  if (layer_param->num_of_dims == 0)
12195  {
12196  break;
12197  }
12198  this_size = ni_ai_network_layer_size(layer_param);
12199  this_size =
12200  (this_size + NI_AI_HW_ALIGN_SIZE - 1) & ~(NI_AI_HW_ALIGN_SIZE - 1);
12201  p_network->inset[l].offset = buffer_size;
12202  buffer_size += this_size;
12203 
12204  p_network->input_num++;
12205  ni_log(
12206  NI_LOG_DEBUG,
12207  "%s(): network input layer %d: dims %u, %u/%u/%u/%u, f %d, q %d\n",
12208  __func__, l, layer_param->num_of_dims, layer_param->sizes[0],
12209  layer_param->sizes[1], layer_param->sizes[2], layer_param->sizes[3],
12210  layer_param->data_format, layer_param->quant_format);
12211  }
12212 
12213  for (l = 0, p_network->output_num = 0, buffer_size = 0;
12214  l < NI_MAX_NETWORK_OUTPUT_NUM; l++)
12215  {
12216  layer_param = &p_network->linfo.out_param[l];
12217  if (layer_param->num_of_dims == 0)
12218  {
12219  break;
12220  }
12221  this_size = ni_ai_network_layer_size(layer_param);
12222  this_size =
12223  (this_size + NI_AI_HW_ALIGN_SIZE - 1) & ~(NI_AI_HW_ALIGN_SIZE - 1);
12224  p_network->outset[l].offset = buffer_size;
12225  buffer_size += this_size;
12226 
12227  p_network->output_num++;
12228  ni_log(
12229  NI_LOG_DEBUG,
12230  "%s(): network output layer %d: dims %u, %u/%u/%u/%u, f %d, q %d\n",
12231  __func__, l, layer_param->num_of_dims, layer_param->sizes[0],
12232  layer_param->sizes[1], layer_param->sizes[2], layer_param->sizes[3],
12233  layer_param->data_format, layer_param->quant_format);
12234  }
12235 
12236  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12237 
12238 END:
12239 
12240  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
12241  ni_aligned_free(p_info);
12242  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
12243  return retval;
12244 }
12245 
12246 ni_retcode_t ni_ai_session_open(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx)
12247 {
12248  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12249  uint32_t buffer_size = 0;
12250  void *p_buffer = NULL;
12251  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
12252 
12253  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
12254 
12255  if (!p_ctx)
12256  {
12257  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
12258  __func__);
12259  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
12260  LRETURN;
12261  }
12262 
12263  //Check if there is an instance or we need a new one
12264  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
12265  {
12266  p_ctx->device_type = NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI;
12267  p_ctx->pts_table = NULL;
12268  p_ctx->dts_queue = NULL;
12269  p_ctx->buffer_pool = NULL;
12270  p_ctx->status = 0;
12271  p_ctx->key_frame_type = 0;
12272  p_ctx->keyframe_factor = 1;
12273  p_ctx->frame_num = 0;
12274  p_ctx->pkt_num = 0;
12275  p_ctx->rc_error_count = 0;
12276  p_ctx->force_frame_type = 0;
12277  p_ctx->ready_to_close = 0;
12278  //Sequence change tracking reated stuff
12279  p_ctx->active_video_width = 0;
12280  p_ctx->active_video_height = 0;
12281  p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf = NULL;
12282  p_ctx->actual_video_width = 0;
12283  p_ctx->session_run_state = SESSION_RUN_STATE_NORMAL;
12284 
12285  memset(&(p_ctx->param_err_msg[0]), 0, sizeof(p_ctx->param_err_msg));
12286 
12287  //malloc zero data buffer
12288  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE),
12289  NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN))
12290  {
12291  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() alloc all zero buffer failed\n",
12292  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
12293  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
12294  LRETURN;
12295  }
12296  memset(p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
12297 
12298  //malloc data buffer
12299  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE),
12300  NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN))
12301  {
12302  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() alloc data buffer failed\n",
12303  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
12304  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
12305  LRETURN;
12306  }
12307  memset(p_buffer, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
12308 
12309  //Set session ID to be invalid. In case we cannot open session, the session id wold remain invalid.
12310  //In case we can open sesison, the session id would become valid.
12311  ((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui16SessionId =
12312  (uint16_t)NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
12313 
12314  // First uint32_t is either an invaild session ID or a valid session ID, depending on if session could be opened
12315  ui32LBA = OPEN_SESSION_CODEC(NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI, 0, p_ctx->hw_action);
12316  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): LBA 0x%x, hw_action %d\n", __func__,
12317  ui32LBA, p_ctx->hw_action);
12318  retval =
12319  ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
12320  p_buffer, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA);
12321  if (retval != NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS)
12322  {
12323  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR ni_nvme_send_read_cmd\n");
12324  LRETURN;
12325  }
12326  //Open will return a session status structure with a valid session id if it worked.
12327  //Otherwise the invalid session id set before the open command will stay
12328  if ((uint16_t)NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID ==
12329  ni_ntohs(((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui16SessionId))
12330  {
12331  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
12332  "ERROR %s(): p_ctx->device_handle=%" PRIx64
12333  ", p_ctx->hw_id=%d, p_ctx->session_id=%d\n",
12334  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
12335  p_ctx->session_id);
12336  ni_ai_session_close(p_ctx, 0);
12337  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
12338  LRETURN;
12339  }
12340  p_ctx->session_id =
12341  ni_ntohs(((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui16SessionId);
12342  p_ctx->session_timestamp =
12343  ni_htonll(((ni_session_stats_t *)p_buffer)->ui64Session_timestamp);
12344  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Ai open session ID:0x%x,timestamp:%" PRIu64 "\n",
12345  p_ctx->session_id, p_ctx->session_timestamp);
12346 
12347  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Open session completed\n");
12348  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
12349  "%s(): p_ctx->device_handle=%" PRIx64
12350  ", p_ctx->hw_id=%d, p_ctx->session_id=%d\n",
12351  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
12352  p_ctx->session_id);
12353 
12354  //Send keep alive timeout Info
12355  uint64_t keep_alive_timeout =
12356  p_ctx->keep_alive_timeout * 1000000; //send us to FW
12357  memset(p_buffer, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
12358  memcpy(p_buffer, &keep_alive_timeout, sizeof(keep_alive_timeout));
12359  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s keep_alive_timeout %" PRIx64 "\n", __func__,
12360  keep_alive_timeout);
12361  ui32LBA = CONFIG_SESSION_KeepAliveTimeout_W(p_ctx->session_id);
12362  retval =
12363  ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
12364  p_buffer, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA);
12365  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
12366  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
12367  CHECK_VPU_RECOVERY(retval);
12368 
12369  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
12370  {
12371  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
12372  "ERROR %s(): nvme write keep_alive_timeout command "
12373  "failed, blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64 ", hw_id, %d\n",
12374  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id);
12375  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
12376  LRETURN;
12377  }
12378  }
12379 
12380  // init for frame pts calculation
12381  p_ctx->is_first_frame = 1;
12382  p_ctx->last_pts = 0;
12383  p_ctx->last_dts = 0;
12384  p_ctx->active_video_width = 0;
12385  p_ctx->active_video_height = 0;
12386  p_ctx->actual_video_width = 0;
12387 
12388 END:
12389 
12390  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
12391  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
12392  return retval;
12393 }
12394 
12395 ni_retcode_t ni_ai_session_close(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx, int eos_recieved)
12396 {
12397  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12398  void *p_buffer = NULL;
12399  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
12400  int counter = 0;
12401  int ret = 0;
12402 
12403  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
12404 
12405  if (!p_ctx)
12406  {
12407  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
12408  __func__);
12409  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
12410  }
12411 
12412  ni_pthread_mutex_lock(&p_ctx->mutex);
12413 
12414  if (NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID == p_ctx->session_id)
12415  {
12416  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n", __func__);
12417  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12418  LRETURN;
12419  }
12420 
12421  //malloc data buffer
12422  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN))
12423  {
12424  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() alloc data buffer failed\n",
12425  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
12426  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
12427  LRETURN;
12428  }
12429  memset(p_buffer, 0, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN);
12430 
12431  ui32LBA = CLOSE_SESSION_R(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI);
12432 
12433  int retry = 0;
12434  while (retry < NI_SESSION_CLOSE_RETRY_MAX)
12435  {
12436  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
12437  "%s(): p_ctx->blk_io_handle=%" PRIx64 ", p_ctx->hw_id=%d, "
12438  "p_ctx->session_id=%d, close_mode=1\n",
12439  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
12440  p_ctx->session_id);
12441 
12442  if (ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
12443  p_buffer, NI_DATA_BUFFER_LEN, ui32LBA) < 0)
12444  {
12445  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): command failed\n", __func__);
12446  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
12447  break;
12448  } else
12449  {
12450  //Close should always succeed
12451  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12452  p_ctx->session_id = NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
12453  break;
12454  }
12455  /*
12456  else if(((ni_session_closed_status_t *)p_buffer)->session_closed)
12457  {
12458  retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12459  p_ctx->session_id = NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID;
12460  break;
12461  }
12462  else
12463  {
12464  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): wait for close\n", __func__);
12465  ni_usleep(NI_SESSION_CLOSE_RETRY_INTERVAL_US);
12466  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
12467  }
12468  */
12469  retry++;
12470  }
12471 
12472 END:
12473 
12474  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
12475  ni_aligned_free(p_ctx->p_all_zero_buf);
12476 
12477  //Sequence change related stuff cleanup here
12478  p_ctx->active_video_width = 0;
12479  p_ctx->active_video_height = 0;
12480  p_ctx->actual_video_width = 0;
12481 
12482  //End of sequence change related stuff cleanup
12483  ni_buffer_pool_free(p_ctx->buffer_pool);
12484  p_ctx->buffer_pool = NULL;
12485 
12486  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s(): CTX[Card:%" PRIx64 " / HW:%d / INST:%d]\n",
12487  __func__, (int64_t)p_ctx->device_handle, p_ctx->hw_id,
12488  p_ctx->session_id);
12489  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
12490 
12491 #ifdef XCODER_DUMP_ENABLED
12492  if (p_ctx->p_dump[0])
12493  {
12494  fclose(p_ctx->p_dump[0]);
12495  p_ctx->p_dump[0] = NULL;
12496  }
12497  if (p_ctx->p_dump[1])
12498  {
12499  fclose(p_ctx->p_dump[1]);
12500  p_ctx->p_dump[1] = NULL;
12501  }
12502 #endif
12503 
12504  ni_pthread_mutex_unlock(&p_ctx->mutex);
12505 
12506  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): exit\n", __func__);
12507 
12508  return retval;
12509 }
12510 
12511 ni_retcode_t ni_ai_alloc_hwframe(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx, int frame_index)
12512 {
12513  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12514  ni_network_buffer_t *p_data = NULL;
12515  uint32_t dataLen;
12516  uint32_t ui32LBA = 0;
12517 
12518  if (!p_ctx)
12519  {
12520  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s() passed parameters are null!, return\n",
12521  __func__);
12522  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
12523  }
12524 
12525  if (p_ctx->session_id == NI_INVALID_SESSION_ID)
12526  {
12527  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): Invalid session ID, return.\n",
12528  __func__);
12529  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_INVALID_SESSION;
12530  }
12531 
12532  dataLen = (sizeof(ni_network_buffer_t) + NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1) &
12533  ~(NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT - 1);
12534 
12535  if (ni_posix_memalign((void **)&p_data, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE), dataLen))
12536  {
12537  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer\n",
12538  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
12539  return NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
12540  }
12541 
12542  // memset(p_data, 0x00, dataLen);
12543  p_data->ui32Address = frame_index;
12544 
12545  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Dev alloc frame: frame_index %u\n", p_data->ui32Address);
12546 
12547  ui32LBA = CONFIG_INSTANCE_SetAiFrm_W(p_ctx->session_id, NI_DEVICE_TYPE_AI);
12548 
12549  retval = ni_nvme_send_write_cmd(p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->event_handle,
12550  p_data, dataLen, ui32LBA);
12551  CHECK_ERR_RC(p_ctx, retval, nvme_admin_cmd_xcoder_config,
12552  p_ctx->device_type, p_ctx->hw_id, &(p_ctx->session_id));
12553  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
12554  {
12555  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
12556  "ERROR: ni_nvme_send_admin_cmd failed: blk_io_handle: %" PRIx64
12557  ", hw_id, %u, xcoder_inst_id: %d\n",
12558  (int64_t)p_ctx->blk_io_handle, p_ctx->hw_id, p_ctx->session_id);
12559  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %s(): nvme command failed!\n", __func__);
12560  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
12561  LRETURN;
12562  }
12563 
12564 END:
12565  ni_aligned_free(p_data);
12566  return retval;
12567 }
12568 
12569 /*!*****************************************************************************
12570  * \brief Get DDR configuration of Quadra device
12571  *
12572  * \param[in/out] p_ctx pointer to a session context with valid file handle
12573  *
12574  * \return On success NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
12575  * On failure NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
12576  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
12577  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED
12578  ******************************************************************************/
12579 ni_retcode_t ni_device_get_ddr_configuration(ni_session_context_t *p_ctx)
12580 {
12581  void *p_buffer = NULL;
12582  ni_nvme_identity_t *p_id_data;
12583  ni_retcode_t retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12584  ni_event_handle_t event_handle = NI_INVALID_EVENT_HANDLE;
12585  uint32_t ui32LBA = IDENTIFY_DEVICE_R;
12586  ni_device_handle_t device_handle = p_ctx->blk_io_handle;
12587 
12588  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): enter\n", __func__);
12589 
12590  if (NI_INVALID_DEVICE_HANDLE == device_handle)
12591  {
12592  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR: %s(): invalid passed parameters\n",
12593  __func__);
12594  retval = NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
12595  LRETURN;
12596  }
12597 
12598  if (ni_posix_memalign(&p_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE),
12599  NI_NVME_IDENTITY_CMD_DATA_SZ))
12600  {
12601  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR, "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate buffer.\n",
12602  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
12603  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
12604  LRETURN;
12605  }
12606 
12607  memset(p_buffer, 0, NI_NVME_IDENTITY_CMD_DATA_SZ);
12608 
12609  if (ni_nvme_send_read_cmd(device_handle, event_handle, p_buffer,
12610  NI_NVME_IDENTITY_CMD_DATA_SZ, ui32LBA) < 0)
12611  {
12612  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_NVME_CMD_FAILED;
12613  LRETURN;
12614  }
12615 
12616  p_id_data = (ni_nvme_identity_t *) p_buffer;
12617  p_ctx->ddr_config = (p_id_data->memory_cfg == NI_QUADRA_MEMORY_CONFIG_SR)
12618  ? 1 : 2;
12619 
12620  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "Memory configuration %d\n",p_ctx->ddr_config);
12621 END:
12622 
12623  ni_aligned_free(p_buffer);
12624  ni_log(NI_LOG_TRACE, "%s(): retval: %d\n", __func__, retval);
12625 
12626  return retval;
12627 }
12628 
12629 /*!*****************************************************************************
12630  * \brief Allocate memory for the metadata header and auxillary data for
12631  * encoder input data.
12632  *
12633  * \param[in] p_frame Pointer to a caller allocated ni_frame_t struct
12634  *
12635  * \param[in] extra_len Length header and auxillary data
12636  *
12637  * \return On success
12638  * NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS
12639  * On failure
12640  * NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM
12641  * NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC
12642  *****************************************************************************/
12643 ni_retcode_t ni_encoder_metadata_buffer_alloc(ni_frame_t *p_frame,
12644  int extra_len)
12645 {
12646  void *metadata_buffer = NULL;
12647  int retval = NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS;
12648 
12649  if ((!p_frame) || (extra_len <= 0))
12650  {
12651  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
12652  "ERROR: %s passed parameters are null or not supported, "
12653  "p_frame %p, extra_len %d",
12654  __func__, p_frame, extra_len);
12655  return NI_RETCODE_INVALID_PARAM;
12656  }
12657 
12658  int buffer_size = extra_len;
12659  if (buffer_size % NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT)
12660  {
12661  buffer_size = ((buffer_size / NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT) + 1) *
12662  NI_MEM_PAGE_ALIGNMENT;
12663  }
12664 
12665  // Check if previous metadata buffer needs to be freed
12666  if ((p_frame->metadata_buffer_size != buffer_size) &&
12667  (p_frame->metadata_buffer_size > 0))
12668  {
12669  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
12670  "%s: free current p_frame metadata buffer, "
12671  "p_frame->buffer_size=%u\n",
12672  __func__, p_frame->metadata_buffer_size);
12673  p_frame->metadata_buffer_size = 0;
12674  ni_aligned_free(p_frame->p_metadata_buffer);
12675  }
12676 
12677  // Check if new metadata buffer needs to be allocated
12678  if (p_frame->metadata_buffer_size != buffer_size)
12679  {
12680  if (ni_posix_memalign(&metadata_buffer, sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE),
12681  buffer_size))
12682  {
12683  ni_log(NI_LOG_ERROR,
12684  "ERROR %d: %s() Cannot allocate metadata buffer.\n",
12685  NI_ERRNO, __func__);
12686  retval = NI_RETCODE_ERROR_MEM_ALOC;
12687  LRETURN;
12688  }
12689 
12690  // init once after allocation
12691  memset(metadata_buffer, 0, buffer_size);
12692  p_frame->metadata_buffer_size = buffer_size;
12693  p_frame->p_metadata_buffer = metadata_buffer;
12694 
12695  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: allocated new metadata buffer\n", __func__);
12696  } else
12697  {
12698  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG, "%s: reuse metadata buffer\n", __func__);
12699  }
12700 
12701  ni_log(NI_LOG_DEBUG,
12702  "%s: success: p_frame->p_metadata_buffer %p "
12703  "p_frame->metadata_buffer_size=%u\n",
12704  __func__, p_frame->p_metadata_buffer, p_frame->metadata_buffer_size);
12705 
12706 END:
12707 
12708  if (NI_RETCODE_SUCCESS != retval)
12709  {
12710  ni_aligned_free(metadata_buffer);
12711  }
12712 
12713  return retval;
12714 }

int32_t maxQpB
